name: Spacious 3 Bedroom 3 Bath + Loft at Alii Cove
description:
Largest 3 Bedroom 3 bath at Alii Cove across from Honl's beach. End unit townhome style, no other units above or below. Fully furnished with beautiful open floor plan high ceilings, beautiful windows and oversized doors. Brand new flooring and appliances. Private yard and patio. Upper lanai has ocean view. Assigned parking space. Located close to onsite pool, spa, work out room.

Across from Honl's beach a great place to watch the Kona sunset. Closing walking distance to Kona town.

The space
Spacious, light and roomy. Delightful place to stay. Alii Cove is one of the most attractive and popular places to stay on the Big Island. Beautiful community saline swimming pool, spa and fitness room. Great end unit location close access to pool, spa, bbq's and fitness room.

Guest access
Community pool, spa and fitness room within easy and close walking distance.

Other things to note
Hawaii's occupancy tax is 14.9
neighborhood_overview: It's summer time all year long! Beautiful Kona sunsets! Prime location across from the pacific ocean and close walking distance to cute Kona town. The big island has four incredible eco systems to see. The local people are friendly with much Aloha!

name: Simply Paradise Glamping
description:
Won·der: a feeling of surprise mingled with admiration, caused by something beautiful or inexplicable. Enjoy the beautiful rainforest while falling asleep to the sound of frogs. Sleep in our luxury tent on a comfortable double or single bed! Gaze at the stars, Relax & Rejuvenate. Enjoy fully equipped bathroom, high speed wifi, electricity. Pick your own bouquet of tropical flowers! Enjoy the great outdoors with a campfire. Clean up after your stay and pay no cleaning fee!

The space
Stay in beautiful historic Holualoa Village. You can have it all! The cooler rainforest and the hot beaches! Take short 15-minute drive from site to area beaches and downtown Kailua-Kona.

Guest access
Complementary tea, coffee, oatmeal. Hot water heater, coffee maker, microwave, and refrigerator all available in common garden area. Take 2-minute walk through lighted garden path to access shower and toilet. Wi-fi and cell phone reception available.
neighborhood_overview: Located in historic Holualoa and just a short drive down to the beaches and shops of downtown Kona.  Neighborhood is safe.  We have not had any problems with theft or crime. We are 20-min drive from Airport & Beaches.

name: Point at Poipu Resort- 2 bedrooms garden view
description:
Drenched in radiant island sunshine, The Point at Poipu overlooks the secluded and polished sands of Shipwreck Beach. Slip into the sumptuous comfort of a spacious two-bedroom accommodation after a day of seaside activities and exploration. All accommodations offer fully-equipped kitchens, master baths and mid-week housekeeping. Visit the on-site fitness center, explore the beautiful gardens and atriums or relax poolside and bask in the warmth of Hawaiian bliss.

The space
The Point at Poipu offers oceanfront elegance with accommodations featuring spacious balconies overlooking the garden. Master bedroom has a king bed, second bedroom has two twin beds or queen bed, and sleeper sofa in the living area. If you have a preference of bedding in the second bedroom please inform me prior to reservation confirmation and I can request it directly with the resort. Relax and enjoy the separate sitting areas and fully equipped kitchens. The beautifully appointed master bath
host_about: I am a certified travel agent for the past 10 years. I am married with 5 kids and a huge dog! I am a family man who loves to spend time with the family. I enjoy traveling and enjoy helping others travel even more!

name: Upcountry Hospitality in the 'Auwai Suite
description:
The 'Auwai Suite is a lovely, self-contained apartment at the back of our historic Waimea Guest House built in the 1800's. This suite is named for the 100-year-old Hawaiian irrigation canal that runs through the property.

It has a full kitchen, dining area, beautifully tiled bathroom, bedroom with queen bed and two window seats, a shared back lanai, and a private outdoor table and chairs.
This is a most popular suite in Waimea Guest House and is great for extended stays.

The space
The ‘Auwai Suite is a lovely, self-contained apartment at the back of Waimea Guest House. It has a full kitchen, dining area, and beautifully tiled bathroom, as well as a large bedroom - with high vaulted ceilings, a queen bed, and two window seats - that opens out onto a shared back lanai.

To find the entrance to this unit, guests follow the traditional Hawaiian ‘auwai (irrigation ditch) that runs along the property towards the back. The most private of th
neighborhood_overview: We are located on the "sunny side" of Waimea, just off the Kawaihae Road.  Our home is tucked into a quiet residential neighborhood at the base of the Kohala mountain range.
host_about: Lea, born and raised on the Island of Hawaii, just returned with her husband, Pat. We think Waimea is the very best place to live -- central, a little cooler and surrounded by an adorable town.  We offer Hawaiian hospitality to travelers who are looking for an authentic island experience.  We love the Big Island and know it well. The best part of hosting is getting to share tips and tricks with our guests and make sure they see the real deal while staying with us.

name: Hale Koa Studio & 1 Bedroom Units!!
description:
This Wonderful Spacious Studio apt/flat is in a duplex building has peaceful cottage setting on a working farm in South Kona farm belt rural area , Its elevation provides cool temperatures & amazing lush foliage with ocean and mountain view with cable TV and free wifi.
The rural Captain Cook/Honaunau area offers rural charm and comfort, conveniently located off HWY 11 Belt Road.

The space
Hale Koa Duplex:
This duplex has a wonderful, peaceful cottage setting and it's elevation provides cool temperatures & amazing, lush foliage. Truly stunning! with cable and free wireless internet service.
The structure offers two unique very private spaces with private Entries, Full kitchen with cooking utensils, range, appliances in each unit (see photos), plus free Wi-fi available thru out the space, inside the apt and Lanai.

The FIRST unit is a spacious studio Apt. unit with Queen size bed in the living room area plus a sleeper-sofa in the front
neighborhood_overview: IN a Farm belt area with small commercial farming of coffee, avocados, tropical fruit and macadamia nut trees. Tropical lush nature in peaceful tranquil location with ocean and mountain view and amazing sunsets.
host_about:
Kona Hawaii,
 
 Ed is a Farmer/Designer 

We are friendly, open minded , Adventurous and creative ,who love sports, travel and explorer our precious globe.

We enjoy simple minimalist clean interiors and Architecture, Good Healthy food and friendly stylish venues. 

As hosts, we are here if you need us, We certainly won't disturb our guests, if you prefer privacy. 
Each  building has its own private entrance,  you will feel like you're in your home-away-from-home.
 We take our Airbnb hosting responsibilities seriously, and aim to make your visit to The Big Island of Hawaii as comfortable, and enjoyable as possible!

name: OCEAN VIEW STUDIO - close to airport
description:
The space is a studio/ large master bedroom off of the main house with a separate entrance. The deck/grill is available for your use during your stay. A friendly dog (her name is Kona) lives on the property and enjoys spending time on the deck during the day. Although there is no a/c in the room, temperatures remain cool and comfortable at 1500 ft elevation. An ideal base to explore the Kona coast. When available I have an extra car for rent.

The space
The bedroom windows and deck overlook miles of the kona coast and provide beautiful ocean view sunsets. You will have access to the large deck with BBQ grill and grilling utensils. There is a queen bed and couch that is 6’ long, and can easily be another sleeping area.

Guest access
There is off street parking for one vehicle. A small mini mart is located a mile away, otherwise the major markets and shops are located in town 10 mins away.

Other things to note
Due t
neighborhood_overview: Safe, residential neighborhood.  Less than a mile to the closest grocery store and central to several beaches on the west coast.  A short 10 min drive from the airport.
host_about: Hi my name is Brittany. I’ve lived in Kona HI for 6 years. I can recommend activities, beaches, hikes and restaurants during your stay. I spend most of my free time on my boat, diving or exploring the island with friends. I have one pup at the moment (I used to foster another) and she is very friendly, and will ask to go home with you (please don’t). Anything  you need or any questions you have I am always available to help where I can!

name: Keauhou Villa
description:
It is less than 10 minute walk to the Keauhou Shopping Center, with Shuttle service to Kona, and eight high end and casual restaurants, grocery store, Hawaiian Cultural events & exhibits , post office, gift shops, walk-in medical clinic, and an 8 screen cinema. It has a wonderful Farmer’s Market every Saturday. walking distance to the Sheraton Resort and its farmers market with organic produce, food and Kona coffee.

The space
Location: Keauhou, Kona Coast, Big Island, Hawaii, USA (Historic Keauhou Bay,5mls Kailua-Kona,11mls Kona Int.Airport)

Accommodations: House, 3 Bedrooms, 3 Baths (Sleeps 6-8)

This beautiful spacious home is just a block to Keauhou and Heeia Bay and across the street from the Kona Country Club ocean golf course. This is a wonderful place to relax with family and friends. The designer furnishings, custom baths, chefs kitchen and wood floors give this home the relaxing feel of barefoot luxury.
Enjoy peace and tranqui
neighborhood_overview:
It is less than 10 minute walk to the Keauhou Shopping Center, with six restaurants such as high-end Kenichi Restaurant,Sam Choy's Kai Lanai, grocery store, post office gift shops, walk-in medical clinic, and an 8 screen cinema. It has a wonderful Farmer’s Market every Saturday morning, pick up your fresh mangoes, papayas, bananas, exotic fruits, 
Kona coffee beans and fresh tropical flowers). On Friday evenings they have a 
free Polynesian dance performance. There is a big sandy beach with terrific 
shallow water snorkeling at Kahalu'u Park just a 15 minute walk away (go early 
in the morning to snorkel with the green sea turtles). Surfing lessons are also 
available. A 5 minute drive will take you to terrific boogie boarding at Magic 
Sands beach.

name: STAY AT PRINCE KUHIO!
description:
The space
Prince Kuhio, Studio Unit. Sleeps 2 privately. Sleeps 4 max.
Prince Kuhio Resort is an oceanfront resort located on the South shore of Kauai in the Poipu area of Kauai. Specifically, steps from Lawai Beach where you can enjoy fantastic snorkeling just steps away, scuba, surfing, swimming, or just relaxing on the beach.
The resort is also close to Brennecke's Beach, Whaler's Cove, Shipwreck's beach, and the famous Spouting Horn Park. The world renowned Beach House Restaurant is located right across the street. See humpback whales and sea turtles right from shore. Relax in the evening on the lawn or beach and witness spectacular and romantic Hawaiian sunsets every single night.
Surfers will be stoked on this location.... there are 3 world-class breaks right out in front of the resort past the swimming areas on the outer-reef. The inside reef is great for swimming and snorkeling!

name: Ke Nani Kai 2/2 upper end unit on Molokai
description:
Looking for quiet and private? Look no further! LARGE and VERY private lanai, partial ocean view, awesome sunsets and breezes! Steps to the beach!
This is not just a rental, this also my home, so I took advantage of the COVID shelter in place! Entire place with new paint, new black-out drapes/rods throughout, new lanai screens, new flooring in both bedrooms, updated dining room lamp, louver repairs/screens. Kitchen remodeled 4/1/22. And there will be more to come!

The space
You can make your stay as laid back or as busy as you want! Lots to do, or just turn everything off and relax! Snorkel and beach gear including boogie boards, beach chairs, cooler/shade umbrella available in the unit for your use. Well equipped kitchen. Washer and dryer in the unit! No hunting for change or dragging laundry around! Equipped with cable and Wifi. Wonderful breezes from the open, wrap-around lanai.

Guest access
The entire place is yours
neighborhood_overview: I'd recommend the Molokai Mule ride and tour.  Scuba or snorkel with the fish and dive shop, hike out to the Falls on the East end (permit needed).  Saturday market is a treat!  Kumu farms is a must for some fresh produce.  Check out Purdy's macadamia nut farm, and don't forget the late night hot bread from the bakery!  Or just relax at the pool.  Due to COVID restrictions, some activities may not be available at the moment.

name: Isle Of You Naturally Farm Retreat
description:
The Best Choice for your Clothing Optional Nudist Retreat. Where our friendly commitment to the nude lifestyle, encourages people to be free. Imagine your experience here starting the day naked on the deck. Enjoying coffee,fruits,yoga,and watching the world go by.

The space
Hey, want to stay someplace real for your next vacation. You can check in with us at The Isle of You Naturally Farm and Retreat; a gay owned clothing optional naturist eco farm and retreat.

Your stay here can include walking the various trails around the farm going thru the fruit orchards, bamboo trees, banana groves or to see the collapsed lava tube in cotton candy land. You'll find other gardens too such as Martins' Gardens, Berry Fairie Gardens, R & P garage , mushroom garden, and other hidden secrets for you to explore!

Note: Only AT&T service is available on the farm, as well as wifi for emergency. Otherwise, whatever you need is only 7 miles away in Pahoa T
neighborhood_overview:
We are located on a rural one lane road going from sea level-1000ft. It's a nice quiet stroll up and down Kama'ili Rd. It starts off Highway 130 and ends at Opihikao on the red road, another amazing one lane road along our east coast with the cleanest air in the world.
There are no street lights in this area, so you are guided by the stars and moon light. With very little noise on the farm you'll rarely hear cars, neighbors, sirens, etc. You will hear leaves falling, chickens squawking during the day, and maybe your lovers heartbeat.
host_about:
a decade ago,  my husband bailed on the mainland and all its stress to buy a 70 acre farm on the Big Island near Pahoa. We are a working farm located on the east side of the island of Hawaii, about 30 min south of Hilo on the Puna Coast, close to the quaint village of Pahoa.
We spend our days tending to gardens, the fruit orchards, maybe a day at the local black sand beach called Kehena, playing volleyball or just watching sunsets.
Our guests tend to be outdoor types who love to be in nature.  We invite you up for coffee if you'd like or you can hang by yourself and we'll ignore you if that's what you want.  Then you'll be in your own little paradise and only contacting us when you need info or want to chat.
A couple of mottos to live by include:
'Ua mau ke ea o ka'aina i ka pono o Hawaii'  -- The life of the land in Hawaii is preserved in righteousness.
'Aloha mai no, aloha aku; o ka huhu ka mea e ola ' ole ai' ---When love is given, love should be returned; anger is the thing that gives no life.

name: Marriott's Waiohai Beach Club- Two Bedroom
description:
Kaua'i is Hawaii's most remote and private island, and no other resort embraces this idyllic setting more than Marriott's Waiohai Beach Club. It is located on award-winning Poipu Beach. Serenity and amazing natural beauty abound on the 'Garden Isle'. Relax in our spacious villa in Poipu, Kaua'i. This elegant resort offers three azure pools, a fitness center, and beachfront watersports for you to enjoy.

The space
The Waiohai Beach Club is beautifully landscaped with waterfalls and lagoons, lush tropical plants, and the sandy shores of Poipu Beach just steps away. Spend a lazy day in the sun snorkeling or swimming in the ocean or either of the two outdoor pools. While the beach is perfect for children, the resort also offers a shallow children's pool for a day of splashing and playing. Grab a snack at The MarketPlace, or sit down for a meal at The Kiawe Grill. Also on-site are a fitness center and children's activity center.

The Marriott's Waiohai Beach
neighborhood_overview:
South Shore is home to historic Old Koloa Town and the resort area of Poipu. With championship golf courses and exploring the Koloa Heritage Trail to learn more about Kauai’s history.
Visit the Spouting Horn blowhole. The Poipu surf channels into a natural lava tube here and releases a huge spout of water during large swells.
Ka Ala Hele Waiwai Hooilina o Koloa, or the Koloa Heritage Trail, is a 14-stop, self-guided 10-mile tour of the Koloa and Poipu area’s most important cultural, historical and geological sites, with plaques that explain each spot’s significance.
1. Spouting Horn Park - Famous south shore blowhole.
2. Prince Kuhio Park - Prince Kuhio, known as the “People’s Prince,” was born here in 1871.
3. Pau A Laka (Moir Gardens) - Botanical garden founded in the 1930s.
4. Kihahouna Heiau - Site of an ancient Hawaiian temple.
5. Poipu Beach Park - Popular beach home to endangered monk seals.
6. Keoneloa Bay - Home to some of Kauai’s oldest

name: Stay in the Heart of Kona
description:
UPDATE: We had our windows and slider replaced so our walls currently will not have matching paint applied. Our condo is located right across the street from the Pacific Ocean. In a quiet neighborhood outside of downtown Kailua-Kona on Alii Drive our second home is a humble getaway in paradise!

The space
Stay at the ROYAL KAHILI CONDOMINIUMS with a garden and partial ocean view and experience Hawaii kama'aina style! Just 2.5 miles outside of the heart of downtown Kona on Alii Drive, this is a wonderful hideaway for your Hawaiian vacation. Close enough to the action and the beaches but still get to enjoy a quiet neighborhood to relax in when you're not out and about.

With a fully furnished 2bd/2ba condo, all you need is your toothbrush!

Our condo features a full kitchen, living room & dining area, private lanai, air conditioning, ceiling fans, HDTV flat screen satellite tv's in both the living room and master bedroom, full washer & dryer in
neighborhood_overview: Close to the heart of downtown Kona, but far enough away to enjoy the quiet during evenings. Located across the street from the ocean, you're in a residential area close to shops, beaches and the main highway around the island.
host_about:
Our goal as hosts is to provide a comfortable, clean and affordable place to stay in one of our favorite places in the world, the Big Island. The condo is family owned in the heart of Kailua-Kona and we are on call 24/7 during a guest's stay because we understand that not everything happens during business hours and when you're on vacation, you don't want any stress or issues. We offer recommendations on things to do based on the guest's interests as well as fun things we've discovered throughout the years of visiting the island. We want nothing but a wonderful stay for all our guests because that's what we get to experience while booking through airbnb.

Favorite places we've been: Hawaii (the Big Island), Disneyland & World, Toronto, Seattle, San Francisco, Lake Tahoe, San Juan Islands.
Places we'd like to go: Japan, Italy, France, Denmark, Germany, Moscow, Vancouver, New York City, Colorado Rockies, Turkey, India, Morocco, the Dead Sea, Australia, the Islands of the South Pacific and many more!

name: Pili Mai 3L
description:
The sparkling new Pili Mai Resort is an open-skied sanctuary within the popular town of Poipu. Rolling hills of golf course greens surround the estate, while the entrancing Ha’upu Mountains sail into the distant sky. With space to stretch, relax and rejuvenate, this exclusive resort provides privacy, play and close proximity to Poipu Beach and town.

Pili Mai 3L is a 3 bedroom, single level suite on the second story with plantation-style architecture. Newly furnished and decked with Marbau wood floors, koa cabinets, a gourmet kitchen and central A/C, this villa is a fresh find. Revel in an attached one-car garage, mountain view balcony and all the bells and whistles of a brand new tropical vacation rental.
One of the most revered places on earth, Kauai inspires a state of awe within all of us. Brimming with beauty, the oldest inhabitable Hawaiian island has both withstood the test of time and matured into a land of fertile abundance. Lush jungles, white sand beaches
host_about: Kauai Exclusive Management. A locally owned and operated company since 2008. Growing our collection of luxury homes and condos from Hanalei to Poipu! We are always available at 877GOKAUAI and happy to help in any way we can. We look forward to hosting you!

The space
For the lastest COVID-19 travel rules, we invite you to visit the Hawaii COVID-19 website. Please feel free to ask for details.

Pala Hinu Cleaning Services (our cleaning contractor) is dedicated to ensuring that your rental is safe and sanitary. We have evaluated our cleaning practices with the onset of COVID-19 to make sure that we are using the proper chemicals and techniques. Rest assured, we have implemented new procedures that include frequent disinfecting of high-touch areas, linen sanitization, and we have given our staff robust training to ensure that our standards are one of the highest in the industry. host_about:
I am hospitality professional, who genuinely cares about creating great vacation experiences for our guests. Prior to assisting with vacation rentals, I worked for high end, well known hotel chains and private hotels for over 17 years. Hospitality is my passion, to ensure that our guests have a great booking and stay experience is always my priority.  
We offer discounted rental car reservations, travel insurance and concierge services to help you make the most of your Maui vacation. Our team of guest experience specialists consists of Paige, Katrina, Jennifer, Tim, and Andrew. They help me connect, respond and assist our guests 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. I am so proud that we are able to offer warm, friendly, professional and resort quality services in an un-hotel setting for our guests. 
I love to engage in all different forms of art in my spare time, I draw, dance and aspire to play the drums. I love Maui, it would be hard to imagine living at another place, other than paradise.
Mahalo for reading. I hope we get the opportunity to assist you with your next Maui vacation!

Kitchenette comes equipped with everything you may need to have a quick meal in and can comfortably sleep 4 guests. Room can be set up with either 2 twin beds or a king bed plus has a sleeper sofa for extra sleeping space.

neighborhood_overview: Maui’s unique and varied terrain offers a multitude of activities. From relaxing on some of the world’s most beautiful white sand beaches to the more adventurous undertakings of zip-lining and paragliding. Kihei Bay Vista's location is such that there are many activities and attractions right at your finger tips. Some of Maui’s top attractions are: Maalaea Harbor; many boats leave from Maalaea on snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, whale watching (in season), sunset cruises, and more. It is much faster to leave from Maalaea Harbor than Lahaina Harbor when taking trips to Molokini Crater and Turtle Town. Other attractions include Maui Ocean Center, Haleakala Volcano, Shops at Wailea, Iao Valley, Wailea Golf Club, King Kamehameha Golf Club, Maui Tropical Plantation, and the Whale Sanctuary. The town of Kihei is a quant, laid-back beach town boasting some of Maui’s most pristine stretches of white sand and turquoise waters. South Maui is fun for couples and families alike. Y

name: Ground-Floor Pili Mai Condo With Central AC, Shared Pool & Hot Tub, Golf Course
description:
The space
Pili Mai 7H

Ready to experience a new Hawaii? Surrounded by the beautiful Kiahuna Golf Course with views of the mountains and ocean in the distance, Pili Mai is the next big thing in Hawaiian living. With central AC and large common areas, these condos bring you island life at its most modern.

With its spacious interior and beautifully appointed common spaces, Pili Mai 7H is the perfect space for your whole ohana. The two-bedroom, two-and-a-half bathroom home sleeps six. Cook your meals in the gorgeous chef's kitchen and sit down to dinner as a family at the 6-person dining room table. In the evening, catch a movie on the large flatscreen TV in the living room or unwind with a drink on the large plantation-style lanai.

When it's time for sleep, the main bedroom has a luxurious bed, a flatscreen TV, its own lanai, and a spacious en-suite bathroom with double sinks. The guest bedroom has a flatscreen TV, and an en-suite bathroom.
host_about:
Vacasa
Vacation Home Management

Vacasa unlocks the possibilities of how we enjoy vacation homes. We take care of managing our homeowners’ vacation houses so they can have peace of mind (and their home when they want to). And our guests book vacations confidently knowing they’re going to find exactly what they’re looking for without any surprises.

Each vacation home is always cared for by our professional local teams who implement our high cleanliness and maintenance values, while the hands-off tasks of vacation rental management--marketing, filing taxes, and maintaining a website--are handled by a specialized central support team. Our passion and focus remain true: to empower our homeowners, guests, and employees to invest in vacation.

Property is just over 100 yards from one of the nicest beaches on the island. House comes with all the toys you could think of to enjoy. Kayaks, Surf boards, snorkeling gear for the whole group, beach chairs, boogie boards, cooler and more.

2bed/1 bath that sleeps up to 8. There are 2 futons in the living room for additional guests. Full Kitchen with everything you need. Washer&Dryer so you can pack a little lighter. 8 Person hot tub out back next to our tropical koi pond.

The space
Located in the Waimanalo Beach Lots, which is only 20 minutes from Honolulu and Waikiki. Waimanalo Beach is one of the largest, cleanest, and most private beaches on Oahu. This white sand beach is very safe so you can relax and not have to worry as your family enjoys the ocean (No Rocks, No Coral, No Currents, Small Waves). Get away from the hustle and bustle and escape to the pristine beach that you will have all to yourself. Snorkeling, and Surfing are both close by
neighborhood_overview:
Quiet Beach Community. Let the palms and sounds of the ocean lull you to sleep.

We don't allow parties or gatherings. Quiet hours are from 10pm to 8am.

Variety of dinning options close by and countless options within a 10 min drive (Kailua or Hawaii Kai).

Just 25 mins to Waikiki, Honolulu, and the airport but away from the hustle and bustle of that side if the island.

name: Keauhou Poolside - Walk to Harbor/Shopping Center!
description:
Clean and comfortable, Keauhou Poolside is the perfect choice for your Big Island getaway. Located at Keauhou Resort #137, this immaculate one bedroom condo is an ideal home base to return to after a long day of tropical adventures! Walk to the nearby harbor for an ocean dip, or jump in the pool just moments away from your front door! The Keauhou Shopping Center, also within walking distance, is the perfect place to stock up on groceries for a home cooked meal on your lanai!

The space
Keauhou Poolside is a 750 square foot one bedroom condominium featuring a full kitchen, bathroom/shower, living area, and outdoor lanai. It is half of a single story duplex, sharing one wall with the adjacent unit. It has one designated parking space located directly outside the front door.

Other things to note
Bugs: Although we have our space professionally treated for bugs, they will still occasionally find their way inside. Common insects seen throughou
neighborhood_overview:
Keauhou Harbor - Quick 5 minute walk away. Great place to catch a snorkel cruise, spot the dolphins, or rent a kayak!
Keauhou Shopping Center-5-10 minute walk away. KTA Grocery Store, Long's Drug Store, Peaberry and Galette Coffee Shop, Keauhou Movie Theaters, Kanichi Pacific Sushi, Habaneros Mexican Food, L&L Drive In, Urgent Care, book store.
Sam Choy's Restaurant- Great poke and unsurpassed sunset views.
Farmer's Market- Fresh local produce on Saturday's at the Keauhou Shopping Center, and Wednesday's at the nearby Sheraton Hotel.
host_about: Aloha!  We are  Francesca and Kelly, a friendly, fun loving couple who love our Big Island home!  Exploring beautiful, remote beaches is our favorite pastime, and there are no shortage of them in Hawaii.  Our comfortable and peaceful space is the perfect compliment to your Big Island stay!

These modern villas located on the other side of Black Rock from Whaler’s Village. It is conveniently located mere minutes from Lahaina to the south and Kapalua to the north.

offers an abundance of on-site amenities and services. The Spa Heilani Heavenly Spa is combines an East meets West aesthetic with local Hawaiian influences. 13 total treatment rooms are available and in-villa services are also provided. A special “tree house” villa is available for couples who wish to enjoy their massage or treatment while taking in the fresh Hawaiian air and the soothing sounds of the Pacific. The spa is located in the Ocean Resort Villas North Tower phase directly next door to the South phase.

The WORKOUT Fitness Studios are open 24/7 and they feature high quality state-of-the-art fitness equipment. The Villas North and South each have their own fitness center and guests at the resort are welcome to use either fitness center.

description:
Escape to an exotic island surrounded by glistening, white sandy shores, flourishing tropical scenery and intriguing wild life. The symphony of gently lapping waves beckons visitors to explore Maui’s many hidden wonders. Dive down to the depths of the ocean and discover indescribable beauty hiding in the sapphire blue waters. Take a boat cruise on a whale-watching excursion, or survey the diverse landscape on a scenic hike.

The space
1 bedroom scenic view- Discover comfort in our beautifully appointed accommodations featuring a king size bed, sofa bed with Tempurpedic mattress, and full bathroom complete with garden bath and walk-in shower. Enjoy the convenience of the partial kitchen equipped with a refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher and coffee maker among many other modern appliances. Additional in-room amenities include internet, cable television, DVD/Blu-ray player, telephone and a balcony/lanai.

There is a General Excise Tax (GET) and state impos
neighborhood_overview: Escape to an exotic island surrounded by glistening, white sandy shores, flourishing tropical scenery and intriguing wild life. Both bathrooms have shower/tub. Both bedrooms have a Queen bed & portable A/C units. Living room has a din
neighborhood_overview:
South Kihei is a sunny laid back little town with a lot of beautiful and very diverse beaches all in walking distance. This condo is located in the town center so there are lots of cafes, shops, restaurants, bars and open markets all w/in a couple blocks.

Wailea & Makena are only minutes away by car. And it's also a good starting point for travels to the rest of the island.
host_about:
Lisa is a local girl who's an adventurous traveler, enjoys meeting people from all over the world, is environmentally conscious, a total animal lover, and likes being outdoors & doing sports.

Naoise's an Irish guy who likes traveling & the great outdoors too, but also has a love for art, music, movies, social media and fashion.

Our little boy Nainoa is 5 yrs old now and still loves meeting all the guests!  He  spends a lot of time outdoors going beach, and recently started fishing and doing some mountain biking.

We have a new baby girl Lilinoe who just turned one in 2017.  She is adorable and has the cutest personality!  She's more shy than her brother when meeting new people but is very playful after warming up!

Kea is a Japanese Spitz who just likes running around off the leash somewhere outside and eating really good food!  She loves people too!  

Together, when we have the time, we have fun taking guests to our favorite spots on Maui or enjoy having them over for a hibachi (BBQ)!

name: Oceanfront Bali House w/ Hot tub @ Kehena Beach
description:
Aloha and E Komo Mai!

Take an Incredible Break from Reality and Enjoy Blissful Ocean Breezes and Relaxation Beyond Compare! Break away from the Hustle and Bustle of your routine and lose yourself in the serenity of Big Island and all it has to offer!

Unwind at Balinese House less than 150 ft. Kehena Clothing optional Black Beach. Enjoy the stunning unobstructed oceanfront views of Kehena Bay from this Bali retreat home to Spinner dolphins and humpback whales!

The space
Aloha!

Take an Incredible Break from Reality and Enjoy Blissful Ocean Breezes and Relaxation Beyond Compare! Break away from the Hustle and Bustle of your routine and lose yourself in the serenity of Big Island and all it has to offer!

Unwind at this very Romantic and Authentic Bali House located less than 150 ft. from the World famous “Kehena Black Sand Beach”! This Beautiful Bali Home has unobstructed Oceanfront Views of Kehen
neighborhood_overview:
Aloha !

Kehena Beach Estates is a small coastal community that is the closest one to Kehena Black sand beach ( clothing optional), no other subdivision is closer. We enjoy constant easterly trade winds and amazing sunrises! Kehena beach just across the street 150 ft away down the cliff. Pahoa is about 20 min away for groceries, restaurants, shopping. post office, urgent care, surf shops and more. Hilo is about 40 min away. Volcano National Park, were you can the active lava flow from Kilauea is only a 40 drive away! We live in a tropical climate and our gardens are lush and and green so we do have tree frogs, geckos and bugs, it is just part of Hawaiian living.

Our neighborhood is beautiful and enjoys sunny days and rains mostly at night. We all have beautiful gardens with a variety of native plants and our homes are all unique and beautiful. Our neighbors are very nice and welcoming. On Sundays from 11-4, we attract many visitors from all over the island to
host_about:
As a Native Hawaiian,  we love and call the Big Island  our Home. We  love hosting Guest from all over the World and love sharing our little piece of Paradise to all and treat  all our Guest like our own Ohana. Come and stay with us .. at The Bali House  and Cottage. We are located at Kehena Beach Estates,  a beautiful coastal community on the Puna Coast on the eastside  of Island.  Experience first hand our Aloha Spirit and Hawaiian Hospitality!

Aloha and E Komo Mai!

name: Luana Kai Oceanfront Condo by Owner
description:
Luana Kai, C208 is a one-bedroom non-air-conditioned unit located in Kihei, Maui, Hawaii. The price listed does not include the 17.42% Tax.

The space
The Luana Kai is spread spaciously on the beach between S. Kihei Road and the Pacific Ocean. This four-building oceanfront complex is beautifully landscaped with flowering trees, local tropical plants and lush gardens.

The pool and hot tub are surrounded by 5 gas barbecues allowing you to dine while enjoying the spectacular sunsets and quiet tropical breezes. During whale season, December through April, Humpback Whales are often seen breaching in the ocean waters along the Waipuilani Beach Park at the Luana Kai.

Our non-air-conditioned garden front unit is a deluxe one-bedroom condo with ocean views located on the second floor. Included with the unit is a full kitchen, full-size washer & dryer, one bedroom with queen-size bed and an additional queen sleeper sofa in the living room allowing f
host_about:
Anne & I are both retired.  I spent 36 years in the New York City Fire Department and retired as a captain in 2004.  Anne spent 18 years working for Pan Am Airlines and stopped working for them after we had our second daughter. 
While working for the airlines we did a lot of traveling and our favorite place was Hawaii, Maui in particular, so in 1989 we decided to purchase a condo at the Luana Kai in Kihei.

description:
This amazing resort has it all. Set on 22 acres of lushly landscaped beach front property, the Hilton has married the best of Hawaiian culture with world class amenities you expect from the Hilton name. Your room has a stunning view. The attention to detail make your stay relaxing the the moment you arrive.

The space
You'll feel right at home in Hilton Hawaiian Village's luxurious one bedroom suite. Your suite will have a coffeemaker, TV, MP3 connection Hilton alarm clock, PlayStation 3, an in-room safe, a full kitchen, dining area, expanded living area and one fully-furnished bedroom! Complimentary high-speed internet service is available resort wide.

This amazing Hilton complex boasts a 5,000 square foot aquatic playground, hosting Waikiki's longest water slide. The Duke Kahanamoku salt-water Lagoon is a spectacular oasis amidst this resort. There is a two-tiered heated, freshwater swimming pool, four slides including a 77-foot lava tube slide, three
neighborhood_overview: Oahu has no shortage of activities and attractions that are nothing short of unforgettable! If you are able to tear yourself away from the resort for a day, experience Hawaii by air with Island Seaplane Service, the only air tour in all of Hawaii. Or, explore the waters surrounding the island with Atlantis Submarines - an entirely different but just as amazing view. Within the surrounding area, a wide variety of other adventures await your discovery, including scuba diving, snorkeling, golf, hiking trails and abundant cultural riches.

Enjoy fantastic sunsets, refreshing tropical breezes & sound of the tides lapping the Ka'anapali shore ♡. Kitchenette and Large Bathroom. Sleeps 4 comfortably; 1 King bed + 1 Sofa Bed in Living Room with Tempur-Pedic mattress. Pool area, Fitness studio, laundry facilities & restaurant on-site. Close to Lahaina town with lots of shopping & dining options.

Comfortably Sleeps 4 (or up to 5) adults or children—there is a King bed in the private bedroom and a Sofa bed with Tempur-Pedic mattress in living room. Normal retail rates on these Deluxe Ocean View suites are betw
neighborhood_overview: Shopping mall with supermarket, delis, shops and restaurants is only 2 blocks away.  Duke's Beach House restaurant is just a 150 yards from the lobby.
host_about:
We're a happy couple living in an amazing large estate in Seattle. We visit Hawaii a couple times a year, sometimes with our kids and grandkids. Our beautiful timeshares in Kaanapali, Maui (near Lahaina) are The WESTIN KAANAPALI OCEAN RESORT (STUDIO, 1-BRM or 2-BRM)  and The KAANAPALI BEACH CLUB (1-BRM OCEAN VIEW or 1-BRM OCEAN FRONT). 

We have lifetime 5-Star Elite Platinum status with Starwood/WESTIN (the highest possible) as well as similar lifetime Elite Centum Platinum status  with Diamond Resorts/KAANAPALI BEACH CLUB.  As a result, if you book any of our MAUI timeshares, you share in the many special perks we have as owners at both Resorts including (subject to availability) early check-in, late check-out, best possible room locations plus there are no resort fees and parking is always free.

If you do not find the dates you would like on our MAUI listings, please email us and tell us the dates you would prefer (but try to do so at least 8-13 months in advance to be certain of availability (since West Maui is so much in demand now days).

In addition, in Seattle we have two very popular Airbnb units at our large Estate Home both with sunset views:  
#1 SEATTLE LUXURY ESTATE ROMANTIC SEAVIEW 1-BRM GUESTHOUSE
#2 SEATTLE LUXURY ESTATE ROMANTIC SEAVIEW SUITE
 
Contact me ASAP with any questions or to book!

name: Nature Cottage at Hawaiian Retreat
description:
Surrounded by fruit trees in the east Hawaii jungle our unique self contained cottage provides a back to nature experience. The cabin is private, cozy, with one wall screened it gives the feeling of being outside. Come join us on our farm retreat! Enjoy our organic produce!
We are off-grid (no hairdryers) and certified organic, so no pesticides are used here. We share nature with a symphony of other critters!
Wi Fi is available at the Main Lodge from 9am to 9pm.

The space
Our Nature Cottage is a perfect get away. Romantic, rustic and located in an orchard on our larger organic farm. Queen bed, frig, 2 burner stove, private watercloset, outdoor private Hot shower. All natural woods, ALL solar power, the windows and screens let you live in nature here! Fresh fruit basket upon arrival. Farm stand next door.

Check-in hours are from 4pm to 6pm.
A grace period may be extended to 8pm.
Strictly NO check ins permitted past 8pm.
neighborhood_overview:
It is fun, always entertaining…yet calm, 6 acres to roam. Close to the ocean, good swimming at the warm pond…..
You should drive the coast down to Uncle Robert's and the new beach, roam the lava a bit, enjoy the beauty. Many nice places to stop and enjoy the coastline for a moment…..
host_about:
Steve and Janelle keep a casual Puna lifestyle and run an 6 acre organic farm while you enjoy your visit to the Big Island.
  Janelle is a chef and can cook for any size group. She prefers to feature the crops from the farm and has many years of experience to draw upon. The farm has a booth locally6 on Wednesday nights at a farmers market where eating dinner is the main feature, along with the great music!
   Our home and cottages are a sanctuary and we strive to love all, serve all.  This is an adventure for many and sometimes the beginning of a journey…….

name: Yurt
description:
Aloha,
Isle Of You Naturally is a clothing optional 70 acre private organic fruit farm and retreat.Come enjoy one of the largest naked spaces available in Hawaii.
For the well seasoned nudists or for those that would like to try it .
Mahalo

The space
Hey, want to stay someplace real for your next vacation. You can check in with us at
The Isle of You Naturally; a naturist eco farm and retreat. Really forget about answering your cell phone here because, well, we don’t get reception! Really forget about having to plug into email at every moment because, well, no internet connection either. Get it yet? REALLY HAWAII!
Note: whatever you need is only 7 miles away ! Book for 7 nights get the 8th free! www.isleofyounaturally.com
neighborhood_overview: very rural single lane road with various farms
host_about:
a decade ago,  my husband bailed on the mainland and all its stress to buy a 70 acre farm on the Big Island near Pahoa. We are a working farm located on the east side of the island of Hawaii, about 30 min south of Hilo on the Puna Coast, close to the quaint village of Pahoa.
We spend our days tending to gardens, the fruit orchards, maybe a day at the local black sand beach called Kehena, playing volleyball or just watching sunsets.
Our guests tend to be outdoor types who love to be in nature.  We invite you up for coffee if you'd like or you can hang by yourself and we'll ignore you if that's what you want.  Then you'll be in your own little paradise and only contacting us when you need info or want to chat.
A couple of mottos to live by include:
'Ua mau ke ea o ka'aina i ka pono o Hawaii'  -- The life of the land in Hawaii is preserved in righteousness.
'Aloha mai no, aloha aku; o ka huhu ka mea e ola ' ole ai' ---When love is given, love should be returned; anger is the thing that gives no life.

name: Volcano Forest Escape 3BDRM Rental House
description:
The Volcano Forest Escape is for people who want more out of life than the busy side of the island. It's within a 5 minute drive to the Volcanoes National Park, and 40 minutes to the famous black sand beach. House is full of beds, upgrades & charm.

The space
Spread out and enjoy this 3 BR/2BA house on a 1/2 acre. This is a great way to beat the heat and enjoy summertime in Hawaii or come during winter to see snow at the tops of Mauna Loa and/or Mauna Kea. This house is at a 3,700 foot elevation, with cool temperatures and in the middle of a native Hawaiian forest full of blossoming Ohia trees and giant fern trees. Just a mile from Volcanoes National Park, you'll find this park to be one of the most unique national parks with many displays, hiking trails, lava tubes, steam & sulfur vents. You can see how fresh lava covers the land and the process of nature and plants taking it back. There's a multitude of things to do within a 30-45 minute drive of this house - se
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is friendly and very quiet since homes are spaced fairly wide and in a forest type setting.
host_about: I love living in Hawaii and enjoying everything there is here. The culture, the people, the land and living aloha. It's been a fabulous 34 years so far. I like to entertain friends and family at home, at the beach or out on the town. I enjoy cooking (love to BBQ), being active in sports and other social activities.

name: Sunny condo, community pool-walk to the beach!
description:
This quiet, sunny, ground-floor condo in Napili Ridge features tile throughout, granite counter tops in the kitchen, and a large shower. The kitchen & bathroom are stocked with everything you need. Walk to a grocery store, coffee shops, many restaurants, and Napili Bay. It's great for snorkeling, body boarding, stand-up paddling, and relaxing. The condo's pool area has a grill with tools and a picnic table. Plus, you'll have your own parking spot, on-site laundromat, and a Smart TV.

The space
You'll have the whole place to yourself! Napili Ridge is a quiet community, and many of my neighbors are full-time residents. If quiet hours aren't adhered to (between 10 PM and 8 AM), I'll hear about it.

Though four guests are welcome, the pull-out couch is most comfortable for just one adult or two little ones.

Other things to note
The price of the condo includes Hawaii's general excise and transient accommodations taxes.

The un
host_about:
My husband and I live and work in Scotts Valley California, which is right next to Santa Cruz, CA.  We have a 12 year old son and 2 rescue puppies and we just had a little baby boy!  We love the beach city life and is our dream to retire in Hawaii, so we bought a little condo in Maui and we couldn't be more thrilled!! 

Besides being obsessed with all animals, especially dogs, we are sci-fi and star nerds. We love Star Trek, astronomy and the outdoors.  And since we have a 12 year old boy we also spend a lot of time playing Legos and watching Marvel movies.

name: ICC 20 Fully Remodeled Hawaiian Cottage Walk to Airport Beach & Steps to the Pool!
description:
ICC 20 Fully Remodeled Hawaiian Cottage Walk to Airport Beach & Steps to the Pool!

The space
International Colony Club 20 is a charming, rustic plantation style cottage in Kaanapali is the perfect place to completely unplug and relax, or treat as your home base for all the daytime and nighttime activities of West Maui! With a wall-to-wall renovation in 2019, the cottage has an open living concept that also combines the indoor and outdoor spaces.

Condo Highlights:
-2 Bedroom, 2 bathroom cottage sleeps 6
-King bed in master bedroom
-Queen and bunk bed (twins) in second bedroom
-Spacious open concept living space with Roku Smart TV
-Sleeper-sofa in living space
-Split zone AC
-Fully equipped kitchen with granite countertops
-Indoor dining table for 6
-Large patio with comfortable furniture and custom outdoor surfboard shower
-Outdoor gas BBQ grill
-Custom outdoor surfboard shower
-In-unit washer/
host_about:
Vacation Rental Management, Property Management, Asset Management, Real Estate Sales and Financial Analysis on  real estate.

We give our pledge to you to make your vacation on Maui as easy and pleasurable as possible. We understand that vacationing with your family and friends is a time for memories, rest, and vital rejuvenation.

We provide the support and peace of mind for your ultimate vacationing experience on Maui.
Link to all our listings:  https://airbnb.com/users/15820446/listings 

We are especially empathetic for our Vacationers.  We are not perfect but we do try hard.  We are all local to Maui and try to represent the Aloha Spirit.

We have discovered for ourselves the pleasure of vacationing in this paradise called: Maui.  All of us came here many years ago, drawn to the mystique and spectacular beauty of the Island. Our satisfaction grows each time we are able to provide that special place our vacationers have worked for and dreamed of for so long. This is truly a marvelous business, and we give thanks each day for this wonderful opportunity.

name: Custom-Built Kona Coast Home - Mins to Magic Sands
description:
Escape to the Aloha State in style with this spacious 3-bedroom, 3-bath vacation rental home, perched high on the Kona coast with stunning views of Kailua Bay. Located just minutes from popular beaches like Magic Sands and Kahalu’u, this home provides easy access to swimming, snorkeling, kayaking, and turtle watching! Drive into Kona or Keauhou for an oceanfront dinner, or taste the local flavors as you tour one of the nearby coffee plantations. There's truly something for everyone here!

The space
*NOTE: Rates have been lowered for Iron Man during a week in October*
*NOTE: This is a hosted rental*

3,186 Sq Ft | Stunning Ocean Views | Beach/Snorkel Gear Provided

Custom-designed with comfort in mind, this island home is just minutes from Kona town attractions, making it the perfect choice for families and friends seeking a quiet retreat with easy access to fun in the sun.

Master Bedroom: California Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Calif
neighborhood_overview:
BEACHES: Magic Sands Beach Park (2.2 miles), Kailua Beach (4.8 miles), Manini’owali Beach (16.8 miles), Mahai'ula Beach (15.2 miles)
SNORKELING: Kahalu’u Beach Park (2.9 miles), Kamakahonu (King Kam) Beach (3.9 miles), Kealakekua Bay (13.3 miles), Pae'a Beach (19.2 miles)
KAILUA-KONA (3.5 miles): shopping, oceanfront dining, golf, tennis, theaters, nightlife, deep sea fishing charters, snorkel cruises, outrigger paddling, kayaking, swimming, parasailing
PARKS/TRAILS: Walua Trail (1.5 miles), Old Kona Airport State Recreation Area (4.7 miles), Mauna Kea Summit & Observatory (66.4 miles), Volcanoes National Park (78.4 miles)
COFFEE FARMS: Heavenly Hawaiian Kona Coffee Farms (5.3 miles), Hula Daddy Kona Coffee LLC (7.4 miles), Mountain Thunder Coffee Plantation (11.6 miles), Sunshower Coffee (4.8 miles), Holualoa Kona Coffee Co (3.1 miles)
AIRPORT: Kona International Airport (12.0 miles)
host_about:
Hi! We’re Evolve, the hospitality team that helps you rest easy when you rent a private, professionally cleaned home from us.

We promise your rental will be clean, safe, and true to what you saw on Airbnb or we'll make it right. Check-ins are always smooth, and we're here 24/7 to answer any questions or help you find the perfect property.

name: Cute Hale Sugar Shack 2
description:
Great location on the Kona Coast, not far from town but in the country. Near west side beaches, snorkeling and Spinner Dolphins, City of Refuge National Park, Captain Cooks Monument Trail head, Hookena Beach 5 miles south. Rate does not include 15% GE and TA Hawaii tax. Tax #103-593-5744-01. Guests arrange payment after arrival or by arrangement prior to departure.

The space
A Shack but not rustic! The Cute Hale Sugar Shack 2 is a furnished, 1/1 private, Kona coffee shack in a country setting. Wi-Fi. Large screen TV. Garden views with bamboo, jade vine, fruit trees. Nice hardwood floors, wireless internet, travertine bathroom, kitchenette with hot plate, micro-convection oven, refrig/freezer. A restful garden setting, outdoor fire pit, and carport. Stay a month or 2, (lower rate available). We have all the comforts you need on a tropical isle. Private porch and patio. Includes Q bed luxe, nice bathroom, ample seats in LVR, dine in kitchenette or take out.
<
neighborhood_overview:
The Kona Coast has all the sunny side, sandy beaches, rumbly upcountry towns, and easy-going downtown eateries and restaurants. We are in upcountry Captain Cook. Approx 35 minutes south of the airport and 20 from town, up in elevation(cooler temps and gentle afternoon rains) in the Kona Coffee region. We are in the Kealakekua Bay region, and Ke'ei is the district. Our grounds are home to a few occasional dogs, and a cat named Pong. Also wild trespassers in the form of Boar.

Please note adjacent to the Shack 2 is another barn structure, a man cave, operational wood shop. (8am-5pm on occasion). We are also a working farm with laborers picking mac nuts and coffee when in season. They have day hours are are respectful of our guests.

The houses are separate and situated across and down from one another. There is garden space and three acres to enjoy. Seasonal lemon, avocado, banana, papaya, passion fruit (lilikoi) pineapple, mountain apples, and other fruits can be enj
host_about: We are a wife and husband couple in our early 60's, parents of 3 splendid adults, all living in the Hawaii island chain. We share the love of communication and hospitality with world travelers in this tropical landscape. Living and working in paradise, we support a large animal family, and  grow infamous Kona coffee cherries(beans) in late summer. We also grow Macadamias, Jack fruit, Bread Fruit(Ulu), avocados, citrus, and enough bananas to keep us in pies, bread, and smoothies all year! Currently we support the Ulu Cooperative locally, where they turn bread fruits into gluten free flour, and have created fresh to freezer bags of several local (meatless) food staples. They are available now in the freezer section at Longs CVS. We welcome your interest and questions, and to stay here in our Hawaii home. Join us!

Welcome to this spacious, two story ground floor entrance townhome at Kuilima Estates at Turtle Bay.

We are legal Short Term rental, in a resort zoning

If you are a Pickleball lover, we have recently added Pickleball to our 2 sports courts!

Located in a private community, surrounded by lush and tropical setting. Great for a family vacation. A short stroll to the beautiful Turtle Bay beaches, restaurants and activities. Free and fast wifi, free parking.

TA-110-565-3760-01

The space
You can watch the golfers from the open lanai while you enjoy meals you have prepared in the fully stocked and remodeled kitchen with microwave, coffee maker, and most everything you need to cook with. The kitchen features bar style dining and there is a table and chairs on the lanai overlooking the golf the golf course. Great for a family gathering

This two story ground floor unit features a bedroom with king bed on the ground flo
neighborhood_overview: Within a short walk you'll find the gorgeous Turtle Bay Hotel, location for the filming of several popular films. Amazing facilities including five restaurants, horseback riding, miles of walking trails, snorkeling, surfing, scuba, helicopter tours, and of course great beaches which will provide you with endless opportunities for fun and relaxation. The hotel is not affiliated with the condo complex at Kuilima Estates however you may eat at the hotel restaurants and you are welcome to use the spa, public beaches and walking paths to the right of the hotel. You will be happy to know that beach parking is free should you decide to drive instead of walk. Please be aware that the hotel pool is reserved for hotel guests only. However there are three very nice pools (as well as tennis courts) on the condo grounds. Golfers appreciate the Palmer Championship Course and the Fazio Course with its discounted rates after 4:00 pm.

name: RAINBOWS IN PARADISE
description:
One Bedroom Garden View

The space
PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE DESCRIPTION & DETAILS BEFORE CONTACT US.

Welcome to our Island home. Complex is located right on the beach where you can swim and snorkel with the turtles and tropical fishes in a protected by a coral reef. This Garden view unit is located on the ground floor.
A grassy lawn fronts the beach with views of Molokai and Lanai, where you can enjoy your morning coffee or your afternoon cocktail. The whales keep you entertained from mid November through April and the sunsets are amazing.
The pool and hot tub are just steps away from our cozy unit which catches the cool and refreshing trade windswept, directly overlooks the picturesque koi pond and waterfalls surrounded by lush tropical vegetation. Honokowaii beach park is right next door.

The place in Ka'anapali coast (Honokowai) is located in one of the most convenient areas in W. Maui, between Lahaina and Kapalua, short drive t

Aloha & Welcome to Maui Sunset A108!

The Maui beach experience you are searching for is right here! The ultimate in relaxing comfort and style less than 100 steps to the beach!!!

The space
Experience one of the best condos Maui Sunset has to offer! This unit is less than 100 steps from the beach! This lovely one bedroom/two bath unit sleeps up to 4 people (2 adults & 2 children). It has one King bed in the master bedroom and two Murphy beds in the living room. The unit boasts a fully equipped kitchen to meet your cooking needs, cable TV, luxurious linens, free Wi-Fi and local phone service, a private lanai, and many more surprises that will make your stay extraordinary.

This condo is spacious and gives you easy access to all that the Maui Sunset complex has to offer. This property features an immaculately kept lawn area, a swimming pool, hot tub, several professional-grade BBQ grills, lovely dining areas, and on-site parking! The complex is

name: Hawaii Life Rentals presents Penthouse / Spectacul
description:
Enjoy the 180 degree unobstructed lanai view. Ocean view on the west side to Haleakala on the east side. Watch surfers, sunsets and whales during the season, and enjoy sunrise over Haleakala from this two bedroom, 6th floor penthouse that sleeps four.

The space
This condo has a double-sized lanai, perfect for sipping your morning coffee while watching the sunrise, relaxing with a good book or visiting with family/friends, and don't forget the sunsets! Whale season runs mid Dec to mid April, enjoy whales sightings from the lanai.

All the comforts of home including comfortable beds, A/Cs in living room and master bedroom, and a large flat screen TV in the living room. The master bedroom also has a TV.

Enjoy meals prepared in this fully stocked kitchen with all appliances including a new oven and refrigerator. Also, new commodes recently installed in the bathrooms, and new curtains in the first bedroom.

Easily walk to rest
neighborhood_overview: Environmental Disclosure. Guest acknowledges that the State of Hawaii is exposed to environmental hazards including, but not limited to, tidal waves, hurricanes and floods. Please refer to the local phone book for information pertaining to evacuation procedures. In the event of an emergency, the State of Hawaii utilizes a warning alert system (emergency sirens are tested on the first working day of every month at 11:45 a.m.). Guest is responsible for using their best efforts to familiarize themselves with property, its location, and surroundings. Some of the properties are in a remote location. As such, what would be considered normal response time for public services in an urban area may not be available in this location, i.e., police, fire, and emergency services. name: Perfect Space @ Maui's Best Beach - 2bd/2ba
description:
Fully renovated in the first half of 2019, this is the brightest and cleanest condo in Kihei. Just a few hundred feet from Kamaole III, one of Maui's best beaches, you are only a one minute walk from your door to the sand. Enjoy the comfortable living room, listen to the surf from the lanai, or cook a meal in our chef friendly kitchen. The unit has space for five, so share with the family!

The space
We are excited to offer our piece of paradise to you and your family. We have had so many great family memories on Maui, that we decided to buy our own place and share it with others. In order to protect ourselves and our renters, we went through the process and are excited to offer you a legally registered Airbnb unit, so you know that you'll be safe and secure. Hawaii is working to protect guests and resources by working to make sure short term rentals are legal, please don’t hesitate to ask any potential unit owner if they’re registered!

Our space
neighborhood_overview:
Kihei is one of Maui's best places to visit - it isn't overrun by large resorts and chain restaurants. Come and experience true aloha spirit in a place big enough to have everything you need but small enough that people will remember you.

There are great breakfasts at Kihei Caffe and the Cinnamon Roll Place. Lunch or dinner at Maui Taco or Coconuts are always quick treats. Take a longer dinner at Maui Brewing Company or even Monkeypod a couple miles away in Wailea. After dinner feel free to stop at Cones on Kihei.

name: Oceanfront 2BR/2BA Townhouse + Pool
description:
This is a beautiful 2 Bedrooom / 2 Bath townhouse directly on the oceanfront at the Keauhou Kona Surf & Racquet Club. This is a gated community with 3 lighted tennis courts (tennis pro available), swimming pool, and community BBQ & picnic areas. NOTE: There is no air conditioning in the unit. There is a nice breeze from the ocean with the windows open and each bedroom has a ceiling fan and a stand-up fan, if desired. At night it can be cool with the ceiling fan and you might need a blanket!

The space
Since it is located directly on the oceanfront there is the possibility of the lanai being closed off when the civil defense issues a high surf warning. The complex management will close up the lanai area to protect the townhouse from the surf.

Are you looking for a special place, with an unsurpassed oceanfront location and view? ... Look no further...You've found it all at Keauhou-Kona Surf and Racquet Club Townhouse #186!

Keauhou-Kon
neighborhood_overview:
On our very first visit to the Big Island of Hawaii we absolutely fell in love with this magical island. We rented a townhouse in Keauhou Kona Surf and Racquet Club right next to this one and so enjoyed the peace and scenery of the place that we were fortunate to purchased this townhouse before we left the island.

The Unique Benefits at this Townhome:
If you're a very light sleeper you might want to bring ear plugs because the sound of the ocean waves never ceases at this place! The master bedroom, living room and lanai look unobstructed over 2,500 miles of unbroken Pacific Ocean, the waves of which break not even 50 feet from your door. There is a poem by Rachel Lyman Field that says "If once you have slept on an island You'll never be quite the same". That experience is what you will find here!

There are two large, wall mounted, flat panel TVs.

Endless Summer Maui is totally loaded with everything you will need to enjoy your Maui vacation at the best possible price. neighborhood_overview:
Maui has been voted the "Best Island in the World" for over 23 years. With daytime temperatures ranging from roughly 85 degrees F during the winter, it's easy to see why Maui is such a popular destination choice and the #1 island in the world.

Here’s why I think the South side of the island (where Kihei is located) is the best place to stay. South Maui really has it all! ;)

The sunny South shores of Kihei offer 6 miles of popular, sun kissed beaches with warm, balmy days and cool, tropical nights.

Typically, humidity levels in Kihei are VERY LOW and the annual rainfall in Kihei is LESS than anywhere else on island. :)

Kihei is a sizable beach town with plenty of places to eat and fun things to do. Kihei is definitely the hub for Maui surf lessons and is considered the true pivoting point for all of Maui’s popular outdoor activities.

Most of the accommodation options in Kihei will be condos with full kitchens (enabling you
host_about:
Aloha from Maui!

Congratulations on your decision to book a vacation in sunny Maui, Hawaii; the #1 island in the world for over 25 years.  :)

I would be honored to help you choose accommodations in Maui that fit your needs, desires, and budget. 

As a full-time resident on Maui for over 15 years, I am very familiar with all that this wonderful Island has to offer.  I absolutely love my job as both an owner and property manager of vacation rentals on Maui.  The fact that I get to help others plan their Hawaiian vacation and/or relocation to the magical island of Maui is literally the icing on top of the cupcake!

If you are wanting to purchase property on Maui, I am a licensed realtor in the State of Hawai'i, own a property management company in Maui, and am also a certified Home Staging Expert.  I would love to speak with you and answer any questions you might have about vacation rentals on Maui.

In addition to managing lots of amazing properties directly across the street from the awesome, sun kissed beaches of south Maui, I am also the proud owner of my own vacation rentals.   The condos I own are called Tracy’s Tropical Treasures.  They are listed on Airbnb as Tracy's Tropical Treasure #1 (Ocean View), Tracy's Tropical Treasure #2 (Corner Penthouse), Tracy's Tropical Treasure #3 (Ocean View), and my newest addition, Paradise Awaits You! Tracy's Tropical Treasure #4 (Ocean View, Central A.C., and double pane windows, so no road noise inside the condo).  *Tracy’s Tropical Treasure #3 and Paradise Awaits You! Tracy's Tropical Treasure #4 both house up to 4 guests.  :)

Tracy’s Tropical Treasures were Named the #1 Vacation Rentals in all of Maui in 2016.

In November, 2019, I was RANKED #1 again.  ;)

In July of 2022, I was ranked #1 in Kihei for the fourth time.

I have worked very hard for these achievements and on every single occasion, it was one of the best days of my life when I received confirmation that I had won the award.  

I look forward to speaking with you, helping you with your Maui vacation/relocation, and sharing my ALOHA spirit.  I have been in the hospitality industry for over 25 years, and it's really how I choose to live my life.  Pampering guests is my #1 priority!  

* With well over 1000 bookings on the 4 rentals I personally own, I am extremely proud and take great pride in the fact that I have so many wonderful reviews.  Please feel free to check out all the reviews on Airbnb for the proof.   Customer Service is very important to me!

I am also very proud that I have been with Airbnb since 2009 and have also been a "SUPERHOST” since the program was created.  In July of 2022, I earned Superhost status for the 33rd consecutive time.  

Airbnb is, without a doubt, the BEST vacation rental platform of all!  

When Airbnb was first created, I was one of only eight listings in all of Maui.  My claim to fame is that Brian Chesky, himself, actually called me.  Brian is one of the three Airbnb founders.  Back then, I had also listed my car on Airbnb, and Brian said I was the first person to ever list a car on his platform.  He thought it was interesting, and we had a very nice telephone conversation.

By the end of 2020, Maui had over 18,000 vacation rental listings.  The Airbnb platform has grown exponentially.  I am truly honored to be a part of it all; both as an owner and as a property manager and will continue to tell everyone how wonderful Airbnb is for hosts and travelers alike.

Everybody, no matter where they are, can live ALOHA.  Maui is a great way to unlock the positive spirit within all of us.....

Make it a great day!
Tracy O'Reilly R(S)
~ Owner of Tracy’s Tropical Treasures #1 through #4 (these are my personal vacation rentals which were Named the #1 Vacation Rentals in all of Maui for both 2016 and 2019, and then named #1 in Kihei in July of 2022 for the fourth time)
~ Hawai’i Realtor 
(Licensed on all Islands)
License #73694
~ Property Manager/Island Contact for other vacation rentals in South Maui

*Please note, this home is not suited for those who have mobility challenges.

The space
This impressive home consists of three bedrooms, three baths, and 3,289 Sq Ft. of living space siting on pristine 2.5 acres of white sand beach frontage area. Moloa'a Bay was the site location for the TV pilot of "Gilligan's Island". Here is where the USS Minnow and its crew originally shipwrecked. This may be as close as you will come to living on Gilligan's Island. Here is everything you ever dreamed Kauai to be! A perfect crescent sand beach and turquoise waters. Mystical Moloa'a Bay is located on the North East side of Kauai. Truly "Off-The-Beaten-Path" giving one the sense of an exclusive & genuine experience of the REAL Hawaii.

Home is fully air conditioned. A wrap-around deck provides 2nd floor views o

Want more action? Walk down to Waikiki beach or Kapiolani Park for surfing, swimming or jogging. Take the bus (bus stop adjacent to unit) to any location on the island!!! (Hanauma Bay, Pearl Harbor, North Shore or Diamond Head Crater to name just a few)
host_about: Long time resident of Hawaii. Vacationed here in college back in 1978...loved it....and decided to move and make Hawaii home. Now retired and own/manage 5 great studios at the Marine Surf where I get to meet lots of great people from all over the world!

name: HawaiianJungleHangout
description:
Make this hawaiian home, bordering serene Makuu Homestead, surrounded by a natural lava rainforest your special retreat.

Three miles from the ocean, and a mile from the main highway, Hawaiian Jungle Hangout offers easy access to eastside highlights--40 minutes from Pohoiki bay (black sand beach with warm springs/part of the 870 acres added from 2018 fissure 8 lava flow), 35 minutes from Volcano National Park, 20 minutes from Hilo airport, 10 minutes from Keaau town, and 10 minutes from Pahoa.

The space
The hangout offers 1600 sq. feet of living space. A full kitchen, two bedrooms, plus a den which has a sleeper sofa that opens to a full round, in a comfortable home in a natural lava rainforest. Explore the garden within lava rock flows. A memorable place to make your home during your vacation stay.

Other things to note
I do like to know guests staying at the home and will ask full names and ages.
host_about: Since venturing to the Big Island 20 years ago, I've always been drawn to the volcano, warm springs, and rainforest. As a documentary photographer for over two decades, the dozen different microclimates delight in an ever changing offering of surreal landscapes, diversity of character and faces, exotic/colorful fauna, and island politics, gives a profuse array of visual opportunities and is a photographer's paradise. I feel fortunate to have a home located minutes from all my favorite sites and love having the opportunity to share the experience.

Aloha,
Sit back & enjoy a favorite drink on a comfortable lanai, looking out to the ocean & watching a beautiful sunset. The condo is across the street (About 350 ft. ) from a mile long, soft sandy beach. Fully equipped & comfy 1 bdrm condo. Walk to a health food store, good restaurants, bakery & shops.

(IMPORTANT INFORMATION - 17.42% - Maui County (3%), HAWAII STATE (4%) & (10.42%) TRANSIENT ACCOMMODATION TAXES are NOT included in the Airbnb price and payable directly to owner.)

The space
(Important info-17.42% Hawaii State & Transient taxes are not included in the Airbnb price)

Aloha,
You are invited to stay and enjoy this marvelously located condo across from Kamaole Beach Park 1 in Sunny South Kihei. It is said to be "one of the best white beaches in Maui". A great way to start the day is to take a morning stroll or run along the one mile sandy beach.

Come back later to swim, sunbathe, snorkel or boogie board
neighborhood_overview:
What I love about the neighborhood is the beautiful ocean across the street! It's warm and refreshing. You can see turtles at times and it's wonderful to stroll and watch beautiful sunsets.
There is a health food store near by, as well as good restaurants, bagel & coffee shop, gelato and lots of shops very close by all within easy walking distance.
host_about:
Aloha,
I live in Kihei, Maui.   I love Maui and the ocean!  Especially  since the  water is warm year around, so I snorkel, swim, kayak, paddle and dive.  I also love to hike.  There are some great waterfall hikes here. 
 My job is a corporate meeting planner and travel director, which I love to do.  
If you want to know places to snorkel or hikes, I'll be happy to share the special places with you!

name: Kona, Ocean View House. Just 1 mile from the beach
description:
It's all about the view for starters. One of the best views of the ocean and Kailua Kona on the entire Big Island. Just a mile up from the beach and town center. I love to jog (downhill) mornings right to the beach and view spinner dolphins right there in the bay. This house is so convenient to shopping, restaurants, and the pier. It is quite charming and comfortable. Only 15 minutes from the airport too.

The space
All the best water sports are on this side of the island. Kayaking, snorkeling, surfing parasailing are just a few minutes away. Book island tours right at the pier or online.

We have air conditioning in each bedroom and ceiling fans through out however there is no central air in the common areas of our home. Most Hawaiians don't have a.c.. preferring to spend their time outdoors rather than in. Open up all the windows and let the cool breezes come through.

Guest access
The entire home is available for your us
neighborhood_overview: This is a family neighborhood that's very quiet and you'll enjoy your privacy.  We have a second story view from a single level home.  No stairs!
host_about: Jan and I love the Big Island and are part time residents. We have 3 grand children in Arizona. Though new to hosting, we have loved sharing our island home and the wonders of Kona with our guests.  Island living is amazing!

host_about:
Kaha Lani Resort vacation rentals in Lihue are one of Kauai’s best-kept secrets!

Our condominiums bring you prime views of Kauai’s oceanfront. Think swaying palm trees, fine white sand, and dreamy ocean blues. Spend your days sun-kissed at our heated swimming pool and sundeck or snorkel at Lydgate Beach Park. At Kaha Lani Resort you can sunbathe at the sandy beach, challenge a friend to a tennis match, and then summon your family for a barbeque as the sun goes down.

With these Lihue condo rentals, you get all the benefits of resort-style Kauai accommodations in a place as comfortable as home. We have laundry facilities, DVD rentals in the lobby, and free parking, making it easy to come and go as you please for as long as you like.

Day 1 - $50.00 fee; Da
neighborhood_overview:
If there’s one thing Islanders believe in, it’s celebrating! No matter what time of year you visit Maui, chances are you’ll catch some kind of event, celebration, festival or party, almost all of which are completely free to attend. Here’s a breakdown, month-by-month, of what’s going on (and where) in Maui.

January: Chinese New Year Celebration (Lahaina)
February: Chinese New Year Celebration (Lahaina), World Whale Day (Kihei), Maui Open Studios Art Events (all areas), Maui Plein Air Painting Invitational (Lahaina, Kapalua)
March: Whale & Ocean Arts Festival (Lahaina)
April: Banyan Tree Birthday Party (Lahaina), Maui County Agricultural Festival (Wailuku), Haiku Ho’olaule’a & Flower Festival (Haiku), Maui Steel Guitar Festival (Kaanapali)
May: East Maui Taro Festival (Hana), Maui Onion Festival (Lahaina), Maui Brewers Festival (Kahului), Maui Classical Music Festival (Makawao, Hana, Makena), Maui Matsuri (Kahului), Wa’a Kiakahi Sailing Race (Kaanapali)

name: Hilton Hawaiian, Lagoon Tower- One Bedroom Villa!
description:
Set against a backdrop of stunning natural wonders, Hilton Hawaiian Village® Waikiki Beach Resort in Honolulu provides visitors with spectacular amenities and an unrivaled position in the heart of paradise. Lagoon Tower by Hilton Grand Vacations Club gives guests ideal access to the best stretch of Waikiki's famous white-sand beach and the extensive entertainment, shopping and dining options within the renowned Hilton Hawaiian Village.

The space
This amazing resort has it all. Set on 22 acres of lushly landscaped beachfront property, the Hilton has married the best of Hawaiian culture with world class amenities you expect from the Hilton name. The attention to detail will make your stay relaxing the moment you arrive.

Choose from several swimming pools, including Paradise Pool the longest slide in Waikiki as well as the two-tiered saltwater Lagoon, named after the famous island surfer Duke Kahanamoku. Indulge at the Mandara Spa, offering a range of soo
neighborhood_overview: Oahu has no shortage of activities and attractions that are nothing short of unforgettable! If you are able to tear yourself away from the resort for a day, experience Hawaii by air with Island Seaplane Service, the only air tour in all of Hawaii. Or, explore the waters surrounding the island with Atlantis Submarines - an entirely different but just as amazing view. Within the surrounding area, a wide variety of other adventures await your discovery, including scuba diving, snorkeling, golf, hiking trails and abundant cultural riches.

name: White Sands Village #120
description:
Say aloha to your Big Island vacation rental! White Sands Village is an oceanfront condo complex in the gorgeous town of Kailua-Kona. Guests will find themselves in the perfect area for exploring the island with a variety of activities nearby. Magic Sands Beach Park is simply a stroll across the street, Keolonahihi State Historical Park is a quick drive up the road, and downtown Kailua is a short and scenic drive up the coast with dining and shopping options.

White Sands Village #120 is a 2 bedroom/2 bathroom condo perfect for a small family or group of friends. Visitors are greeted into an open floor plan with a fully equipped kitchen, dining area, and living room. The kitchen is prepared with updated black appliances and plenty of counter space. You will be whipping up all your favorite dishes in no time. When dinner is hot and ready to be served, call your guests to the dining table with seating for 4 to enjoy a home cooked meal together.

When you are
host_about:
Grand Welcome has perfected the art of short-term vacation rentals. As the leading property management franchise in the industry, we offer the most comprehensive, full-service program, providing both homeowners and guests with the care and attention they deserve. Each of our locations, from coast to coast, is locally owned and managed, but the company is nationally recognized with a team of experts based in our home office. This allows us to maintain a hands-on, boutique-style approach with premium marketing and guest service support.  

  
Planning your vacation begins with Grand Welcome. We offer an expansive list of high-end vacation rental properties ranging from mountain cabins, condos, and luxury homes. With thousands of properties to choose from, we are confident that the vacation home of your dreams is just a click away.
