name: Absolute Oceanfront Luxury Home w/ Pool & Hot Tub
description:
At Hale Mar you'll enjoy an entire oceanfront home on 1/2 acre of gardens. Watch and hear dramatic crashing ocean surf from your bedrooms, living room, private pool and hot tub: you can't get closer to the sea! Birds wake you, frogs sing you to sleep; the air is freshest in the US, the sunrises and stars spectacular. Convenient to lava viewing, snorkeling, rainforests and black sand beaches on Hawaii's wild, pristine Big Island, Hale Mar combines relaxation, luxury, romance and adventure.

The space
Hale Mar Hawaii is the house of your dreams in paradise: big blue Pacific ocean swells - whales and dolphins - swimming pool - hot tub - volcano - rainforests - black sand beaches - coconut palms! Maximize your Big Island experience from your own spacious sanctuary of privacy, peace and luxury: Hale Mar is a 3 bedroom, absolute oceanfront home on a private 1/2 acre property in a quiet rural area, with 100' of direct sea frontage, your own 38' lap pool and hot tub by t
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood, Hawaiian Paradise Park, is a true paradise! Just stroll along the ocean cliffs and see/hear/smell the ozone of the crashing surf and you'll know why. It's so peaceful you can hear birds all day and frogs and night, and the Big Island air is the certified cleanest in the United States. You can walk or bicycle for miles up and down the coastline!

neighborhood_overview:
Waikīkī (/waɪkiːˈkiː/; Hawaiian: [vɐiˈkiːˈkiː] or [wɐiˈkiːˈkiː]) is a beachfront neighborhood of Honolulu, on the south shore of the island of Oʻahu, in Hawaii, United States. Waikiki is best known for Waikīkī Beach, the white sand beach shoreline fronting the neighborhood.

Waikīkī is home to public places including Kapiʻolani Park, Fort de Russy Military Reservation, Kahanamoku Lagoon, Kūhiō Beach Park, and Ala Wai Harbor.

Large bathroom w/full tub. From the full lanai balcony, enjoy the refreshing tropical breeze & sound of the tide lapping the Ka'anapali shore. Awesome pool area, beach, exercise room, laundry facilities & restaurant on site.

The space
Enjoy a week at the BEAUTIFUL Kaanapali Beach Club ("KBC") Resort at this scenic view 1-BEDROOM SUITE that includes kitchenette! Comfortably Sleeps 4-5 adults or children (there is a King bed, Sofa bed, plus a single roll-away bed may be available for a 5th person if requested at booking).

host_about:
We're a happy couple living in an amazing large estate in Seattle. We visit Hawaii a couple times a year, sometimes with our kids and grandkids. Our beautiful timeshares in Kaanapali, Maui (near Lahaina) are The WESTIN KAANAPALI OCEAN RESORT (STUDIO, 1-BRM or 2-BRM)  and The KAANAPALI BEACH CLUB (1-BRM OCEAN VIEW or 1-BRM OCEAN FRONT). 

We have lifetime 5-Star Elite Platinum status with Starwood/WESTIN (the highest possible) as well as similar lifetime Elite Centum Platinum status  with Diamond Resorts/KAANAPALI BEACH CLUB.  As a result, if you book any of our MAUI timeshares, you share in the many special perks we have as owners at both Resorts including (subject to availability) early check-in, late check-out, best possible room locations plus there are no resort fees and parking is always free.

If you do not find the dates you would like on our MAUI listings, please email us and tell us the dates you would prefer (but try to do so at least 8-13 months in advance to be certain of availability (since West Maui is so much in demand now days).

In addition, in Seattle we have two very popular Airbnb units at our large Estate Home both with sunset views:  
#1 SEATTLE LUXURY ESTATE ROMANTIC SEAVIEW 1-BRM GUESTHOUSE
#2 SEATTLE LUXURY ESTATE ROMANTIC SEAVIEW SUITE
 
Contact me ASAP with any questions or to book!

name: Ilikai, stunning Oceanview in sunny  Waikiki
description:
LUXURY OCEAN VIEW
High floor luxury condo with superior views of the Pacific Ocean.
The balcony is spacious • Full Kitchen in 500 sq ft interiors with 120 sq ft lanai.

The space
The Condo, is located on the 21 floor of the iconic Ilikai Building in Waikiki, Honolulu,
Offers spectacular, direct views of the ocean, Waikiki beach, Duke Kahanamoku Lagoon and Diamond Head.
You can actually watch the surfers riding the waves from within the condo or while relaxing outside on the lanai.
Friday Fireworks are back!, from the lanai of thge condo you have a front seat to the show.

The location is great; The Ilikai is one of the few ocean font properties on Waikiki beach.

neighborhood_overview:
Located just outside of Ilikai Hotel & Luxury Suites, this stretch of pristine white sands and sparkling waters is a perfect spot for sunbathing, swimming, and water activities. The lagoon features a state-of-the-art water circulation system and its calm conditions make it perfect for novice swimmers. Duke Kahanamoku Beach was recently named the #2 beach in America by Dr. Beach.
World-class shopping is only a 5 minute walk from Ilikai Hotel & Luxury Suites. Ala Moana Center truly has everything for anyone. From luxury brands to casual surf wear, there is something to pine for in this expansive indoor/outdoor mall. With three floors of shopping, dining, and entertainment, you can spend all day and night at this popular retail and entertainment destination.

((PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
Mon-Sat 9:30am-9pm; Sun 10am-7pm
host_about:
First came to Kailua Kona Hi, to compete in the Ironman Triathlon competition, fell in love with the Islands, and stayed. 
Kundalini Yoga teacher, lover of sports: cycling, swimming, running but most of all surfing.
The Big Island of Hawaii -  is a place of great beauty, excellent weather, and many fun activities.
Honolulu offers all city advantages with little noise and pollution. 
The greatest surf breaks are found on the Islands of Hawaii as well as Kite & wind surfing, Golfing, snorkeling, diving, paddling and amazing hikes. 
The Islands of Hawaii are some of the most precious gems on our planet and so is the culture of the 
Hawaiian people their wisdom and knowledge, I feel that It is a great privilege to live here.

name: Sunset Beach Treehouse Bungalow !!!
description:
30 day minimum rental. Dwell in bliss like a local in north shore nirvana. The ultimate retreat for surfers, yogis and nature lovers, this jungle bungalow overlooks one of the most famous surf spots on the north shore.

Climb up 80 steps winding through lush foliage to your treehouse overlooking one of the most famous surf spots on the north shore - a bit of a hike but well worth the views!

TA Registration number: TA–139–039–9488–01

The space
The ultimate retreat for surfers, yogis and nature lovers, this jungle bungalow overlooks one of the most famous surf spots on the north shore. Climb 80 steps up a stone path winding through lush foliage to your tree house nestled among black lava rock, shaded by deep green canopy of Banyan, mango, avocado trees. Fall asleep to the lullaby of the waves and awaken to the sweet songs of birds in the trees.

The Unit:
The unit itself is 250 sq. feet, loft above with full size cotton futon,
host_about: 35+ year North Shore vet and crew, love to share local knowledge with guests.  We overlook the most beautiful ocean and love to get in it everyday! From white water first timers to big wave tow ins, kite surf, stand up paddle and traditional surfing, we do it all.  The focus is fun and we will put you in the right place to maximize yours.  We grow a lot of organic veggies on the property and we invite guests to enjoy. Yoga is a focal point for us, and if you care to join in we are all inclusive... novice first timers and seasoned yogis alike! The communal yoga deck overlooks the ocean and has been the venue for some wonderful practice for our guests that have visited and ourselves as well.  We enjoy inspiring and being inspired by the friends we make up here.

name: Sugar Shack 3 in the Ke'ei District
description:
A fully equipped 1B/1b Sugar Shack with lots of room and great location for your non-tourist get-away. Out of the downtown but not far from grocery, beaches, snorkeling, cooler elevation and country views. Hawaii tax collected on site(14.7% after arrival or by arrangement prior to departure).

The space
Tropically furnished coffee shack on working coffee and mac nut farm.
Part-time field laborers work during the week
(Someones gotta pick the macadamias)!

A well appointed, cozy one bedroom, one bath, cabin in a country setting. Fruit trees, garden view, queen bed, hardwood floors, travertine bathroom and wifi. Full kitchen, stove and oven,(liquid propane gas) small micro, full size refrig/freezer. Nice dining porch. Garden setting, large outdoor fire pit/with wood. Friendly kitties, chickens, and elder terrier pooches on occasion.

Walk 75 paces to convenience store-Ohana Warehouse, just south on the highway. Drive 2 miles north
neighborhood_overview:
Cooler up country temps, rainbow colored sunsets, lots of forest, nearby Kealakekua Bay. City of Refuge, famous snorkel and diving spot. West side gets early morning sun and afternoon clouds and rain showers. Daily.:)
Near by with in walking is the Ohana Warehouse convenience store, short drive -Super J's Hawaiian Food, -Da Poke Shack, -Big Island Jakes BBQ, just north a mile is The Coffee Shack(brkfst, lunch)
host_about: We are a wife and husband couple in our early 60's, parents of 3 splendid adults, all living in the Hawaii island chain. We share the love of communication and hospitality with world travelers in this tropical landscape. Living and working in paradise, we support a large animal family, and  grow infamous Kona coffee cherries(beans) in late summer. We also grow Macadamias, Jack fruit, Bread Fruit(Ulu), avocados, citrus, and enough bananas to keep us in pies, bread, and smoothies all year! Currently we support the Ulu Cooperative locally, where they turn bread fruits into gluten free flour, and have created fresh to freezer bags of several local (meatless) food staples. They are available now in the freezer section at Longs CVS. We welcome your interest and questions, and to stay here in our Hawaii home. Join us!

name: Maui Kamaole A114 Front Row Ocean View and Whales!
description:
This one bedroom Maui Kamaole condo is right on the front row and enjoys unobstructed ocean views, seasonal whale watching, an easy walk across the street to Kamaole Beach Park III and it is in close proximity to the charms and offerings of Wailea. The complex features tropical gardens, two pools (one heated), two tennis courts, multiple BBQ areas, and two Jacuzzis!

The space
This one bedroom Maui Kamaole condo has an ocean view from the lanai, living room, and kitchen.

You'll have access to many extras including air-conditioning, cable TV, WiFi, in room safe, beach towels, in unit washer/dryer, and a fully equipped kitchen.

The spacious lanai offers spectacular views and a true taste of Maui’s relaxed island lifestyle.

You'll be within steps of the beach, the pool, and bbq area.

This unit is in close proximity to the charms and offerings of Wailea.

Guest access
Air conditioning
WiFi
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood is quiet and in close proximity to several restaurants, Wailea, and all that Kihei has to offer.  This location has all the amenities you're looking for the perfect Maui vacation!
host_about:
Hi there!  I'm Mark!  I love to travel and one of the locations I frequent is Maui. I love the view, the location, and all the amenities this unit has to offer!

When staying in Maui I like to spend my mornings on the water.  I normally head down to Maui Waveriders around 7am and rent a paddle board.  The surf is relatively calm and great for a morning workout.  Afterwards I like to go to Nola's for breakfast.  In the afternoon you'll likely find me at Coconuts for their great fish tacos and at Mamas Fish House for dinner.

In the evening I like to walk down to 5P (5 Palms) for their happy hour specials.  The beach across the street is beautiful and I like to spend the day there before breaking out the bbq in the evening.  I like to go to the Dog and Duck Pub for a night cap and a bit of live music.

Hope you enjoy Maui as much as I do!

Mahalo!
Mark

name: Scandinavian Chalet, Maui, Hawaii
description:
HoneyMoons - Anniversaries, There is no place like it. Custom Log Home on 2.6 acres of some of the most beautiful land you will find on Maui. It feels like the Hawaii many people long for. 2 Bedrooms, 1 King, 2 Queen beds.

Permited: STPH

The space
A unique experience on North Shore Maui, Hawaii. This is the lush tropical side of Maui. 2 acres beautifully landscaped, large variety of tropical trees and flowers, spacious lawn. Hike to waterfalls, along ocean bluffs, picturesque views of Haleakala Volcano. This incredible home was actually brought from Scandinavia by ship. The logs are over 5 inches deep, cut lengthwise, laminated, squared and triple notched. Real Scandinavian quality, classic design. It sits beautifully perched, one property back from the cliffs of Waipio Bay, a landscape very much like Hana.

License number
290050540001, TA-011-517-1328-01
host_about: We have lived in the Haiku area of Maui for 35 years, have had the Chalet for 17. We have traveled a lot when we were yournger and try to give our guests the kind of place we would have loved to stay in.  We give you a lot of privacy, but are very available if you need anything.  We especially like having guests who appreciate our huge variety of plants. (Refresh your Biome).

Stunning Luxury Oceanview Condo

Simply the most luxurious condo in the complex. Our second floor ocean view condo is as nice as a luxury resort for a fraction of the price.

Bamboo ceiling fans blow soft trade winds through classic island decorated rooms. Slate floors throughout. Chef’s kitchen with state of the art stainless steel appliances, granite counters. Counter bar has seating for three.

description:
Unobstructed sea views. Small 16 unit property with Pool outside your door.
Remodeled 478 sf sunny and cozy apartment. Queen Bed in master, sofa bed in living room. Island Counter has 4 stools and serves as a computer table. Very convenient location in central Kihei. 3-4 Short blocks to restaurants, marketing, shopping and entertainment at the Triangle. Cove Beach across the street for water sports and surf lessons. Ozone treatment after each guest for virus free safe stay.

The space
Spectacular ocean views from this apartment. This is a ground floor apartment that is clean, comfortable and tastefully remodeled. The square footage is 478 sf with great views from the apartment and lanai. Apartment is across the street from Cove Park Beach. Flat screen 60" TV with Blue Ray DVD player, IPOD Dock, surround sound. Steps to the pool which is gated. Unit has two (2) air conditioning window units and ceiling fans. Full kitchen with granite counterto

Kalama Park and Cove Beach across the street. Great for kayak and paddleboard access
and surf lessons. Water equipment rentals next door. Playground for children, tennis courts, skateboard and walking path along ocean in Kalama Park.

host_about:
Rentals Maui Inc. is a Vacation Rental management company located in Kihei, Maui. The company is locally owned and managed, and has been doing business on Maui for the past 20 years.  It is a Real Estate company fully licensed by the State of Hawaii and is insured and bonded.

Currently Rentals Maui Inc. manages 275 properties in the Kihei and Wailea area of Maui. They strive to give visitors the best possible vacation experience on Maui. name: DEAD Hale Ono Loa 102
description:
Enjoy this West Maui ocean front resort which includes a pool, lounge area, shuffle board, picnic area, and BBQ’s, all just steps away from the ocean!

The space
When you stay at Hale Ono Loa 102, you can look forward to a West Maui property with lush grounds, and a condo that sits ocean front so you can enjoy lounging, dinner and sunsets, and watching the whales right from your private lanai. Our guests will enjoy a classic Maui property which includes a pool, lounge area, shuffleboard, picnic area, and BBQ’s. Come and relax, unwind, and experience island charm and living - being steps away from the ocean, you'll definitely agree that Maui is the place to be!

Condo Highlights:
-King size bed
-Fully equipped kitchen
-No AC but we have wonderful trade winds and a screen door to take advantage of the cooling breeze
-Flat Screen TV
-Screened doors and windows take maximum advantage of cooling tropical trade winds
-Ceiling fans
host_about:
Vacation Rental Management, Property Management, Asset Management, Real Estate Sales and Financial Analysis on  real estate.

We give our pledge to you to make your vacation on Maui as easy and pleasurable as possible. We understand that vacationing with your family and friends is a time for memories, rest, and vital rejuvenation.

We provide the support and peace of mind for your ultimate vacationing experience on Maui.
Link to all our listings:  https://airbnb.com/users/15820446/listings 

We are especially empathetic for our Vacationers.  We are not perfect but we do try hard.  We are all local to Maui and try to represent the Aloha Spirit.

We have discovered for ourselves the pleasure of vacationing in this paradise called: Maui.  All of us came here many years ago, drawn to the mystique and spectacular beauty of the Island. Our satisfaction grows each time we are able to provide that special place our vacationers have worked for and dreamed of for so long. This is truly a marvelous business, and we give thanks each day for this wonderful opportunity.

name: *DIRECTLY Across Beaches*Best Location*South Maui
description:
This sunny ground floor 650 square foot condo is located in the heart of Kihei. The complex (Kihei Kai Nani) boasts beautifully manicured tropical gardens, fruit trees, a large fresh water swimming pool, picnic tables, shuffleboard, an activity pavilion and several BBQs for our guests to use.

Enjoy traditional Hawaiian decor, a private lanai and the warm Maui sunlight streaming through the many windows in this beautiful unit.

The space
For the lastest COVID-19 travel rules, we invite you to visit the Hawaii COVID-19 website. Please feel free to ask for details.

Pala Hinu Cleaning Services (our cleaning contractor) is dedicated to ensuring that your rental is safe and sanitary. We have evaluated our cleaning practices with the onset of COVID-19 to make sure that we are using the proper chemicals and techniques. Rest assured, we have implemented new procedures that include frequent disinfecting of high-touch areas, linen sanitization, and w
neighborhood_overview:
This complex is just steps away from one of Maui's best beaches, Kamaole II. It is also an easy walking distance to many restaurants, shops and delis.
Maui’s unique and varied terrain offers a multitude of activities. From relaxing on some of the world’s most beautiful white sand beaches to the more adventurous undertakings of zip-lining and paragliding. Kihei Kai Nani's location is such that there are many activities and attractions right at your finger tips. Some of Maui’s top attractions are: Maalaea Harbor; many boats leave from Maalaea on snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, whale watching (in season), sunset cruises, and more. It is much faster to leave from Maalaea Harbor than Lahaina Harbor when taking trips to Molokini Crater and Turtle Town. Other attractions include Maui Ocean Center, Haleakala Volcano, Shops at Wailea, Iao Valley, Wailea Golf Club, King Kamehameha Golf Club, Maui Tropical Plantation, and the Whale Sanctuary. The town of Kihei is a quant,
host_about:
I am hospitality professional, who genuinely cares about creating great vacation experiences for our guests. Prior to assisting with vacation rentals, I worked for high end, well known hotel chains and private hotels for over 17 years. Hospitality is my passion, to ensure that our guests have a great booking and stay experience is always my priority.  
We offer discounted rental car reservations, travel insurance and concierge services to help you make the most of your Maui vacation. Our team of guest experience specialists consists of Paige, Katrina, Jennifer, Tim, and Andrew. They help me connect, respond and assist our guests 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. I am so proud that we are able to offer warm, friendly, professional and resort quality services in an un-hotel setting for our guests. 
I love to engage in all different forms of art in my spare time, I draw, dance and aspire to play the drums. I love Maui, it would be hard to imagine living at another place, other than paradise.
Mahalo for reading. I hope we get the opportunity to assist you with your next Maui vacation!

name: Hilton Hawaiian, Grand Waikikian One Bedroom
description:
Welcome to the Grand Waikikian Suites by Hilton Grand Vacations. Our splendid hotel is idyllically set within the 22-acre Hilton Hawaiian Village Beach Resort & Spa on world-renowned Waikiki Beach. Make the most of our convenient location in the heart of Waikiki, unwind in a comfortable suite, and enjoy fabulous facilities including four pools, a spa, fitness center and kids adventure program.

The space
This amazing resort has it all. Set on 22 acres of lushly landscaped beachfront property, the Hilton has married the best of Hawaiian culture with world class amenities you expect from the Hilton name. Your room has a stunning view. The attention to detail will make your stay relaxing the moment you arrive.
Our Waikiki hotel offers 331 elegant one bedroom suites equipped with separate living and dining areas, a full kitchen, washer/dryer, HDTV and sofa sleeper. Soak in stunning ocean or city views from your own private balcony.
Choose from six swimming p
neighborhood_overview: Oahu has no shortage of activities and attractions that are nothing short of unforgettable! If you are able to tear yourself away from the resort for a day, experience Hawaii by air with Island Seaplane Service, the only air tour in all of Hawaii. Or, explore the waters surrounding the island with Atlantis Submarines - an entirely different but just as amazing view. Within the surrounding area, a wide variety of other adventures await your discovery, including scuba diving, snorkeling, golf, hiking trails and abundant cultural riches.

name: Entire Seaside 2 bedroom 2 bath 10 steps to beach
description:
Cove View Gem in a 16 unit building built in 1973. Ground floor 2 bedroom 2 bath Apartment north end unit. 3 beds total. Apartment in convenient location. Its a Perfect spot for watching sunsets, surfing, paddle boarding and kayaking across the street at the Cove Beach. Whale watching November-March. The cove is perfect for beginner surfers. Wave Riders next door for rental equipment. Casual Restaurants and grocery a few short blocks. 1 car space per apartment

The space

name: Upcountry Hospitality in the Saddle Room
description:
This garden level apartment is a cute, affordable way to stay on the dry side (the best part) of Waimea.


NOTE: We are a family of four with two little girls who live upstairs. Because of that, we have made this apartment available at a great rate for those looking for a budget option. If you are comfortable with the pitter-patter of little feet sometimes between 6am-7pm, then we’d love to host you!

The space
This studio was once the saddle room in our historic Hawaiian home, built in the mid 1800s. It is was once the only house on the bottom of the Kohala Mountian Range -- part of the original Waimea town.

We are located on the "sunny side" of Waimea, with a very convenient location great for exploring the entire island! While we are only 15 minutes the Hawaii Island's best beaches (like Hapuna, Maunakea and 69's), we are "upcountry" which gives you a cool reprieve from the coastal heat at the end of long day of adventures. Waimea is
neighborhood_overview: We are located on the "sunny side" of Waimea, just off the Kawaihae Road.  Our home is tucked into a quiet residential neighborhood at the base of the Kohala mountain range.
host_about: Lea, born and raised on the Island of Hawaii, just returned with her husband, Pat. We think Waimea is the very best place to live -- central, a little cooler and surrounded by an adorable town.  We offer Hawaiian hospitality to travelers who are looking for an authentic island experience.  We love the Big Island and know it well. The best part of hosting is getting to share tips and tricks with our guests and make sure they see the real deal while staying with us.

name: Hilton Hawaiian, Grand Waikikian Two bedroom.
description:
Welcome to the Grand Waikikian Suites by Hilton Grand Vacations. Our splendid hotel is idyllically set within the 22-acre Hilton Hawaiian Village Beach Resort & Spa on world-renowned Waikiki Beach. Make the most of our convenient location in the heart of Waikiki, unwind in a comfortable suite, and enjoy fabulous facilities including four pools, a spa, fitness center and kids adventure program.

The space
This amazing resort has it all. Set on 22 acres of lushly landscaped beachfront property, the Hilton has married the best of Hawaiian culture with world class amenities you expect from the Hilton name. Your room has a stunning view. The attention to detail will make your stay relaxing the moment you arrive.
Our Waikiki hotel offers 331 elegant two bedroom suites equipped with separate living and dining areas, a full kitchen, washer/dryer, HDTV and sofa sleeper. Soak in stunning ocean or city views from your own private balcony.
Choose from six swimming p
neighborhood_overview: Oahu has no shortage of activities and attractions that are nothing short of unforgettable! If you are able to tear yourself away from the resort for a day, experience Hawaii by air with Island Seaplane Service, the only air tour in all of Hawaii. Or, explore the waters surrounding the island with Atlantis Submarines - an entirely different but just as amazing view. Within the surrounding area, a wide variety of other adventures await your discovery, including scuba diving, snorkeling, golf, hiking trails and abundant cultural riches.

name: Best Kept Secret on Oahu!  and WE ARE LICENSED!!!
description:
Hawaii’s Best Kept Secret: The cottage is next to sandy coves, driftwood, shells, and forested pastures filled with polo ponies. The ocean is excellent for snorkeling and fishing; there are two surf breaks within one mile, windsurfers get wind most afternoons, and the mountains behind us offer good hiking trails. The Colony has a nice pool and a large grass chipping green, and a tennis court. We have TV and WiFi. LICENSE NO. 90/TVU-0108. GE-142-964-5312-01. TMK:1-6-8-009-001-0021.

The space
Description: The cottage is best for a couple, but sleeps four. Access to the dressing room and separate full bath is through the bedroom, which can be partitioned off. There is cable TV, both wired and wireless Internet Cable, and the kitchen is well equipped. It will have been cleaned just before you arrive and serviced with fresh sheets and towels. No daily maid service is available. Coin laundry machines are next to the manager’s office.

Other th
neighborhood_overview: Nearby activities include world-class golf, watching the big wave surfers at Waimea Bay, glider rides, skydiving, fine dining, the Polynesian Cultural Center, and Waimea Falls Park.  Waialua and Haleiwa are only five minutes away, where you’ll find charming old plantation houses, art galleries, good restaurants, shops and supermarkets.  Be sure to try Café Haleiwa for breakfast, Matusmoto Shave Ice stand, and Kua Aina Burgers.

description:
Surf Song, in Princeville Kauai, is a luxury private licensed vacation rental home with four air conditioned bedrooms and four ensuite bathrooms. It is situated on a bluff overlooking the Pacific ocean on the iconic North Shore of Kauai. Enjoy ocean vistas from almost every room of this pristine, modern yet tranquil home while listening to the relaxing sound of waves breaking on the shore below. With a 10 minute walk to a secluded beach, yet within a pleasant walk or bike ride (plenty of bikes provided) of Princeville's full facilities, this is the perfect retreat. So many of the beautiful places and beaches that Kauai has to offer are close at hand, but you may just find that all you want to do is stay and enjoy!

Surf Song is centered on an expansive, vaulted great room which opens fully to the wide oceanside lanai. Adjacent on the ocean are an ultra modern, fully equipped chef‘s kitchen and an entertainment area with new, high-end electronics. Two oceanfront master suites

The space
Welcome to your home in Paradise! Wake up to sweet orange blossom breezes and tropical bird calls.

This is a fully updated, Old-Hawaii style home with three bedrooms and two baths in a private estate of four cottages surrounded by a mature, tropical landscape of seasonal mangoes, bananas, oranges, ginger, and birds of paradise. Walk across the broad lawn to the private tennis/pickleball court; play to your hearts content or escape the midday sun in the shade of mature mango trees.

neighborhood_overview: Location, location, location.  Our private compound is along the best stretch of Keawakapu Beach, cited by Conde' Nast Traveller magazine as one of the best beaches in the world with clean, white sand, family-friendly surf and a great tiki bar a short walk up the beach.  Sitting on the boarder of posh Wailea and funky Kihei, you are close enough to walk to either and peacefully distant from each. The location accommodates all interests and a wide variety of food, entertainment and recreational activities including  surf, snorkel, dive, boating, hiking, golf, free private tennis & pickle ball court and much more.  Wailea sports world class resorts, glitzy shopping and restaurants, manicured lawns and boardwalks, and 2 world-class golf courses. description:
A hidden gem located only a block from the ocean. This charming 2 story, 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath cottage is tucked away in Kahakai Place, a small gated community. Perfect for a romantic getaway or family retreat, enjoy the privacy of you own home during your stay on the Big Island.

The space
Beautiful and modern, enjoy all the convenience of home during your Hawaiian vacation. Located inside the gated community of Kahakai Place, this 1319 sq ft 3 bedroom 2.5 bath house is ideal for the vacationer who values their privacy. Tastefully appointed with comfort and relaxation in mind, you will feel like you’re home whether you are indoors or out.

All bedrooms are located on the second floor to provide added quiet and privacy. The primary bedroom has a king-sized bed with an en suite bathroom. The guest bedroom has a queen-sized bed. The third bedroom is equipped with two twin beds. Also conveniently located upstairs are the laundry facilities. The washer and dry
host_about:
First Island Realty has been managing properties on the Big Island of Hawaii since 2005. We specialize in paradise and have a diverse portfolio ranging from multi-million dollar luxury homes,  estates, and vacation rentals to multi-family properties.

Laure McElwee, Broker

As a long term resident and real estate broker in the state of Hawaii, Laure McElwee's focus has always been on providing the best service to buyers and sellers alike. Consistently a top producer both regionally and nationally for over 10 years, Laure loves the challenge of finding you the perfect property in paradise and assisting with the transition to the Big Island!  She is honest, dedicated, hard working, and many buyers and sellers have become her dear friends. She brings knowledge, experience, integrity, and a "can do" attitude to the table. Laure is a fun loving, high energy, and a driven realtor.  Currently on the West Hawaii association board of realtors grievance committee and a member of the Hawaii association of realtors. Laure is also a 100 tons boat captain, a dive instructor, and an avid paddler. 

Krista Larsson, Office Manager

As a long term resident of the Big Island, Krista is committed to providing excellent customer service to all with Aloha! Krista brings to our team her unwavering attention to detail, integrity, can-do attitude and years of experience in office management and team building.

This freshly renovated condo is a corner unit offering stunning ocean views and a large, airy lanai with comfortable outdoor seating. Pack up the cooler and head to the beach or lounge by the pool and soak up the serenity that is Kihei Bay Vista.

The space
For the latest COVID-19 travel rules, we invite you to visit the Hawaii COVID-19 website. Please feel free to ask for details.

We have evaluated our cleaning practices with the onset of COVID-19 to make sure that we are using the proper chemicals and techniques. Rest assured, we have implemented new procedures that include fre
neighborhood_overview: Maui’s unique and varied terrain offers a multitude of activities. From relaxing on some of the world’s most beautiful white sand beaches to the more adventurous undertakings of zip-lining and paragliding. Kihei Bay Vista's location is such that there are many activities and attractions right at your finger tips. Some of Maui’s top attractions are: Maalaea Harbor; many boats leave from Maalaea on snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, whale watching (in season), sunset cruises, and more. It is much faster to leave from Maalaea Harbor than Lahaina Harbor when taking trips to Molokini Crater and Turtle Town. Other attractions include Maui Ocean Center, Haleakala Volcano, Shops at Wailea, Iao Valley, Wailea Golf Club, King Kamehameha Golf Club, Maui Tropical Plantation, and the Whale Sanctuary. The town of Kihei is a quant, laid-back beach town boasting some of Maui’s most pristine stretches of white sand and turquoise waters. South Maui is fun for couples and families alike. Y
host_about:
I am hospitality professional, who genuinely cares about creating great vacation experiences for our guests. Prior to assisting with vacation rentals, I worked for high end, well known hotel chains and private hotels for over 17 years. Hospitality is my passion, to ensure that our guests have a great booking and stay experience is always my priority.  
We offer discounted rental car reservations, travel insurance and concierge services to help you make the most of your Maui vacation. Our team of guest experience specialists consists of Paige, Katrina, Jennifer, Tim, and Andrew. They help me connect, respond and assist our guests 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. I am so proud that we are able to offer warm, friendly, professional and resort quality services in an un-hotel setting for our guests. 
I love to engage in all different forms of art in my spare time, I draw, dance and aspire to play the drums. I love Maui, it would be hard to imagine living at another place, other than paradise.
Mahalo for reading. I hope we get the opportunity to assist you with your next Maui vacation!

description:
Welcome to your beach getaway! This 2 story, 2 bedroom plus loft, beautiful beach front condo comes with all the comforts of home including WI-FI, three flat screen TV’s, everything you will need in the kitchen to cook delicious meals and more.

The space
Welcome to your beach getaway! This 2 story, 2 bedroom plus loft, beautiful beach front condo comes with all the comforts of home including WI-FI, three flat screen TV’s, everything you will need in the kitchen to cook delicious meals and more. The kitchen is remodeled with new appliances, granite counter tops, nice berber carpet upstairs, nice tile floor in the lower section of the unit. This unit is ideal for families or groups, Queen bed downstairs, and a Queen bed upstairs. Plus a hide a bed in the living room and a full size futon in the loft room upstairs.. Enjoy breathtaking ocean views of the Pacific and see other islands in the distance. Appreciate the beauty of the island and wake up watching the boat
neighborhood_overview:
Enjoy breathtaking ocean views of the Pacific and see other islands in the distance. Appreciate the beauty of the island and wake up watching the boats venture out to Molokini.
Staying here is in close proximity to restaurants and local shopping.
host_about:
The complex is located directly across from Kamaole III State Beach Park, which is known as one of the most beautiful and safest beaches in the Islands.  It is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, sunning, jogging, picnicking, kite flying, and especially enjoying amazing sunsets and whale watching.

Each unit has a private lanai that faces the interior of the complex, offering views of the expansive lawns, pools, and lush tropical landscape of palm trees, hibiscus, birds of paradise and plumeria trees.  Most lanais also offer views of the beautiful Pacific Ocean and spectacular sunsets.  

There are two pools, a covered pavilion, and a full size tennis court on the property.  Every evening the outdoor barbecue area is a popular spot to socialize while grilling the perfect dinner and watching as the Hale Kamaole conch shell band performs their nightly sunset ritual.

You will find world class golf courses, fantastic snorkeling and diving, many Maui activities, abundant shopping and delicious fine and family dining all within minutes of Hale Kamaole.

name: Haunani House in Volcano Village
description:
Located in Volcano Village, on the Big Island of Hawaii, this 3 bedroom 2 bath is close to all village shops and restaurants. Bright and cheery, Haunani House contains the workmanship of Volcano's finest craftsmen and the art of Big Island artists. We live right next door, so we are available to aid you with any problems or questions.

The space
Located in Volcano Village at a cool 4000ft elevation, on the Big Island of Hawaii, near the entrance to Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, on the side of the active Kilauea Volcano.

Haunani House contains the workmanship of Volcano's finest craftsmen and the art of Big Island artists. The furnishings are imaginative and diverse, and even the floors are worthy of note. Our neighborhood is the ideal mix of full time owners, seasonal and vacation renters giving you the local vibe feel. You never worry about parking since you are At the beach. Good luck finding a better neighborhood in Hanalei. There is none. You will not be disappointed. And, I am available 24/7. Mahalo nui loa!

The space
Amazing views of mountains and waterfalls from bedrooms. Full kitchen, bikes, beach gear, super clean older beach house and a quite outdoor space with lots of orchids and tropical flowers and fruits to enjoy.

All accès to the entire house. Garage is for beach and bike gear only. This house is self contained with no other rentals. You will be the only guest.

This cheery home is in the heart of the village, on a historic private lane, tucked in among native Ohia and Koa Trees and Hapu'u Tree Ferns. Wake to the sound of birds, walk to the coffee shop, general store, post office, and village restaurants. We live just across the street, so are available to help you with any questions or problems.
High speed and reliable internet is provided!!

The space
Oma's Hapu'u Hideaway is located in Volcano Village on Hawaii's Big Island, at a cool 4000ft elevation, on the side of the active Kilauea Volcano. Oma's is in the heart of the village, on a dead-end private lane, tucked in among native Ohia and Koa Trees and Hapu'u Tree Ferns. Wake to the sound of birds, walk to the coffee shop, general store, post office, and Kilauea Lodge's gourmet restaurant. Shower in rain water caught from the roof, cozy up on the bamboo couch, and gaze out at the loveliness that surrounds you.

name: The Maid's Quarters Cottage with Gardens and Gazebo Hot Tub
description:
Open windows to let mountain breezes flow through a little house that's big on character. At 4000 feet elevation, experience a unique upland rain forest climate where it's cool enough at night to throw logs into the wood stove. Located on the grounds of our 1930s plantation house, in the heart of Volcano Village, The Maid's Quarters cottage is within walking distance of all village shops and restaurants, and just a few minutes drive from Hawaii Volcanoes National Park.

License number
Tax ID GE-188404736001 TA-188404736001 Hosted Rental
neighborhood_overview: The cottage is in the Hale Ohia Tract, a residential historic district of Volcano Village. This high elevation area, with a cool mountain climate, was historically a vacation retreat for the well-to-do of the Big Island of Hawaii, where they escaped the heat of the lowlands. Our house belonged to the Hutchinson Sugar Company, and The Maid's Quarters cottage was indeed where the servants stayed when the plantation managers vacationed in Volcano.
host_about: An outdoorsman with an extreme sense of adventure, Todd can direct you to the popular as well as the lesser-known places of interest around Volcano and the Big Island of Hawaii for cycling, trail running, hiking or beach going -- or simply going for a scenic drive and a great place to eat!

Kitchen appliances include flat-top electric stove with oven, full-size fridge with ice maker, over-the-counter microwave, toaster, coffee maker, blender, brand new large capacity washer/dryer. There are three LED TV's. Our condo is located at Sandpiper Village I.

neighborhood_overview: Sandpiper Village is centrally located within the Princeville Resort among other condo units and single family homes.  There is on-site parking with a reserved parking space at no additional cost and you're no more than minutes away from dozens of different beaches, hiking trails, and wondrous vistas.  You are less than a mile away from The Princeville Shopping Center anchored by Foodland, a full size super market.  Kauai is an island of unequaled beauty and discovery. No matter how often you return, and you will return, you will continue to uncover her hidden secrets of secluded beaches, multi-level waterfalls, and soul pleasing vistas. Our Puamana town home is located within The Princeville Resort on Kauai's north shore.  It is lush and green and has to be one of the most beautiful place on this planet. If you are a first-time visitor, you will soon discover that you had not chosen Kauai, Kauai had chosen you!
host_about:
My wife, Rachel, and I first visited Kauai in the early eighties and just got hooked. We bought our first vacation rental property in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) at Sandpiper Village in Princeville and spent about 5-1/2 months renovating it.  We dreamed that one day we might be able to make Kauai our permanent home, and we were fortunate to actually make this happen in January of (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) We bought our second vacation rental property at Puamana in August of last year (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , as our second vacation rental property. and after a renovation period, placed it on line as a 3 bedroom 2 bath townhouse vacation rental.
My wife still works as a flight attendant and I am retired (for all the guys out there, I'll be writing a book soon about how to make that happen).  However, I keep busy managing both properties, when we're not dancing, playing softball/tennis, or at the beach.  One of the advantages of living here on Kauai and offering vacation properties for rent is that any issues with units that may arise are addressed immediately and decisively through direct communication between the guests and me, the owner. There is no go-between management company in the loop to delay any action that may be required.  It's a win-win for everyone.
Mahalo for visiting AirBNB and if you have any questions, call me at home (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) or cell (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) 
Karl & Rachel Forer

description:
This beautifully restored one-of-a-kind oceanfront home has all the charm of yesteryear with the added conveniences and sustainability of today.

The space
Offered as a vacation rental for the first time in 2013, the view and location are spectacular. In 2014, The Guardian newspaper listed it as one of the Top Beach Houses in the World. Completely renovated, this updated home has hardwood floors, granite countertops, koa cabinets, stainless steel appliances, air conditioning, iHome docking stations, Bose outdoor speakers with Bluetooth receiver (to pair your own devices and play music) with connections for Android and Apple products, iTouch pre-loaded with various Hawaiian music, wireless internet, full size washer/dryer, brand new California king bedroom set, luxurious bedding, hdtv plasma in great room and bedroom, gas bbq, Tiki Hut for afternoon drinks, teak lounges, etc etc.

All lights are on dimmers so you can create your own environment and mood.

“Paia House" is a 3 br, 2ba home in Paia Town on Maui’s north shore. Perfectly situated in a neighborhood so you can walk to town or to the beach in minutes. Beaches: Ho’okipa, Lanes, Mama’s, Tavares, Paia Bay, Baldwin (5 min walk or drive).

If you want to be in Paia, or minutes to Ho'okipa or Sprecklesville, you'll like this location. This is the relaxed, non-touristy Hawaiian experience. Plus, Paia is the north shore hub for all sports wind and wave. And, Paia is a walk-able town.

neighborhood_overview:

For the windsurfer, kiter, surfer, you're in the right spot.

name: Magnificent Ocean View-Walk to all S Kihei offers.
description:
Enjoy the massive view of the ocean and islands, billowy clouds dropping rain over the ocean (but not here) from the comfortable, reclining lounge chairs, and matching swiveling, rocking chairs on the lanai.
It's a 4 minute walk to the ocean, 3-15 mins to all S Kihei offers: restaurants, shops, bars, gear rentals, surf, snorkel, SUP, boogie boarding. It's beach town life: view the ocean, sunsets, watch whales splash from your large, private lanai, the living room, the loft bedroom and kitchen!

The space
The fourth floor of a four story building, you have no upstairs neighbors; it’s really quiet and extremely private! There's a loft with a bedroom that presents a magnificent view when you awake.

There are two sets of 6 stairs between this condo and the elevator that you will encounter. If stairs present problems for you, you shouldn’t stay here.

There are two bedrooms and 900 square feet of living space, NOT including the HUGE lanai!
neighborhood_overview:
In under 4 minutes, you can be in the ocean. In under 2, at restaurants, gelato shop, sushi, Mexican, a cafe, Spa, massage, Pizza Hut, bakery, Tacos, Fish and Chips, breakfast places, and Boss Frog's to rent ocean gear.
The location is IDEAL: centrally located close to a great swimming beach (by contrast, N Kihei is ideal for walking beaches) with it's own flashing yellow light cross-walk activated by you pressing a button, to highly regarded restaurants in under 10 minutes.
SOUTH Kihei is a thriving, bustling beach town, easily walkable and accessible, with great bars, restaurants, food trucks and shops close by. Kihei Ali'i Kai is in the heart of it all, but buidling D is up the hill and away from the noise...with a magnificent view.
host_about:
Aloha and welcome! Born in NYC, lived in San Francisco for 31 years, traveled cross country frequently, and discovered...I like Maui best!
I'm friendly, communicative, responds to your calls or problems quickly, and our place at Maui Vista now has 135 5 star reviews. 
I’ve lived in Kihei for over 6 years and can answer your questions and make suggestions based on your needs. 
Maui is marvelous, Maui Vista has a terrific location and is maintained impeccably, and I am confident you will love my place and the attention you receive.
Mahalo for considering my condo!

name: Waimea Bay North Shore Cottage - with AC
description:
Our updated, cozy 3 bedroom Waimea Bay North Shore cottage is centrally located in the best part of the world famous North Shore. We are a minute walk to two different gorgeous white sand beaches with a protected marine sanctuary waters offering world class snorkeling, diving, surfing and whale watching. The cottage has Air conditioning, newly remodeled kitchen and bathrooms and private parking. Please contact us if you have any questions.

The space
The Waimea Bay cottage has recently been remodeled with a new kitchen, furniture, fans, appliances, updated bathrooms and air-conditioning. This private home sits on an oceanfront property in a beautiful garden setting, a short walk to white sand beaches and a marine sanctuary with crystal clear blue Pacific Ocean waters.

Two of the best beaches on Oahu are steps from the front door: World famous Waimea Bay and Three Tables Beach. Spectacular scuba diving and snorkeling in Sharks Cove are all a short wa
neighborhood_overview: We are centrally located in the most central and conveniently located neighborhood of the entire North Shore. We are situated between two of the best beaches of the North Shore, Three Tables beach and Waimea Bay. Beautiful Waimea Bay State Park and waterfall, famous snorkeling spot Sharks Cove and the main supermarket for the North Shore, Foodland and are all a short walk away. The town of Haleiwa, which has a bunch of great restaurants and shops and Turtle Bay resort are a 10 minute drive away from the house. We are 40 minute drive away from the Honolulu airport.

name: Kehena Honey House, beach bungalow
description:
A charming, secluded garden studio. A fully equipped kitchen is provided. WiFi-enabled. Ground-level, with off street parking. Only a short walk to Kehena Beach. Easy access to Kalani resort and Uncle Robert's market events. Sleeps 4. Kids welcome.

The space
"Balmy weather and tropical breezes, island style, green surroundings, abundance”
Private guest house in nice setting.
"We loved this place", wrote recent guest, "the host was great -- brought us fresh fruit one day! -- and the accommodations were just what we needed."
The house is located in a small neighborhood, great for morning walks, and there is a nice beach nearby.

The Honey House got its name from our previous days of using it to process honey when we kept bees. It was completely renovated several years ago and a new kitchen and bathroom added on. The bath features a deluxe shower with sliding doors that open into the orchard. The Honey House entry is at ground level with o
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is a small and rural. People here are generally easygoing and relaxed. It is usually quiet but can get noisy as can any neighborhood. It is a green place, lots of trees and shrubbery. Coconuts, mangos and guava are common.
host_about: David lives next door to the rental units, available as needed.  Val lives nearby, not on site. Both are organic farmers, cooks and lifelong ocean swimmers. They have lived in this locale in Hawaii for over 30 years. Dave is usually available if you need info or help.  Your door will be unlocked when you arrive for ease of check-in. Our motto is - Enjoy!

description:
At the forefront of East Shore accommodation is the Waipouli Beach Resort. This World Class Resort provides luxury at your fingertips and offers opulent amenities for a variety of occasions.

One of Waipouli Beach Resort's top 5 suites, this corner penthouse has sprawling ocean views from the living room, lanai and both bedrooms. Luxuriate in features like the stately kitchen with a Wolf glass cooktop & oven, Sub-Zero refrigerator, GE profile microwave, Fisher Paykel dual dishwasher drawers, granite counter tops, African Mahogany cabinets, three full bathrooms with Peruvian Travertine stone surrounds and two soaking tubs.

Enjoy the clean design and convenient location, with the beach and boundless Kauai adventures just beyond your private lanai.

name: Ko Olina Beach Villas Largest 3br/3ba w/2 Masters
description:
2022 Remaining Availability: Oct 25th-Nov 4th, Dec 2nd-10th.
A gorgeous ocean view villa with a luxurious interior, on the most beautiful lagoon in Ko Olina. High end in style with a Ritz Carlton/Four Seasons Island vibe. With beds for eight, the villa is perfect for large families or couples with children who enjoy traveling together. Near Disney Aulani, additional shops & restaurants along our beachfront.
[Lanai closed for exterior painting 8am-4:30pm M-F, Aug 22-Oct 6, 2022, discounted rate]

The space
We look forward to welcoming you back for a healthy and restorative experience.

Painting of the building exterior will continue throughout 2022, one column of units at a time. The lanai in this villa will be closed from 8am - 5pm, Aug 22-Oct 6 with lanai furniture removed. Folding chairs will be provided. Rate has been discounted as a thank you, for the reduced lanai usage during those dates.

Our beaches, pools, hot tubs are open.
neighborhood_overview: Drive through the gates of the resort and immediately feel the calm come over you as you leave the hustle and bustle of the world behind. Waikiki, the North Shore, Honolulu, the great shopping and restaurants are all here on Oahu, but once you arrive at the resort, it feels like you are at one of the outer islands like Maui or Kauai. The best of both worlds.
host_about:
Alfred grew up on the North Shore of Oahu, (great surfing destination in the Winter) and enjoys sharing tips of things to do and out of the way spots to visit. Our family, Alfred, wife Deanna, sister Nadia and mom Buena look forward to welcoming your family to our home in the Islands. One of our family members will be greeting you upon your arrival for check-in and will help you to get acquainted with your villa. We are also available for questions or if you require anything throughout your stay.

Our family looks forward to welcoming your family to our home in the Islands.

Mahalo and Aloha!

More information about the space:

Beautiful Hawaiian style Condo. We have the best location next to the Tennis court, BBQ pit and Pool! Or you can walk to the beach to Surf, Snorkel, Sun Bathe or People watch.

-Upstairs unit. Access to condo is up 1 1/2 flights of outside stairs. Please be aware there is no elevator.

neighborhood_overview: We are located on Oahu's beautiful north shore, situated on Turtle Bay property surrounded by the sparkling ocean, and beautiful golf courses. Enjoy unparalleled peace and tranquility listening to the birds and watching the palm trees sway as you feel the warm ocean breeze. Our gated community offers amenities such as tennis courts and charcoal BBQ areas just steps away, or take a splash in one of our three private pools. Turtle Bay Resort and our reef- protected beach area is a 10 minute stroll away, with Lei Lei's casual golf course dining on the way.
host_about: We visited O'ahu 17 years ago for the first time, and fell in love! 9 years ago we made the crazy decision to sell everything and move to paradise. During the week we live like regular people- working, school, etc. but every weekend we go to Hawaii!  Saturday mornings includes snorkeling around our beautiful island with countless varieties of fish, turtles, and even dolphins and monk seals.  Sunsets on the beach still blow our minds. How can those colors be real?  Hosting on Airbnb creates opportunities to share our bit of paradise with wonderful people from across the globe- We love it!

Swim and snorkel across the street at Kamaole Beach Park III or venture a few minutes up the coast to check out one of the other 2 parks. When you need a break from the sand, scope out a spot by the community pool or drive 2 miles down to the neighboring town of Wailea. Complete with 2 bedrooms, 2 baths and a private ocean-view balcony, this Kihei vacation rental offers an idyllic island escape!

The space
Fourth-Floor Unit | Free WiFi | 1,900 Sq Ft

Bedroom 1: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2 (Loft): Queen Bed | Living Room: Sleeper Sofa

Beautiful Ocean/Sunset View,
Newly Renovated /Outfitted Private Bedroom, Bath en suite, kitchenette, private lanai equipped with Daikin A/C...

neighborhood_overview:
The surf shack in in a family oriented neighborhood.. you will hear birds sing,the occasional dog and a rooster in the distance... like blocks away! The morning tour of turkeys strolling along the street usually catches our guests attentions...it's a novelty!
My hens are quiet until they lay and that's generally while you're at the beach.
There are families with children you will hear them playing as kids do from time to time. This is a typical Hawaiian neighborhood.

We are at a cooler elevation which is nice to back to after a day in the hot tropical sun.

Shana & Jeff

name: Lovely Kona Condo @ Alii Villas
description:
Tax ID #1409286144-01

The space
One mile south of Kailua-Kona on Alii Drive, Alii Villas is a beautiful oceanfront complex with tropical landscaping, a large freshwater pool, and a patio area perfect for barbecuing or sunbathing. Black-and-white spinner dolphins and green sea turtles are frequent visitors to the bay just north of the complex, and bright reef fish school in the little coves and beaches nearby.

A short, pretty drive south leads to the best surfing, snorkeling, and diving areas in the Hawaiian islands; a trip north through 19th century lava flows takes you to dozens of peaceful white-sand beaches lined with palm and kiawe trees. Inland—a longer drive, but well worth the trip—is Kilauea, the Big Island’s active volcano, and the weird extraterrestrial landscape of Volcanoes National Park. To see the whole beautiful island and travel easily from one great beach to another, we recommend you rent a car at the airport.

Apartment
host_about: My spouse Jane and I enjoy camping, travel, and snorkeling. Our hobbies include chess, Shogi, origami, knitting, and playing the harp.

name: Heather's Ohana: Clean, comfortable, and cute!
description:
TA #136-997-9392-01

The space
A cozy one bedroom, one bath cottage with an open floor plan is your home base for exploring the Kalapana Coast on the Big Island. The manager and local artist and real estate agent Heather, lives in the lower level of the main house next door. Her fiance Ron lives upstairs in the main house. Heather and Ron will be your source for how to get the most out of your stay. Their dog Lupita also lives at the house, she is an adorable and friendly chihuahua.
The Ohana accommodates up to two persons with a full size bed in the bedroom and a small convertable futon in the living room. The kitchen is equipped with dishware, pots and pans, etc. and has a microwave oven, coffee maker, gas stove and refrigerator. There is a water filtration system so you can drink out of the faucets; the house as well as the whole neighborhood uses rain catchment water only. The entire house is on solar power. Parking is provided just outside y
neighborhood_overview: Kalapana Seaview Estates is eclectic.  Retired artist hippies, gardening enthusiasts, many musicians and all kinds of creative types live here.  You'll see a good variety of interesting housing structures.  The whole neighborhood is using rain catchment water.  Many homes are on solar, and some use both solar and power grid electric.   We are affected by both droughts and weeklong down pours of rain.  Couque frogs sing in chorus thoughout the night.   There are a lot of bugs!  An occasional peacock or wild pig will be sighted, many mongoose, as well as cats and dogs and a couple of cows. The Seaview lawn has an amazing ocean view and many people enjoy the ocean breeze and sunsets and moonrises.   There is a large musical gathering at the Seaview lawn every Sunday from 4-9, with venders selling food.
host_about: I have lived on the Big Island for 15 years, and have been running this Airbnb for 12 years now.  I work as a real estate agent and also create art work that adorns much of my neighbors yards and homes.  I enjoy exploring the Big Island, traveling, landscaping, dancing, swimming with dolphins and making art.

Located in Waialua, on the North shore.
This cozy 1 bedrm guesthouse has its own private entrance.
Convenient to beaches and quaint Haleiwa with shops & restaurants.

The space
Aloha, welcome to our Waialua Guesthouse located just a few blocks from Waialua beach, a short drive from Historic Haleiwa town with unique shops, foodtrucks & eateries, and a few miles from Northshore's world-class famous beaches.

neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood is quiet and safe. We are located a few blocks away from the ocean. Waialua beach is a fairly un-crowded beach that is at walking distance and is safe for bathing year-round. There's a number of surf spots close to the house as well.

If you are into hiking, there are a number of day long hikes that are a short driving distance away.

Historic Haleiwa town is a short drive, there you can find restaurants and some night life as well as shops.

description:
2 bedroom/1 bath ocean view & beach access

***Please inquire for available dates.

The space
The perfect oasis for artists, writers and ocean lovers alike. Listen to the waves from this pristine and airy two-bedroom flat nestled behind palms just steps from the beach. Swim with sea turtles every day right in front of the home. Enjoy your morning coffee from your private lanai overlooking the ocean. Located in historic Haleiwa Town down the road from Ali'i Beach, home to the Triple Crown of surfing.

The flat includes: a full size kitchen with refrigerator, stove/oven, dishwasher, microwave, toaster oven, rice cooker, blender and garbage disposal. There is a charcoal barbeque on the front ocean-facing lanai. Each room features comfortable queen size bed with ceiling fans and large closets. For additional sleeping, there is also a queen Aero Bed. The flat has it's own private entrance and parking available for one vehicle within the gate
neighborhood_overview: There are so many awesome things to do on the North Shore!  Waimea Valley is just breath taking with all it's flora and historical significance . . . hiking the valley is a treat!  The bay is just as amazing with it's turquoise blue waters in summer and giant swells during the winter.  Green Sea Turtles love our beach and can be seen and swam with all day long.  Furthermore, to take a shark tour is an unforgetable experience!
host_about: Aloha . . . you'll never believe it until you see it; because, as we're always told, "The pictures just don't do it justice!"

name: Ocean Front Luxury Condo, Fast WIFI, Kuleana
description:
1 bedroom, 1 bath ocean front ground floor condo in a small gated resort stretching over 5 acres of ocean front tropical garden. The Kuleana resort features two private beaches (seasonal) located in the middle of a Green Sea Turtle Marine Sanctuary - as a result we have plenty of turtles feeding off the underwater rocks as well as the occasional visit of turtles resting in the afternoon on the sandy beach.

The space
IMPORTANT NOTES
The resort is small and private with a combination of full time living, private vacation rental (managed by the individual owners) and timeshare. This means the on-site staff is there for safety and maintenance of the buildings as well as the grounds.

We have worked with our on-island agent fore more than 12 years, she knowns us, the condo and resort well. However, she is not a full time employee dedicated to only service our guest.

You are renting our private home not a hotel condo. This means neither we o
neighborhood_overview:
Kuleana is a small and private gated resort with access to our own private beach (seasonal) and snorkel cove where turtles come in to feed. Unlike many other places we have a very nice garden that is very well maintained.
The surrounding neighborhood include farmers market every Mon, Wed and Friday - only 15 min walk. Across from the farmers market is a public beach park with a playground and low water for young children.
From Honoapiilani Park you can walk on a beach path all the way to Hanakao'o Beach Park. Access to Honoapiilani Park is across the street from Time market.
10 min driving from Lahaina an old and charming whaling city.
5 min north is the Napili beach and a bit further north is Honolua Bay a marine sanctuary perfect for snorkeling.
host_about:
We bought our condo on Maui in 2008. It is our second home and not an investment rental. This means all furniture, kitchen, appliances etc are based on our living preferences.
What makes Kuleana special is the grounds - we have a real garden with plenty of flowers and birds, we have our own beaches, large pool and BBQ at the tip of the water.
To us this place is our ultimate relaxation and the place we turn to when we need a "breather".

name: Feel the Spirit of Aloha at the Royal Sea Cliff
description:
Feel the gentle tropical breeze as you lounge poolside with a view of the Pacific. Relish the lush open-air courtyards, waterfalls and dream-like feeling of Wyndham Royal Sea Cliff on the Big Island of Hawaii. You’ll feel the spirit of Aloha immediately at this oceanfront spot less than a mile and a half from charming Kailua-Kona. Get a feel for authentic island life at resort-hosted parties with live Hawaiian musicians, hula dancers and storytelling or enjoy canoe making and ukulele lessons.

The space
2 bedroom 2 bathroom deluxe luxury condo with 2 pools onsite and fitness center

Guest access
Guests will have full access to all the amenities on the resort.

Other things to note

neighborhood_overview: 5 minute walk to downtown Kailua-Kona and a short drive to all the restaurants, Costco, and Walmart.
host_about: Avid world traveler who o has been to Hawaii over 30+ times.

name: Private Pool - 180° Ocean View - Minutes to Beach
description:
This is real Hawaii (except we have fast reliable Wi Fi). Located at 900 ft. elevation, 4 miles to the center of town where there are many restaurants to choose from and just minutes to the nearest beach where the sea turtles are sunning themselves on the shore. This is on one acre in Kona's safest and most desirable neighborhoods. It is the downstairs of a large home where I live quietly upstairs. You share nothing, the pool and spa are yours exclusively while you are here.

The space
A short drive from the airport, yet close to town, this estate is sure to put a smile on your face. You have arrived!

As you enter your private Kona Heavens Hideaway, the downstairs portion of a large home, you will find an environment that nurtures you with the indigenous feel of the Island. Traditional conventions are re-evaluated so that the fusion of nature with furnishings crafted from renewable and sustainable sources will reward all of your senses.
neighborhood_overview: This is one of Kona's most desirable neighborhoods.    Each property is located on one acre so the neighbors are almost invisible and the neighborhood is a great place for walking or jogging.
host_about: Aloha.   I have lived in Kona since 1970 and still find new and beautiful places to explore.  If you have questions, please ask.    I'm available by text or phone anytime and am happy to help make your vacation to Hawaii a memorable one.

name: The Great Kona Escape  - Private Ohana
description:
This is real Hawaii. Located at 900 ft. elevation, where the fruit trees grow, the trades blow gently and keep the temperature 10°'s cooler and less humid than by the ocean. Just 4 miles to town where there are many restaurants to choose from and minutes to the nearest beach where the sea turtles are sunning themselves on the shore. This one-acre estate is in one of Kona's safest and most desirable neighborhoods and has been called one of Kona's most beautiful botanical gardens.

The space
The ohana (guest suite) is attached to the main house where Ken and I live quietly. You will have your own private entrance and designated parking space just steps away from your front door. The covered entryway has two lounge chairs, perfect to enjoy your morning coffee and take in the lush garden views.

The ohana opens up to a well-equipped kitchenette with toaster oven, microwave, two burner induction stove top, mini fridge (separate freezer for the ice cre
neighborhood_overview: This is one of Kona's most desirable neighborhoods with neighboring estates that are well-maintained with tropical landscape and vegetation.  The area is safe, quiet, and just 15 minutes to town.  The 900 feet elevation keeps the days about 10 degrees cooler than the coast and the humidity is much more comfortable.
host_about: Aloha.   I have lived in Kona since 1970 and still find new and beautiful places to explore.  If you have questions, please ask.    I'm available by text or phone anytime and am happy to help make your vacation to Hawaii a memorable one.

name: Enchanting Rainforest Hideaway on 2 Private Acres
description:
The Enchanting Rainforest Hideaway is a very private, well equipped, custom vacation home which stands alone on 2 private acres surrounded by a lush tropical rainforest which gives you the experience of old Hawaiian style simple elegance.
The cabin is the only dwelling on the property and no one else lives or works on the 2 acres.

The space
The Enchanting Rainforest Hideaway is a beautiful custom, private, vacation home/ cabin on 2 private acres in a rainforest setting all for yourself with no one else around or living on the property, its just you!

The 600 sq ft, well designed, tiny house is romantic, peaceful and clean. Perfect for honeymooners, babymooners, personal retreat, eco-travelers, yogis, adventurers, or anyone who just wants to get away from it all, but still be close enough to all that the Big Island has to offer.

We are centrally located in Puna, 15 miles south of Hilo, a 5 miles outside of the quaint town of Pah
host_about: We are a fun loving, adventurous couple,  living in the jungles of east Hawaii.  We have traveled, and travel,  extensively. We love visiting exotic locations and meeting people from all over the world.    Connie is a semi- retired, celebrity wardrobe stylist originally from Hollywood.  Andrew, originally from Australia, is a building contractor and FEO Officer/tanker driver for the Hawaiian Paradise Park Volunteer Fire Department . Connie currently  is a yoga instructor who runs her own studio on a 40 acre permaculture farm in Pahoa and leads yoga retreats on the island of Paros, Greece during the summer. Choosing a simpler life, we moved to Pahoa in 2001 to fulfill our dream of off-grid, sustainable living.   Our home is  up the road from the Rainforest Hideaway on a separate property we developed ourselves with machetes and a lot of sweat.  We hand built our rammed earth home, made from volcanic cinder and inorganic soil from old sugar cane fields,  and grow most of own own food organically.

11 mi. to Volcano's National Park & 9 mi. to many local restaurants in Volcano town.

Your Hawaiian Retreat is a RAW ZEN space with Good Energy and Aloha.

neighborhood_overview:

description:
Beautiful three-story condo conveniently nestled between the Napili and Kapalua beaches. This town home is roomy and is styled with a contemporary island feel.

The space
We take cleanliness seriously and sanitation is our number one priority. Our professional cleaner ensures that your safety comes first.

Description
The bedrooms are newly carpeted and your whole company will have ample living space. The condo is cooled by centralized air-conditioning. It has a private yard perfect for private BBQ. Also available are two-car garage and washer and dryer.

The complex has two swimming pools, two jacuzzi, putting greens, tennis courts and shuffle board courts. You can bar b que with the electric grills out by the pools while enjoying whales jumping during the season or the nightly sunsets.

name: Gingerbread  House-Paia/North Shore Beaches
description:
Adorable two story one bedroom stand alone house less than a mile from the bohemian town of Paia, in the middle of all North Shore Beaches. Can also be a two bedroom, we can add a second bedroom which is attached to our other house with private entrance if needed.

The space
THE GINGERBREAD HOUSE is a bright shiny A-frame structure with extremely high ceilings, stained glass windows, and skylights making it open and and airy, with AC and ceiling fans, nestled in a gigantic mango tree.
We are located less than a mile away from the bohemian surf town of Paia, just off the Hana Highway shoreline road, and the house is smack in the middle of all the North Shore beaches.
Perfect for romance, or sports vacations, or time with friends and family, with a very large marble bathroom and special jacuzzi hot tub.
The second floor bedroom has a built in queen size bed with French doors that open up to a tree house feeling lanai. The main floor has a living area
neighborhood_overview:
From Fodor's Best American Small Towns-June 2014.

PAIA, HAWAII
Population: 2,668

"It can be difficult to find remnants of authentic
Hawaii behind the multitude of resorts, but this is
one of the last holdouts. Located on Maui's northern
coast just off Highway 36, Paia was founded as a
sugarcane enclave and though the sugar mill closed
in 2000, the town is as alive as ever. Boutiques featuring
everything from high-end fashion to beachwear line the
streets, and with some of the world's best windsurfing
spots in the area, you're sure to find an opportunity
to put your new gear to good use. Because it sits along
the route to Hana, the town is pleasantly devoid of major
resorts and offers a great stopping-off place
for a few hours or a few days."

Our notes:

We are within one mile of all North Shore Beaches: Baldwin, Tavares, Paia Bay, Mama's and Ho'okipa. We are on the mo
host_about: Aloha,  It would be a pleasure to host you at one of our Spyglass Maui Rentals and share the "Aloha" of the island with you. We have two units: the Gingerbread House and the Green Turtle House. Poni, the owner, is a musician, singer-song writer, surfer, home owner, and lover of nature. All of us on the Spyglass Maui team care about the environment, and like to stay healthy and active.  We hope you enjoy your stay with us.

The resort is 1 block from Front Street and the water front, restaurants, gelato shops, art galleries, shops, and bars. 505 Beach is just a 10 minute walk and other beautiful beaches are within a 10 minute drive. Enjoy our piece of paradise. Aloha!

The space
Lovely two bedroom/two bath condominium at Aina Nalu in Lahaina, Maui, HI. Minutes walk to Front Street where all the shops, restaurants, & Art Galleries are. 10 Minute walk to beach. 10 minute drive to fabulous beaches. Salt water infinity pool with spectacular views of the mountains and a chlorine pool. Four stainless steel BBQs on the property. New A/C units in each room. One king bed, one queen bed, and one queen pull-out sofabed. Granite kitchen, slate showe
neighborhood_overview: Lahaina Town is the center of the action with restaurants, water front, gelato, shave ice, art galleries, bars...  Aina Nalu is only a short 3 or 4 minute walk to Front Street.  However, it's far enough away to be very quiet and have a peaceful Zen-like atmosphere at the resort.

name: Prime Oceanfront 3BD Menehune Shores 414!
description:
Hawaii Life Vacations presents a spacious oceanfront 3bd with stunning views.

The space
Located front and center on the fourth-floor, this spacious 3BR/2BA Menehune Shores condo offers unbeatable views of the sparkling ocean below. Enjoy the sounds of the waves lapping the shore as you are situated toward the ocean side and far from the road.

Take a dip in the heated pool, or enjoy long walks and a swim at the protected beach just steps from the condo. The lanai is perfect for enjoying sunset dinners or whale watching —with stunning panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean and West Maui Mountains.

Menehune Shores is a beautifully manicured property in a low-traffic area of North Kihei. With the beach and pool so close, this is the perfect spot for a relaxing family vacation.

Play a game of shuffleboard or host a BBQ right on the water. For a meal out, dine at the on-site restaurant, or drive to other nearby island favorites.
neighborhood_overview: Menehune Shores is located in a quiet neighborhood on the ocean side of South Kihei Road.
host_about: I live on the island of Maui with my family. Originally from Las Vegas, NV, I moved here 11 years ago and love sharing my passion for the island lifestyle. I am a licensed Real Estate Broker with Hawaii Life Real Estate Brokers and am the full time property manager for this wonderful condo. I work with my wife and assistant Kristin to ensure our guests have a truly unforgettable Maui experience.

name: ~Seaside to Summit~Kona Hawaii USA~
description:
Aloha Friends! Welcome Remote Workers and IronMan Triathletes!

The legendary IronMan course takes athletes through the barren lava fields and calls upon athletes to find the spirit of aloha within themselves!

Welcome to Hale Ho'okipa ~ House of Rest and Refreshment, only a short drive to the shore and summit! And where internet speed is always HIGH!

E Komo Mai ~ Come visit us!

Aloha nui,
Trish
Ask me about my two vehicles - available to guests at discounted rates.

The space
***Welcome to Hale Ho'okipa (House of Rest and Refreshment)!***

*The unit is attached to the main house, yet fully private with its own entrance. It consists of one bedroom and one bathroom with shower. The bedroom and bathroom are on the same level and are kept cool with an air conditioning unit. The AC is adequate for use in the bedroom and bathroom only. Just down stairs from the air conditioned bedroom is the living room ar
neighborhood_overview:
We are located in a safe residential neighborhood. There is some road noise, though the large front lawn is normally a good buffer. Other sounds are the occasional rogue rooster, wild birds - cardinal, myna, and papaya. And there is one rascal, over friendly cat that lives on the property.

We are 5 to 10 minutes from favorite restaurants like: Huggos on the Rocks, Big Island Grill, TK Noodle House, Umeke's, Fumi's Kitchen, Lava Java, and Fish Hopper to name a few. Also a number of awesome wifi cafe's like: Papa Kona, Kona Coffee and Tea, and Kona Haven. We are 10 minutes from the King Kamehameha Hotel where the best Luau (Hawaiian Feast) and Polynesian Review is held every week. This landmark hotel is also host to the annual Kona IronMan Triathlon World Championships, with several historical sights on the property.
host_about: Born and raised in the Islands,  I lived abroad a number of years, raised two sons, and am home again in the Islands. I have a deep love and respect for this place and the lahui (people) of Hawaii.  Some favorite things to do at home in the islands -  swimming alongside our ancient and graceful honu (turtle), sitting beside the waterfalls of Waipio, visiting our awe inspiring active volcanoes, and playing in the garden. Today I'm blessed and thankful to be helping travelers enjoy the wonder of this place too!
