name: Garden Suite at Onomea
description:
A lovely, private and very clean cottage with all amenities for a comfortable and peaceful stay. Quiet, and cool the year around, we are a 20 minute walk from the Hawaii Tropical Botanical Garden and well situated for touring to Waipio Valley, Akaka Falls, Volcano National Park, and many other destinations in the area. Come see the real Hawaii.... lush, tropical, friendly and far less touristy than the Kona side. We would love to have you come and stay! Please take a look at our reviews.

The space
Aloha!
Our country estate is in Onomea, 6 miles north of Hilo, on 5 tropical acres with garden and ocean views. The Garden Suite at Onomea is a private cottage with views of flowering royal Poinciana trees, mango, lychee, mountain apple trees, monkeypod trees, and coconut palms. The most repeated description by our guests is 'peaceful'. The suite has a studio layout... bedroom, living room and kitchenette all in one very ample space, and a lovely stone-
neighborhood_overview: This specific area.... Onomea... is one of the lovliest neighborhoods on the island.  It's peaceful and unhurried with no 'downside' surprises such as noisy neighbors or an unsightly approach to the house. Our home is on five acres of mixed lawn, garden and forest. It's very private and during your stay you will rarely encounter my wife and I unless you reach out by text or phone.
host_about:
Randall:  Coffee with half and half the moment I get up.  Zazen. Re-watch a Coen brothers or Fellini movie once every so often.   A bit of photography.  

Donna:  Tea the moment she gets up!  The most wonderful wife you could ever imagine!  Thai food.  Boogie boarding.  Theater!!   Did I mention tea?

name: Majestic Princeville "Cliffs" Condo
description:
Princeville is one of the most majestic places in the world and our spacious condo allows you to take in beautiful views of the mountains.
Corner unit, tons of natural light, 2 lanais (off bedroom and living room) offering gorgeous views and cooling ocean breeze. Full kitchen, in unit laundry, and 2 full bathrooms.
We help meet your adventure needs with beach chairs, boogie boards, towels, snorkel gear, etc.

The space
The world renowned "Cliffs" has been awarded the 2018 RCI Green award for it's outstanding sustainable practices. Enjoy the fabulous grounds, amenities, and activities offered here. Swimming, tennis, affordable bike rentals, Yoga on the Cliffs, Botanical walks- just to name a few. Less than a mile to Princeville Center and the gorgeous Hanalei Valley lookout, where you can enjoy waterfall views after the rain. Short drive to downtown Hanalei and the pier and bay (my favorite beach for relaxing).

License number
5400
neighborhood_overview: Up on the Cliffs, but close to beaches, golf courses, and town. You will be in awe of this lush wonderland and we will provide you tips on the "best" of the area.
host_about: I am a Psychologist who has found her own self-care in traveling. I love to go to new places and meet new people through Airbnb. The first time I visited Kauai, it was love at first sight and have dreamed of owning a condo there. Making that dream come true, and sharing it with others, is a tremendous joy.

name: Home & Garden near Kailua beach
description:
Lush tropical gardens make this home into a quiet, comfortable retreat. Large enough for six adults, plus two small keiki (children). Views of the dramatic Koolau mountains surround this lovely family home. Designed by famous Hawaii architect. TA-119-399-0144-01

The space
Lush tropical gardens make this home into a quiet, comfortable retreat. Large enough for six adults, plus two small keiki (children). This home was designed by the late Vladimir Ossipoff, award-winning Hawaii architect. Mr. Ossipoff’s trademark includes open-plans blessed by the trade winds. Views of the dramatic Koolau mountains surround this lovely family home.

10-minute walk to nearest Beach access. Kailua Beach Park and Lanikai are just a 7-minute drive.

Three bedrooms, 2 baths. The master bedroom has a private bath, a queen-size four-poster bed, TV and air conditioning. Bedroom 2 has a full bed and big closet. BR 3 has queen bed, A/C and full closet. Two lanai, outdo
neighborhood_overview: Kailua is the home of two of the world's most famous and beautiful beaches, Kailua Beach and Lanikai Beach. The town is loaded with upscale shops and restaurants yet has a local charm due to its population of artists, free spirits and wonderfully warm people. This is where President Obama spent his Christmas holiday while he served as President, need we say more.
host_about: We are a family who owns this house in the beautiful beach town of Kailua, on the windward side of Oahu.

name: Nice, Big House near Beaches and Lava Fields
description:
This Nice Big House is perfect for families (6-7 people) who need a lot of space and want to visit the local beaches and lava fields. Kehena black sand beach is just 5 minutes away and there are also new beaches at Pohoiki and Mackenzie. You can hike the local lava fields in Kalapana and areas caused by the Leilani Lava Flow (is) Pohoiki Beach. You are also close to Volcanoes Nat’l Park.
We are 4 miles from a market, restaurant at Uncles, cafe at Kaimu and popular tourist destinations in Puna.

The space
Perfect for 1-7 people. This is a fully furnished 3 bedroom/1.5 bath town house w/ ‘your space all to yourself' w/ full kitchen and 1.5 baths . It has a nice ocean view in the distance ( 10 blocks away)
Amenities include free phone, free Wi-Fi internet, and Direct TV / Roku (3) 40-55 inch TV’s flat screen TV's & free Netflix in . Parking is FREE by your front door

This is a modern town house all to your self. It does have a private studio o
neighborhood_overview: This is a remote and beautiful coastal community called Kalapana Seaview Estates close to several black sand beaches & walking distance to the ocean and Kehena Black Sand Beach.
host_about: We love Hawaii and the aloha spirit. People are generally happy and friendly here. Once you arrive in Hawaii - you realize that you have come to a special place - far from the rat race that you may experience in many big cities. We have traveled ourselves and have learned how beautiful this place really is. We enjoy being involved in the vacation rental business and visitors are so glad that they came here. We have heard many guests say that they either want to come again and wished that they stayed longer.

name: Spacious, Great Location. Close to Beaches!
description:
Our condo is romantic, cozy, quiet and close to the beaches. We are centrally located (30 mins from airport). The coordinated living and dining room furniture are accented by the flowing curtains by the private Lanai. We have an oak, full size, futon. The kitchen is fully equipped and not missing anything for home cooking with stainless steel cookware. Custom Levelor curtains block out all night light. Shared washer, dryer in complex.

Other things to note
Our "On Island Contact" is Donnie Almazan.

License number
390160270009, TA-131-200-4608-01
neighborhood_overview:
Kalama Terrace is located in beautiful South Maui in the town of Kihei where rain is a rarity almost assuring you of a warm, sunny vacation. The condo has locked gates for added security and a resident manager that is very vigilant. With only a 30 minute drive from Kahului airport, you could be basking on the beach sunning, swimming and just enjoying the tropical setting of Maui within a very short time of arriving on Maui. Since 'our' beach faces the western horizon, you will enjoy some of the most memorable sunsets you will see anywhere.
It is an easy four minute stroll to Cove Park and famous Charley Young Beach. Across from this park is a Foodland grocery store, superb restaurants, sidewalk cafes, etc.
Golf is available within 15 minutes at numerous fantastic courses.
host_about: Sausalito, California. Photographer.

Beautiful Bed and Breakfast in South Maui. Breakfast served daily on the lanai over looking Maalea Bay and the South Maui Beaches. Views of Haleakala and the West Maui Mountains.

A Cute Waikiki Studio conveniently Located Near the Convention Center, Mall, and Grocery Store. Its Affordable, Clean, and Tidy !!

This is a Cute little Studio that is clean and comfortable, situated right outside of Waikiki.

The location is great for those who want to be near the Mall, and convention Center. There is no Lanai, but the View is really Nice and the unit has central Air that pulls in fresh air from the outside to keep the climate just right.

There is a single bed, and a couch that pulls out into a Queen bed for those couples that want to sleep together., Small dining area, and Kitchen with a two burner cook top stove, large fridge, toaster oven, and coffee maker. There are pots and pans, cooking Knives, cutting board, cooking utensils, cutlery.

This Unit has everything you need to enjoy a visit to Oahu.

The building has 24 hour security, a Pool, Sauna, Weight/Exercise Room,

A great quite place to come spend some quality time in Waikiki

The space
The "Shangri-La" YOUR HOME AWAY FROM HOME

Great Views, Great Amenities, Great Price

The Shangrila is a spacious 450+ sqft apartment with Lanai/Balcony on the 20th Floor of the Fairway Villa Complex.

It boasts an Ocean/Diamond Head/Alawai Canal Golf Course View and has everything you would need to come relax and enjoy a few weeks or even months in Hawaii.

You are 10 minutes from the Beach, and Shopping, Dining and Restaurants are all within reach. Safeway and Food land are a short 10 min drive up Kapahulu Rd. for groceries.

name: The Coconut Lanai in Seaview***
description:
TA #136-997-9392-01

The space
A private exterior staircase takes you up to The Coconut Lanai. The breezes off the Kalapana Coast rustle through the coconut tree canopy that surrounds this airy upstairs apartment. Seven sets of sliding glass doors and a walk-around covered lanai encircling the entire apartment and provide the open and verdant feeling of a tree house. The manager and local artist, Heather Wilkinson, lives downstairs in this two-story house in Seaview Kalapana Estates with her dog Lupita. Heather will be your source for how to get the most out of your stay on the Puna (east side) of the Big Island of Hawaii.
Your unit accommodates two persons and consists of a living room, dining area and kitchen in an open floor plan. The large bathroom and a bedroom with brand new queen size bed both open onto the lanai. The living room has a full size fold-out sofa bed and a partial ocean view. The kitchen, which is fully equipped, has a microwave oven, ga
neighborhood_overview: The Coconut Lanai is just a short drive to Kehena Black sand beach, Uncle Roberts Wednesday night market, and McKenzie state park,  the edge of the recent lava flow.
host_about: I have lived on the Big Island for 15 years, and have been running this Airbnb for 12 years now.  I work as a real estate agent and also create art work that adorns much of my neighbors yards and homes.  I enjoy exploring the Big Island, traveling, landscaping, dancing, swimming with dolphins and making art.

name: The Cliffs  Resort Spacious & Lovely 1 b/2ba
description:
Get a much needed change of scenery in our spacious, private and bright one bedroom, two bath, 2nd floor suite on Kauai’s lovely north shore. Special rates for one month or more!

Our home offers all the peaceful serenity you desire with the resort amenities and local attractions for a quiet getaway or an active holiday.

The space
Enjoy all the comforts of home, in our clean and sanitized home with a large living area and bedroom, full kitchen and many amenities. The bedroom has a comfy king-size bed and offers views of the mountains from its private lanai. It includes an en-suite full bathroom, while an equally spacious living room offers a very comfy queen-size pull out sofa bed (trust me!) , with a full guest bathroom. Each room has a large television with free WiFi and internet. We just installed two new ceiling fans as well to help enjoy the incredible ocean breeze. We offer a full kitchen to prepare delicious meals using the freshest ingredients
neighborhood_overview:
The Cliffs Resort is appropriately situated on a lovely cliff with gorgeous grounds and beautiful ocean views. The surrounding neighborhood is quiet.

Only 3 miles from gorgeous Hanalei Bay in one direction and about the same to Anini Beach in the other, Princeville, offers a plethora of activities including surfing, snorkeling, kayaking, scuba, bicycling, tennis, and miles of gorgeous hiking trails. Or just sunning on the beach! Lush with waterfalls, the North Shore must be experienced. The world-renowned Makai Golf Course is adjacent to the resort.

Just a few of minutes away is the Princeville Shopping Center with several great restaurants, a great wine shop, a grocery store, a public library and boutiques stores.

The Activities Desk can assist with booking incredible attractions such as:
Kauai Waterfall Picnic Tour
Na Pali Coast Catamaran Snorkeling Cruise
Kauai ECO Adventure Helicopter Tour
Wailua River and Secret Falls Kayak & H

name: Tropical Garden Retreat on an Organic Mango Farm
description:
Soak up the sun and unwind in the abundant outdoor living space which blends seamlessly with the interior of this stunning ground-level retreat. The home is constructed with architectural cedar poles and the living space is expansive an open air, allowing you to enjoy the natural world around you. Both the bedroom and kitchen are enclosed. The space is decorated in an exotic, Modern-meets-Indonesian style.

Things to Note: There is also an Airbnb in the upstairs unit ~ with no shared spaces. And, depending on the time of year/rain, there can be mosquitoes and bugs in the outside spaces.

License number
GE-018-020-1472-01
neighborhood_overview:
We are 1 mile from spectacular Kealakekua Bay, host to turquoise water with amazing visibility, beautiful coral reefs & exotic tropical marine life including spinner dolphins. The Bay offers world-class snorkeling, paddle boarding and kayaking. Surfing is also available nearby at Ke'ei, and Kahaluu. Also nearby: Big Island Bees, Peleaku Peace Gardens, Painted Church, Puuhonua a Honaunau...

We are a HOSTED rental, which is legally required for agriculturally zoned vacation rentals like ours.
host_about: We are a family of three living in a wonderful community in South Kona Hawaii and thriving off farming, sunshine, and ocean water.

name: Brazilian Pepper Suite
description:
The Brazilian Pepper Suite is located on the dry side of Waimea and is in the charming and quiet "Nob Hill" area. It is walking distance to town and a short drive to the BEST beaches on the island! Fully furnished with a kitchen, private bath, laundry, garden lanai, WIFI. 4 night minimum.

The space
Beautifully appointed private apartment in the heart of Waimea, w/in walking distance to town. Waimea is centrally located between Kona, Hilo and Hawi. We offer our guests a beautifully appointed apartment with a private entrance, private bathroom, full kitchen, laundry facilities, and lovely garden lanai. This is a great area for walking and there are excellent restaurants, coffee shops, and amenities nearby. This neighborhood is VERY quiet, an end of the culdesac location. This 1 BR apartment which sleeps up to 3 guests is only 15 minutes to the BEST beaches on the big Island! We graciously accept stays of 5 nights or more.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: Upscale "Nob Hill" close to town with great walks all around.  Home is very private and quiet.
host_about: Lea, born and raised on the Island of Hawaii, just returned with her husband, Pat. We think Waimea is the very best place to live -- central, a little cooler and surrounded by an adorable town.  We offer Hawaiian hospitality to travelers who are looking for an authentic island experience.  We love the Big Island and know it well. The best part of hosting is getting to share tips and tricks with our guests and make sure they see the real deal while staying with us.

name: Oceanfront Westin Nanea Resort. 2 bedroom villa.
description:
Newly opened in Spring of 2017, this stunning resort sits on 16 acres of Ka'anapali Beach, and has spectacular grounds and first class amenities. "Nanea" is a Hawaiian word meaning "a state of relaxation" and that is what you will feel when you get the pleasure of staying here. The resort displays a number of Hawaiian artifacts and art all over. The history of Hawaii is told through the varied decor and experiences.

The space
Our gorgeous two bedroom villa is a vacation in itself! With 1260 square feet of heaven. Two bedrooms both with King size beds and two bathrooms. The luxurious master bathroom features a large shower, a stand-alone soaking tub and a double-sink vanity. The living area has a wardrobe armoire and a Queen size sleeper sofa and a Bose sound system. The beautiful, fully equipped kitchen comes with stainless steel appliances including a refrigerator and ice maker, dishwasher, stovetop, microwave and oven. The kitchen also includes a coffee maker,
neighborhood_overview: A shuttle travels between 4 sister resorts and many landmarks like the Lahaina Cannery Mall, Outlets of Maui and the Wharf Cinema Center. The resorts prime position on Ka'anapali Beach ensures you'll enjoy no shortage of recreational activities, including snorkeling, paddle boarding and scuba diving. Unwind with a rejuvenating treatment at Spa Helani and savor authentic Hawaiian cuisine at Mauka Makai.

name: Waipouli Beach Resort with Fine Art
description:
This luxurious ocean view condo is located in the one of the most desirable ocean front resorts on the island. This 1BD/2BH unit is good for up to 4 people. The resort has all 5-star amenities and the best ocean front restaurant Oasis on the Beach

The space
This ocean view condo located at building H at Waipouli Beach Resort and is upgraded with designers furnishing and original Fine Art. The resort opened for visitors in 2007 and has this great fresh feel like nothing else on the Garden Isle of Hawaii. Fine ocean front dining is offered on the premises by well-known Oasis by Sea and being loved by our guests as well as locals.

Guest access
Lazy river pool with two water slides and three sandy bottom hot spas. The part of the pool has a kids section with sandy bottom. Beach towels, chairs, BBQ are available for the guests as at any 5 star resort. One of the best restaurants on the island The Oasis on the Beach is just few steps away from th
neighborhood_overview: The location couldn't be any better to explore the entire island. It's only 12-15 min drive from the airport and half way between the South and North Shores. The Natural food store Papaya's is located just across the street along with many other local businesses and stores. Many more restaurants are just a couple minutes away in Kapaa.
host_about:
Hey there! I love traveling but not being a tourist. I surf and my travel destinations are influenced by locations of the best surf spots around the world. While traveling I experience places the way locals do. It gives me a very different perspective. It helps to absorb local customs, culture, languages and little things no tourist will notice from an open air bus deck. Having being to 50+ countries I tend to stay longer in places I love most: New York, Paris, San Francisco, Biarritz, Buenos Aires, Kauai, Costa Rica. AirBnB is a perfect tool to help me find cool places to stay at and share those of my own. 
The most incredible part is to have four amazing women supporting me on this journey - my mom, my sister, my wife and my little daughter (in order of appearance:)). I am a lucky man and happy to share this with you!

name: LARGE ocean-view home: 3br/13bd/4ba, pool+jacuzzi
description:
Lako House is a large 3-bedroom ocean-view estate family home with 3046 sq-ft total living space.

Main House (3-bedrooms) has a total of 2 king beds + 1 double bed + 10 single beds totaling 13 beds. Sleeping double in king & double beds give a max occupancy of 16 persons. SEPARATED OHANA UNIT NOT AVAILABLE to rent.

IMPORTANT: Airbnb does NOT indicate nor collect short term rental taxes for Hawaii State/County (as of Jan 2022: 17.962%), taxes will be collected SEPARATELY by Lako House.

The space
Amazing 180 degree panoramic view of the Big Island's west coast ocean views from backyard / poolside lanai ...

Quiet 'Komohana' residential sub-division and is 10mi / 16km south of Kona (KOA) airport; 1mi / 2km from downtown.

Large Main House has in total 3 bedrooms, 13 beds, 4 baths. Lako Main House has all the full amenities that you'd find at home.

Two person stay ==> Master room only; other rooms locked
neighborhood_overview:
The property is on a 19,000 square-foot lot and has trees and very tall & thick greenery separating the nearest three neighbors' property to the east and the south. Lako Street is to the north (~3-4 blocks up the hill) and to the west (ocean view direction), the property sits on top of a 30-foot high wall and with a 180-degree view, overlooks the ocean and properties far below (no neighbors).

Activities nearby: At the beaches: Swimming, Snorkeling/Diving, Surfing. In the ocean: Sailing, parasailing, Fishing. Everywhere else: Biking, Hiking, Golf, Tennis, Shopping, Sightseeing, Restaurants, Cinemas/Movie Theaters. Kona and the 'Big Island' has it all!

Other Activities:
Walk, Drive or Transit to Shopping & Dining, Drive by car to nearest in-town shopping or dining is less than 5 minutes away, Downtown is 5-10 minutes away, The closest Beach (Kahalu'u Beach Park) is about 5-minutes by car. In the Kailua-Kona area, the nearest beaches are along the road cal
host_about: We love people, music, travel, sun, food.  Lako House has been in business over 22years now and we typically host 30-40 groups each year.  Please take some time to check out our place, read the reviews, and ask us any questions that you may have ... Aloha, bill & kei

name: Volcano Artist Cottage
description:
August Special - $150. 00 Per night. Book now! Our Romantic Volcano Artist Cottage is located adjacent to Hawaii Volcanoes National Park on a 3-acre historic garden estate. Our intimate cottage has a queen sized bed, a kitchenette, stocked with breakfast fixings. Receive 10% off all purchases at award-winning Café Ono and our fine art gallery. We offer free Wifi, cable TV, and library for our cottage guests. BEST OF ALL WE DO NOT CHARGE ANY CLEANING FEES!

The space
The Volcano Artist Cottage is a recently restored one bedroom redwood vacation cottage, set on a lush 3 acre garden estate located in Volcano village adjacent to Hawaii Volcanoes National Park. We have native Hawaiian Forest trails onsite for you to explore.

Our cottage offers a fully equipped kitchenette, Zen bathroom, beautifully lit skylights, heater for cool Volcano nights.

Amenities include: free wifi, Cable TV, DVD's, Library, Complimentary Toiletries, Robes & Sli
neighborhood_overview:
Volcano Village has been hailed as a model "gateway town" to a major national park. Instead of strip malls, fast food restaurants and hotel chains, visitors approaching Hawaii Volcanoes National Park see...trees. Most houses, and even businesses, are tucked back in the cool high-altitude tropical rainforest. They're surrounded by native ohia trees, luxurious giant tree ferns, and native birds found nowhere else on earth. It's place where you can have all the privacy you want. At night, guests at the Artist's Cottage share the grounds only with Nobel the rescued rabbit—but are still only a short walk from the village center. It’s the sort of place where people not only feel safe to go for a walk at night but will give a friendly wave to strangers.


Such a place draws a unique breed of resident. Geologists, artists, nature lovers from all over the world, as ethnically diverse as they are tolerant and creative, call Volcano "home." It's a great place to have fascinating
host_about:
A Native New Yorker, who came to Hawaii on vacation over 40 years ago and never left!  Ira is the Director/Founded of Volcano Garden Arts, created on a historic 1908 Garden Estate. Today, it boasts a beautiful Native Hawaiian Garden, Art Gallery and Award winning Café Ono, which has a gourmet vegetarian menu. As a full-time Artist, Ira’s work is collected throughout the US, Europe and Japan. The Art gallery features Ira’s works as well as works from over 100 local artists. 
Ira enjoys hosting visitors from across the globe, sharing his beautiful gardens and art work. He is a gracious and open host and enjoys sharing stories.

The Plumeria hosts a weekly Free-Food-BYOB BBQ (weather permitting) for residents and guests alike.

The Plumeria is a property nestled under a variety of native trees and tucked within a security fence covered with flowering bougainvillea vines – midway between Waikiki and downtown Honolulu. The buildings are the original 1950's construction, with some minor remodeling and fixture upgrades done in the '80s. There are 3 buildings on the property consisting of shared apartment units and private st
host_about: My name is Richard Stancliff. I have served as host and manager at The Plumeria since April, 2011. I previously vacationed in Hawaii and loved it so much I now spend a good part of the year in Honolulu.  At age 68, I'm semi-retired and find that this lifestyle fits very well.  Some work in the mornings and early afternoons, then the beach and perhaps Waikiki.   Does it get any better than this?

name: Hawaiian Tropical Hideaway Cottage
description:
Perfect couple's getaway. Delightful, cozy and nestled in a tropical garden setting. Great for single's too, the cottage has often been used as a writers retreat, or just a plain retreat. Included in price 13.25% Hawaii Taxes.

The space
The cottage contains a private kitchen including a full double sized sink, medium sized refrigerator, stove. The kitchen is complete with pots/pans & cutlery for preparing meals and a full compliment of dish ware.
The home is innovatively designed, features custom workmanship, fine art pieces, cathedral ceilings with an open-concept design, comfortable furniture, with an indoor glass wall shower.
The tropical garden makes this reasonably priced hideaway a pleasure for travelers to hang out, simply relax and enjoy, away from the outside world.

Guest access
The cottage and the cottage garden is for the guests exclusive use. The guests are welcome to roam all of the garden areas freely. They are also
neighborhood_overview:
The Big Island of Hawaii's, North Kohala is a travelers' delight, off the beaten path, it makes the area one of Hawaii's best-kept secrets. Experience ''Old Hawaii'' in the charming historic towns of Hawi and Kapaau, with artists' shops, galleries, and delightful cafes. Historic sites in walking distance to the famous statue of King Kamehameha. Pololu Valley - with its majestic views, black sand beach, and scenic hiking trails is a ten minute drive. Or just chill out, and enjoy some of the island's best beaches. Whale watching is seasonal (December through April), but the sea turtle and dolphin sightings occur all year-round.
The Kamehameha Park which offers free pool, free tennis courts, a weight room and a 9 holes community golf course (for $12), is minutes walk away.
host_about: Spiritual, Love the Island and the ocean.

neighborhood_overview:
Waikīkī (/waɪkiːˈkiː/; Hawaiian: [vɐiˈkiːˈkiː] or [wɐiˈkiːˈkiː]) is a beachfront neighborhood of Honolulu, on the south shore of the island of Oʻahu, in Hawaii, United States. Waikiki is best known for Waikīkī Beach, the white sand beach shoreline fronting the neighborhood.

Waikīkī is home to public places including Kapiʻolani Park, Fort de Russy Military Reservation, Kahanamoku Lagoon, Kūhiō Beach Park, and Ala Wai Harbor.

name: Oceanfront Penthouse Vistas
description:
Completely remodeled penthouse 1bedroom 1 bathroom oceanfront condo on the top floor!
Located in the sunny and vibrant beach town of Kihei. Beach chairs, umbrellas, luxury beach towels and a cooler are provided to enjoy your day at the beach! We strive to achieve a welcoming and thoughtful retreat for your stay in the magical valley isle. Dine out at one of the many restaurants nearby or play chef in our fully stocked kitchen, you will enjoy your new home away from home in Maui.

The space
We want you to feel at home the moment you open the door. Our condo is located in Kauhale Makai “Village by the Sea”, a community nestled up against a charming beach; perfect to catch the most amazing sunsets. The property amenities include two pools, a hot tub, volleyball court, shuffleboard decks, putting green, several community BBQ grills with picnic tables and evening tiki torches. Surrounded by beautifully manicured grounds swaying with palm trees and banana trees.
neighborhood_overview: Kihei is located at the base of Haleakala, a sprawling and majestic 10,000 foot high volcano. Stunning views of the mountain are everywhere. Lined with miles of beaches, local food & shopping, and close proximity to many activities. Fun fact about Hawaii- all beaches are public! There is no such thing as a private beach anywhere in the state. Together with neighboring Wailea, the area enjoys numerous shops, restaurants and “happy hour” opportunities.  Kauhale Makai is a short distance from many grocery stores, including a Safeway, Times and Foodland. If you prefer Costco or Target swing by on your way from the airport!
host_about: Traveling on company business trips five days a week for eighteen years has taught us what is important to guests. This inspired us to create the ideal environment and provide the right amenities for the perfect stay.  Happiness can be about the journey that produces it and we found it on Maui, the “ valley island”.  After visiting Maui for many years on vacation for a break from business travel, we moved here permanently a few years ago. We chose Kihei, a relaxed ocean front surfing community that thrives with the aloha spirit! We welcome you into our Ohana.

host_about:
My wife, Rachel, and I first visited Kauai in the early eighties and just got hooked. We bought our first vacation rental property in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) at Sandpiper Village in Princeville and spent about 5-1/2 months renovating it.  We dreamed that one day we might be able to make Kauai our permanent home, and we were fortunate to actually make this happen in January of (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) We bought our second vacation rental property at Puamana in August of last year (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , as our second vacation rental property. and after a renovation period, placed it on line as a 3 bedroom 2 bath townhouse vacation rental.
My wife still works as a flight attendant and I am retired (for all the guys out there, I'll be writing a book soon about how to make that happen).  However, I keep busy managing both properties, when we're not dancing, playing softball/tennis, or at the beach.  One of the advantages of living here on Kauai and offering vacation properties for rent is that any issues with units that may arise are addressed immediately and decisively through direct communication between the guests and me, the owner. There is no go-between management company in the loop to delay any action that may be required.  It's a win-win for everyone.
Mahalo for visiting AirBNB and if you have any questions, call me at home (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) or cell (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) 
Karl & Rachel Forer

name: Kealakekua Bay at Manini Beach
description:
Leisurely rest in this romantic, privately gated custom home. With open beam ceilings throughout, feel at home with two large, comfortable bedrooms, each with a private bathroom, only a breath away from Kealakekua Bay! The huge, open lanai is furnished and comfortable for entertaining.
Kayak rentals are available down the road by the ocean to explore the bay, view the Captain Cook monument and snorkel the beautiful underwater ocean sanctuary which is teaming with colorful reef fish, turtles...

The space
For a quiet getaway to Old Hawaii, visit our cozy yet classy, comfortable beach home at Manini Beach, the South side of Kealakekua Bay where world class snorkeling, swimming with the dolphins and green sea turtles are enjoyed daily. Hikes and historical sights and adventures are all within walking distance. 2 minutes walk to the mouth of the ocean. Enjoy plenty of parking, internet, and many fruit trees surrounded by tropical flowers.

NOTE: There
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood depicts 'old Hawaii', you can feel how it was to sail into Kealakekua Bay, pristine water, teaming with reef fish, Green sea turtles, Spinner dolphins and Humpback whales in the winter months. There is an interesting mix of indigenous local Hawaiians, local Filipino's, transplants from the mainland and vacationers from all over the world who reside together in harmony.
host_about:
I live on the Kona Coast of the Big Island of Hawaii at Kealakekua Bay.
I own and operate the Blue Ginger Gallery in Kainaliu, Hawaii showcasing over 70 local artists/crafts persons work and my own hand painted silks for 36 years!
I love the ocean, snorkeling, paddle board, bike riding, kayaking and wind surfing! I have skied Mauna Kea on several occasions then body surf at Hapuna Beach.

The great room with cathedral ceiling has a well equipped kitchen, dining and living room area. The large bathroom has granite tiled floors and counters, a shower, bath tub and washer and dryer. Tropical hardwoods are used throughout the cottage.

The space
Experience the true aloha spirit staying in our studio on our 10 acre private estate and botanical garden located in the North Kohala district on the big island of Hawaii. In a very private and lush garden setting, fill all your senses with the delight that this cottage offers. The cottage comes with one queen bed bedroom and a queen bed loft, full kitchen, bath, laundry center, Wifi, and covered lanai. Tropical hardwood trim, cedar ceiling and solid wood and natural stone tile floors add another touch of tropical beauty. Driv
neighborhood_overview: We are in the country...very rural, peaceful and quiet with the historic village of Hawi within walking distance. This quaint and lively village has many excellent restaurants, art galleries, local shops, a popular coffee shop and live music for your enjoyment. name: Custom Home on 10 acres with sweeping ocean views
description:
Spectacular custom-built 3 bedroom 3 bath quartzite-stone sided home of 3000 square feet including a spacious lanai with sweeping ocean views from the entire house. Our home is located on Lokahi Garden Sanctuary, a 10 acre private estate, botanical garden and organic farm located in historic Hawi on the Big Island of Hawaii. We are practicing ENHANCED COVID CLEANING prior to your arrival.

The space
Come stay and relax at this custom stone-sided custom built home on a 10 acre private estate. The house is built with loving care and attention to details by the owners.

Our home is perfect for gatherings of family and friends. Quiet and peaceful, with lush gardens and well manicured grounds. The views of the ocean, and Maui, are breathtaking from all of the bedrooms, the living room and the lanai. You can experience magical sunsets every night while relaxing on the lanai or in the hammock.

This well appointed home has Brazilian Cherry ha
neighborhood_overview: We are in the country...very rural, peaceful and quiet with the historic village of Hawi within walking distance. This  quaint and lively village has many excellent restaurants, art galleries, local shops, a popular coffee shop and live music for your enjoyment. Ocean swimming is just 10 minutes away and world class beaches, resorts, and golf just 30 minutes away. Nearby there are numerous hikes to waterfalls, sea cliffs and rain forests.

name: Hoshidana Studio 1 Ke'ei District
description:
A recycled renovated studio under a historic 'hoshidana' roof, in an up-country Kona coffee district in Ke'ei.

The space
A rustic charming hideaway tucked along side a Kona barn. Its in the District of Ke'ei, a rumbly up country strip of old lava fields, now sandwiched with some of the best soils-we cultivate some-to grow coffee cherry! Once a retired coffee mill, the barn is now a wood shop, (and man-cave). But, don't worry historians, we saved all moveable parts, with plans to incorporate these in an artful way! Traveler enthusiasts and cyclists will enjoy our proximity to nature, by foot, bike or car. We are up at a cooler elevation among the trees; Mac nuts, coffees, and tropical fruits. We are nearby the beach, a nice down hill bike ride every morning(approx. 7 miles). If you need a fix or tow, and we're around, you can give us a call! Tropically furnished coffee shack. Cozy studio room, one bath, with full kitchen, in country setting. Garden view, Full size
neighborhood_overview:
Great local beaches in Kealakekua Bay.
Manini
Two Step
Pu'uohonua Honaunau
Hookena
Milolii
Greenwell Coffee Tours
Mamalahoa Hot Tubs
host_about: We are a wife and husband couple in our early 60's, parents of 3 splendid adults, all living in the Hawaii island chain. We share the love of communication and hospitality with world travelers in this tropical landscape. Living and working in paradise, we support a large animal family, and  grow infamous Kona coffee cherries(beans) in late summer. We also grow Macadamias, Jack fruit, Bread Fruit(Ulu), avocados, citrus, and enough bananas to keep us in pies, bread, and smoothies all year! Currently we support the Ulu Cooperative locally, where they turn bread fruits into gluten free flour, and have created fresh to freezer bags of several local (meatless) food staples. They are available now in the freezer section at Longs CVS. We welcome your interest and questions, and to stay here in our Hawaii home. Join us!

name: Honaunau Farm Retreat - Garden Cottage
description:
Honaunau Farm Wellness Retreat is a 7 acre organic, regenerative farm with sweeping views of Kealakekua Bay with lush tropical surroundings. The Cottage is a spacious canvas structure with an outdoor full kitchen and lanai. It has access to our retreat area with shared use of the outdoor shower, infrared sauna and yoga studio. We are 45 minutes from Kona International Airport and 10 minutes from the ocean with great beaches, snorkeling, and other activities.
*CAR RENTAL AVAILABLE ONSITE*

The space
The Garden Cottage has a comfortable king size bed, an amazing view of the ocean and gardens from the porch with outdoor kitchen, fully outfitted with refrigerator, stove, and kitchen appliances. This is a very comfortable space that connects guests to Hawaii's natural environment.

The cottage shares use of the outdoor shower area with composting toilet. There is also a second outdoor shower with a flush toilet under the main guest house for your c
neighborhood_overview: We are located in a rural, tropical agricultural zone in the heart of Kona coffee and tropical fruit farmlands. With very little disturbance from light and with the wide view of the sky, viewing stars or watching the moon rise over the mountain and set over the ocean is amazing. Our area has access to beautiful beaches, hikes, snorkeling, and is near the Puʻuhonua o Hoʻnaunau National Park. We also encourage guests to visit our local restaurants, cafes and shops nearby. There are the typical day time sounds of an active, working farm with operating farm equipment, processing of agricultural products, and often hold educational tours/workshops.  The night time is also active with the sounds of cocqui frogs, roosters, and other farm animals from neighboring farms.
host_about:
Honaunau Farm Wellness Retreat is a place where we can engage with people and share in the abundance of a co-creative conscious lifestyle.  We love meeting people from all over the world right here on the land we call home.  We enjoy engaging conversation about travel, spirituality, holistic living, healthy food and current affairs.  We find people who use airbnb to be great guests and it is a pleasure to be a host in Hawaii because we have the opportunity to extend the magic and beauty of the island to all of them in unique ways.  We love our life and we love to share it.

Over the last two years, we have had our CBD hemp business, Mana Artisan Botanics, take off.  So we are now traveling often for work and have our guest experience hosted by our retreat manager.  She shares our love of people and holistic living and is a gracious hostess should you need anything during your stay.

The Aina Nalu is located in the heart of historic old Lahaina Town. Day or night, a short walk will bring you to Front Street where you can stroll through art galleries, sample the local fare at restaurants or hunt for treasures in quaint shops. During the day - the beach, snorkeling, or learning to surf or paddleboard are convenient for you to enjoy. Lahaina is also the main harbor town if you’d like to embark on a whale watch, dolphin sightings, scuba dive or all the other marine opportunities to surrounding areas.
A boutique-style resort set on 9 acres of lush landscaping is an oasis of tranquility; an alternative to the Lahaina hotels on the busy waterfront, the perfect place to relax and enjoy the “Aloha” Spirit.

name: Ground Floor Unit 144 in Hale Kamaole
description:
Unit 144 is a bright and spacious one bedroom, one bathroom, ground floor unit with a lovely landscaped and expanded private lanai. The unit has been extensive remodeled and updated.

The space
Unit 144 features a large, semi-private lanai with a pleasant outlook to the manicured grounds and a partial ocean view. Located in sought after Hale Kamaole's upper section, away from the street noise of South Kihei Road, the unit is just steps away from one of two pools in the complex, the tennis court, and a traditional charcoal BBQ area.

Featuring an extra window to bring in plenty of Maui sunshine, the living room is furnished in a tropical style, with a queen size sleeper sofa, easy chair with ottoman, and a flat screen TV. Beautiful new tile flooring runs throughout the main living area.

The kitchen has been completely renovated with shaker style cabinets, solid granite counter tops, and stainless steel appliances. The large peninsula is per
neighborhood_overview:
Hale Kamaole is a special place that is sure to bring you many wonderful memories.

Sunny South Kihei is the perfect year round vacation destination. Never too hot, never too cold. Perfectly situated for easy access to many of Maui's most beautiful beaches.

Hale Kamaole is THE BEST LOCATION, right on the South Kihei-Wailea border,
steps to the famed sandy white beaches of Kamaole III Beach, perfect for boogie boarding, snorkeling (keep an eye out for a turtle or whale!), or just relaxing. We are also so close to the pristine Wailea beaches fronting luxury hotels and central to the shops and restaurants of Kihei and Wailea. A short drive to many of Maui's best golf courses, too.
host_about: We have been vacationing at Hale Kamaole for more than 20 years, and are thrilled to own our piece of paradise.  We are hands on owners that visit our property at least once each year.  We take pride in our vacation home and strive to provide all the amenities you need to have the perfect Maui vacation.

aloha! This house is my pride and joy! I have created a beautiful writing space and love nest. Large and spacious open setting with lots of windows and breezes. Perfect for a writing/creative retreat or a couple looking for the spot to be in love in Hawaii.

neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood of seaview is an eclectic and aloha (welcoming) place. My part of it is sparsely populated, but I the neighbors I have are great and keep to themselves. It's a great neighborhood to take a walk down to view the ocean or just stroll around.

description:
Home away from home 7 minutes to airport. Perfect temp @ 1000 ft. elevation. Private apartment with studio/LR, full kitchen, bath. WIFI, cable, beach gear, breakfast, free parking.

Cozy, yet spacious. Pack Light! Has everything. Bring a bathing suit, shorts, tee shirts, hiking shoes, shirt/ light jacket. Kitchen has basics; check before shopping.
See Tax info below.

The space
Entire home away from home for less than a hotel room! A short trip to everything, a world apart in lovely neighborhood setting. Add $75 cleaning fee for a real bargain.
Rate includes starter basket of breakfast foods (granola and almond milk), Kona coffee, teas, to start your stay, plus free wifi, beach gear, washer-dryer and aloha spirit.
Check calendar for openings throughout the year .

Spacious relaxing guest apartment in lovely home-garden setting at perfect elevation in Kailua-Kona, Hawaii on the Big Island! About 300 sq. ft. Lovely bedroom/ liv
neighborhood_overview:
Lovely neighborhood, 2.3 miles up Hualalai from the Kona airport (KOA).
Our neighborhood semi-remote, but close to everything. We are 7 min. from the airport, but we hear no noise, as it is not legal to fly over land on the Big Island (except to land and take off). No street lights to obscure your view of the stars.
We are 10 min. from Costco, 12-15 min. from town and shopping, 20-45 min. from fantastic beaches. Our area is perfect for day trips in all directions! Then you come home to a peaceful setting at a comfortable elevation.

The neighborhood has roosters, dogs, wild turkeys, and birds that sing loudly in the morning. If you are sensitive to noise, you might want to use the soft earplugs that we provide. (Sorry, no refunds for "noise".)

We live in the tropics. There are cute geckos that may eat yogurt and papaya from your softly outstretched finger. Since it's the tropics we also bugs, ants, spiders, centipedes, etc. We have Terminex spray regula
host_about:
Love meeting new people. Thatʻs one of the reasons we enjoy the guests in our ohana (in-law apt.).
Love to cook. I have a huge collection of recipe books with cooking from many countries.
Really love beaches on Hawaii, snorkeling, reading at the beach, napping at the beach.
Love showing family and friends around the island, sharing favorite cool secret spots and restaurants. Enjoy living aloha on Hawaii time.

neighborhood_overview: Environmental Disclosure. Guest acknowledges that the State of Hawaii is exposed to environmental hazards including, but not limited to, tidal waves, hurricanes and floods. Please refer to the local phone book for information pertaining to evacuation procedures. In the event of an emergency, the State of Hawaii utilizes a warning alert system (emergency sirens are tested on the first working day of every month at 11:45 a.m.). Guest is responsible for using their best efforts to familiarize themselves with property, its location, and surroundings. Some of the properties are in a remote location. As such, what would be considered normal response time for public services in an urban area may not be available in this location, i.e., police, fire, and emergency services. 235 Liliuokalani Ave. Honolulu, HI 96815

Located in the center of Waikiki this newly remodeled, simple queen bed studio with full kitchen is just 4 mins walk to Waikiki Beach & delivers great value for money. Plus has a great Pool and sundeck.

The space

A simple Queen bed apartment on the 2nd floor with A/C and full kitchen. Includes Cooker, microwave, toaster, coffee maker and all pots pans and dishes you'll need for a quick weekend or month long stay.

All bedding along with towels & Beach Towels are ready for your arrival.

Beach chairs are also available upon request!

name: Lahaina Condo
description:
Sun sets and ocean breezes everyday. Located in the popular west coast in the neighborhood of Honokawaii between Kaanapali and Kahana. Competively priced to make this affordable for everyone.

The space
WELCOME! to Hale Ono Loa, located on the west side of Maui in the neighborhood of Honokowai. HOL is a 4 story direct ocean front Condo building on the beautiful Kaanapali coast with views of Molokai and Lanai. The well maintained grounds have everything you would expect of Hawaii; tropical plants, coconut palms, tropical fruits and views, views, views!

If you were expecting trade winds, ocean views, sunsets, ocean breezes, sunshine, whales, turtles, monk seals, rainbows, snorkeling, sunbathing, quiet pace, swimming pool and laundry facilities...look no further, Hale Ono Loa, "House of Good Living" has it all.

Our unit is located on the 3rd floor (has elevator) is a one bedroom fully furnished remodeled unit with large private lanai. The
neighborhood_overview: Close to beaches, Walking distance to beachside county park,  organic farmers market right across from park.   Dukes restaurant 1 mile easy walk

name: Sunset Beach Temple Treehouse  !!!
description:
30 day minimum rental. Dwell in bliss like a local in north shore nirvana. The ultimate retreat for surfers, yogis and nature lovers, the Temple overlooks one of the most famous surf spots on the North Shore. Climb 100 steps up a path winding through lush foliage...

TA Registration number: TA–139–039–9488–01

The space
Large two Level Cedar post and beam tree house with a great views of world famous white sand beach and surrounding fruit trees, flowers, and jungle. Built in two large Banyan trees, this unique tree house is unlike anything in the area. Set on a 2 acre parcel overlooking the ocean, with a plethora of mature fruit trees, including Mango, Papaya, Banana, Avocado, Carambola, Citrus, Fig, of which you are invited to share in season. Sleep to the sound of crashing surf, wake up to the birdsong, a 5 minute walk down the hill to the sand. We are avid gardeners, and green thumbs always welcome to lend a hand and share in our bounty.
host_about: 35+ year North Shore vet and crew, love to share local knowledge with guests.  We overlook the most beautiful ocean and love to get in it everyday! From white water first timers to big wave tow ins, kite surf, stand up paddle and traditional surfing, we do it all.  The focus is fun and we will put you in the right place to maximize yours.  We grow a lot of organic veggies on the property and we invite guests to enjoy. Yoga is a focal point for us, and if you care to join in we are all inclusive... novice first timers and seasoned yogis alike! The communal yoga deck overlooks the ocean and has been the venue for some wonderful practice for our guests that have visited and ourselves as well.  We enjoy inspiring and being inspired by the friends we make up here.

name: ★Ocean Lookout - PRIVATE HOT TUB + ACCESS TO POOL
description:
★Private Hot Tub ✔
★44 ft Swimming Pool (shared) ✔
★Panoramic Ocean Views ✔
★King Bed ✔
★Sunrise/moonrise View ✔
★Washer/Dryer ✔
★Cliff Walk ✔
★High Speed WIFI✔
★Star Gazing✔
★Full Kitchen✔

Relax and unwind in this stunning private home on Maui's dramatic North Shore, with wraparound lanais, panoramic whitewater ocean, cliff and Haleakala summit views. Star gaze as you soak in your own private hot tub with a chilled glass of wine and enjoy a once-in-a-lifetime experience. The 'real' Maui.

The space
The Ocean Lookout suite is the top floor of "The Lookout House. You'll enjoy a master bedroom, a bathroom with a dressing room, a fun kitchen with everything you could possibly need to prepare delicious meals, a large dining room with a magnificent teak table, and an amazing living room to spread out and relax.

Here at Ocean Lookout, you'll be able to see 200 degree ocean and cliff views sweeping all t
neighborhood_overview:
This region of the island is an outdoor paradise. There are so many things to do in Maui, and all of them can be accessed from our property. You will be minutes away from beaches, jungles, waterfalls, restaurants, and state parks. Everything you need to make the most of a trip to Hawaii.

Here is a list of some of our favorite places nearby:
★Jungle Zipline Maui - HI (7 minutes)
★Twin Falls Maui Waterfall (10 minutes)
★Colleen's at the cannery (19 minutes)
★Freshies Maui Restaurant (27 minutes)
★Pa’ia and Makawao Towns for shopping/dining/beaches (20 minutes)
★Garden of Eden Arboretum & Botanical Garden (30 minutes)
★Ho’okipa Beach Park (23 minutes)
★Haleakalā National Park (1hr 35 minutes)

We're very much a 'local style' neighborhood where people are relaxed, friendly and into the organic lifestyle. ★ Please drive along our small local road very SLOWLY (10 mph or less) as we like to 'blend' into our local neighborhoo
host_about:
My husband Jeff, and I, have lived in Maui since we fell in love with it in 1992.  We'd stayed in B&B's all through England and Wales, and thought "Why would anyone want to stay a hotel?"  We love the personal touches and we love being able to give people a 'real' experience of Maui.  

In my 'spare' time, I write poetry, short stories and scripts - and I also perform in live theatre and theatre improv.  Maui is fun!

name: Tropical Hideaway Amid Lush Flora
description:
The space
Kona Cottage is a darling separate small cottage located right above Kona in a very tropical quiet setting. This tranquil hideaway is located on half an acre in an upscale neighborhood with fruit trees, papayas, bananas and array of blooming orchids and flowers right out your cottage door! The cottage is tastefully decorated in a tropical style with an amazingly comfortable queen bed, nice sized bathroom with shower and tub, flat screen tv, and a small outdoor kitchen on a covered lanai with small fridge, microwave, sink and gas grill. From the outdoor lanai you can hear and see the koi pond which makes for a very relaxing place to chill, have morning coffee or afternoon drink. The cottage is stocked with all sorts of travel books on the Big Island, novels and tour brochures. The koi pond lulls you to sleep at night with the soothing sound of the waterfall. This place is very quiet and tucked away at a cool elevation for a reprieve of the hot Kona climate yet just
neighborhood_overview: The cottage is located in an upscale neighborhood, its very private and peaceful.
host_about: My wife and I were raised in the Hawaiian Islands and have a wealth of knowledge about Hawaii and the Big Island. We are available should you need any information or inside scoop! The cottage is separate from the main house but close enough should you need anything. We look forward to having you enjoy the tropics!

description:
This is a wonderful cottage 5 minute walk to the beach with 3 bedrooms and fully equipped kitchen with beach toys, wifi and parking, gas grill, 2 pools.
These are stand alone cottages with Old Hawaiiana feel close to all that West Maui has to offer

The space
This is a great location for a family vacation. The cottage is located just across the street from the famed Ka'anapali Beach. You can walk to Whalers Village for entertainment, golf, shopping and dining. There are 2 heated swiming pools on the property . This cottage is approximately 1300 square feet and has wifi for your internet needs. You can get to some of the best beaches Maui has to offer only minutes from this private cottage.

name: Haleiwa -Slow Food /  Eco- Yoga B&B
description:
Explore simple living in this bottom floor bungalow in Haleiwa with rivers,quiet beaches & surfing. The onsite food forest features ice cream banana,coconut,cocoa, papaya and other exotic plants. Practice yoga, rejuvenate, relax & experience a sustainable lifestyle. Surfing lessons, yoga & cooking classes, farm tours and lifestyle consulting are available as well.

The space
Explore the sustainable lifestyle this comfortable functional remodeled home in Haleiwa town feel free to enjoy the complimentary produce and breakfast or upgrade to a morning feast from the food forest. The brief morning yoga session is free schedules permitting. Upgrades to yoga are available as well. This not a hotel but an older home offering life enhancing and experiences as well as a place to stay. The permaculture style food forest consists of spinaches, breadfruit,passion fruit,figs,coconuts,papaya, bananas, & more. The place is also powered by solar . The environment and
neighborhood_overview: It's a quiet & laid back, this area lends itself to previous eras of large scale agriculture and old the Hawaiian sustainable lifestyle.   Very close to Haleiwa town. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haleiwa,_Hawaii.  as well as biking distance to beautiful beaches http://www.yelp.com/biz/haleiwa-alii-beach-park-haleiwa, and  friendly people. Great places to eat as well.http://www.yelp.com/biz/opal-thai-food-haleiwa,http://www.thebeetboxcafe.com/,http://www.yelp.com/biz/bonzer-front-haleiwa, http://www.yelp.com/biz/celestial-natural-foods-haleiwa.

name: $149 Nt Special September 3-11 Perfect Location
description:
BEAUTIFUL GARDEN HALE ON A SERENE 2 ACRE RETREAT ON THE DRY AND SUNNY SIDE OF WAIMEA TOWN. LUSH PROPERTY AWAY FROM CROWDS BUT CONVENIENT LOCATION. FULLY EQUIPPED EAT IN KITCHEN, LIVING ROOM, SEPARATE BEDROOM AND TILED BATH WITH WALK IN SHOWER. ADDITIONAL PRIVATE OUTDOOR SHOWER GARDEN. GAS BBQ & DINING ON THE LANAI. PERFECT CLIMATE FOR RELAXING DAYS AND COMFORTABLE EVENINGS. 5 MILES FROM BEAUTIFUL MAUNA KEA BEACH. EASY DAY TRIPS TO BIG ISLAND SITES.
WASHER/DRYER, WIFI, ONSITE PARKING.

The space
This charming garden hale is situated on the sunny side of the Paniolo Town of Waimea (Kamuela)
Our peaceful, two acre retreat is the perfect location for exploring the numerous points of interest on the Big Island and a private getaway to practice 'Hawaiian Time'

The Garden Hale features beautiful bamboo and stone floors, 9 feet ceilings with fans and a private lanai with an organic garden.
The bedroom is a private space with a queen s
neighborhood_overview:
We are close to Waimea Town but located on the dry side where the climate is perfect.
Our central location on Hawaii Island makes The Garden Hale the perfect place to stay and easily explore all the beaches, hike all the valleys, visit Volcano National Park, Mauna Kea and surrounding towns during the day and return for gracious relaxation at night.
host_about:
Matt, originally from Portland, Oregon has spent the last 18 years dedicated to real estate within the luxury resort communities along the Kohala Coast. Along with North and South Kohala and the Hamakua Coast.

Matt has a passion for permaculture design and has developed thriving gardens at his South Kohala home. He and his beautiful wife Rose have been able to donate hundreds of pounds of produce to the local food bank run by Kokua Ministries in Waimea.

Matt brings an eye for detail and the competence that comes from years of satisfying the most discerning clientele.

Aloha ,
Matt
Hawai'i Life Real Estate Brokers

Licensed Message Therapist

name: Oceanfront Kona Reef Condo-60 feet to Ocean Waves
description:
Kona's best & most requested location. It is only one of two resort condos at a white sand beach in Kona. The Kona Reef Condo Resort is the perfect location for your Hawaiian vacation. Your lanai will be less than 60 feet from the waves for spectacular sunsets. Peaceful location yet only two blocks to the restaurants, nightlife and shops of Kailua-Kona village. Enjoy!

The space
You are so close to the waves you’ll feel the ocean spray when surf’s up! You will relax with the spectacular Ocean and sunset views from kitchen, living room and lanai. You will have your own, one bedroom , one bath condo apartment at a oceanfront resort. .

Play on the white sand beach next to the condo. Relax in the ocean-side pool and spa. Snorkel, surf or watch the turtles, whales and dolphins from the lanai. Stroll thru the Royal Kona Resort, two blocks to 10 of Kona’s best restaurants and nightclubs (some mediocre ones too). Just three more blocks to the farmers
neighborhood_overview: Peacefull location at a white sand beach.  Only two block stroll down the shore thru the Royal Kona Resort grounds to Kona's tourist center, restaurants and night clubs.  Grocery, Target and Walmart about one mile away. A Farmers market a short 5 block walk.
host_about:
KonaDave is a coffee farmer and world traveler!  His great, great, great uncle brought the first coffee plants to Kona in 1828, the rest is coffee history.  

He was born in Seattle, Washington and when not traveling the world splits his time between homes in Kona, Hawaii, and Edmonds, Washington. He travels over 100 days a year. He grew up (friends say he never grew up) in Seattle and graduated from the University of Washington before a career in the newspaper business and advertising. He worked for a Washington Post company and the San Francisco Chronicle. 

He "retired" from the newspaper business when his daughter was born in 1987. When she was three months old KonaDave started traveling the world.  His daughter left dirty diapers in 24 countries before she was three. KonaDave has explored over 100 nations and states around the world. Italy is his favorite to visit.   He also runs a real estate investment company between travels.  

He loves to show people Hawaii's hidden treasures and his KonaZona Coffee Farm, Art  Gardens and Tiki Village.  Come visit him at the farm and he will let you pick all the coffee, fruit or flowers to take back to the condo.  He will share and cup of Kona Coffee or Mai Tai in his backyard Tiki Bar.  If you are lucky one of his famous parties will happen when you are in town.  They are legendary!!  The KonaZona is only 4 miles and 100 years away in historic Artist filled Holualoa town.  KonaDave  and the famous KonaZona Coffee Farm, Art Garden and Tiki Village  are easy to find on the internet. Check it out on your internet explorations of the Big Island!

name: ★ Sandy Beachfront Home ★
description:
Located directly on the sand on the windward side of Oahu. Beachside lanai, hammock, BBQ, kayak & an array of beach gear ensures maximum beach/ocean fun. Two grocery stores are located less than five minutes away.

Beds: Cal King (1), Queen (1), Twins (2), Sleeper Sofas (2). NOTE: upon request, the two twins are convertible into a king.

The space
Sitting directly on a small skiff of sandy beach, our place offers ocean views as far as the eye can see. But the beachfront location is just one of the many desirable features. The place offers 2 stories and over 1,900 sq. ft. of comfortable living space with classic Hawaiian décor.

Upstairs features vaulted ceilings, two bedrooms, two full baths, big great room, full kitchen, dining room, and two ocean-facing lanais. Downstairs features an additional bedroom, living room and full bath.


Outside, the large beachfront lanai is the perfect place to hang out and relax, and its gate lead

Optional services offered upon request: Mid-stay housekeeping. Babysitting services provided by a First Aid and CPR certified family member. Please inquire for rates and availability.

The space
Welcome to your ocean view beach villa. The building itself is the ultimate in privacy and beauty! The property grounds are surrounded by large koi ponds with water falls, a lagoon pool with its own sand beach for kids to play, an infinity lap pool and multiple hot tubs. There is a beautiful outdoor bar with cable tv for enjoying cocktails and the unforgettable sunsets. This luxury oceanfront property is landscaped beautifully with flowers, plants, palm trees and natural stones. Your two bedroom luxury villa comes with top of the line appliances, including a Subzero refrigerator, Wolf Stove and wine cooler, a ROY YAMAGUCHI Signature Kitchen – created by Hawaii’s own master chef. The lanai is your own outdoor living room with spectacular views of the pacific ocean. Sho
neighborhood_overview: The Beach Villas at Ko Olina is located on the West side of O'ahu along two miles of Oahu's most pristine beaches in the world-class, private Ko Olina Resort vacation community. This resort community is home to the Aulani Disney Resort, the JW Marriott Ihilani Resort and Spa, the Marriott Beach Club, Ko Olina Golf Course and the Ko Olina Marina. You are located just steps from the beach and within walking distance of all of the numerous amenities offered throughout this vacation community. The Ted Robinson designed Ko Olina Championship Golf Course is home to the LPGA Lotte Championship. There are three full service spas located in Aulani, the Ihilani and the Marriott Beach Club. There are numerous fine dining options located throughout the resort community. The world-class Ko Olina Marina offers a selection of sports fishing, coastline cruises and water activities, from seasonal whale watching and dolphin sails to snorkeling among Hawaiian sea turtles and dramatic sunset cruises. The
host_about: Me and my husband have been living Hawaii for more than 18 years. We invested in KoOlina 12 years ago. The Beach Villas was our home residence before our family started growing and so we decided to move to have more space.  At that time we decided to share our beautiful beach villa with you. We absolutely love the KoOlina resort community and we can truly say that this resort is a 'place of joy'!

name: House of Bonsai Vacation Rental
description:
A one-of-a-kind romantic Zen getaway vacation rental with bonsai garden and koi pond in the heart of the Volcano rainforest.

The space
Take Highway 11 to Volcano. After mile 26, turn left on Pearl Avenue. If coming from Kona/South Point, pass the 27 mile marker. After the Lanihuli/Wright Road sign, turn right on Pearl Avenue. At the lefthand corner of Pearl and 7th, just a few miles away from the actively erupting Halemaumau Crater in the Volcanoes National Park, discover a delightful romantic studio surrounded by a Japanese bonsai garden and koi pond.

This beautiful open-beam studio boasts a kitchen complete with a full-sized refrigerator, microwave oven and gas stove. Amenities include Japanese dishes, fleece-lined hapi coats and wireless internet, video and CD players. A queen-size bed with down comforter as well as an additional futon couch which opens into a bed, can accomodate 4 people. An infrared heater keeps you toasty on chilly evenings.
neighborhood_overview: An actively erupting volcano as a backyard is an amazing gift of nature. The Volcano community has some nice eateries and galleries to visit. Sunday market at Cooper Center has good eats and fresh produce. Go early, it closes by 10:00 a.m.
host_about:
Born and raised in Hawaii, I am a retired high school English teacher who enjoys every moment of life doing the things that bring joy, adventure and relaxation. I can spend hours on the dance floor free-style dancing, playing mahjong or djembe drumming. I am co-founder of the Big Island Jazz and Blues Society responsible for bringing in performers like Maria Muldaur, Ray Brown Jr., or Keahi Conjugacion and Volcano Choy Jr. to our humble Hilo town.

In quiet moments I love working with my bonsai and spending my time designing my koi pond. Working with our rich Volcano soil planting organic vegetables is also an enjoyable pastime. Travel to distant lands is always exciting, my favorite spots being Iquitos on the Amazon, Machu Picchu, the Cotswolds in England and bungie jumping in New Zealand.

Saturdays find me with the wind in my face on the back of our new Ultra Classic  Harley heading for lunch at The Fish and Hog in Waimea, Aunty Kanae's for teri pork or Gramma's in Honoka'a. I love being a biker babe and we did a one-month bike tour to Sturgis and the Badlands and 6 1/2 weeks from San Diego to Washington and down the coast of Oregon and northern California to see the redwoods.  Maybe one day I can learn to ski and hope happy visitors to my House of Bonsai will successfully get me there. Oh, I also create whimsical jewelry so visit my workshop and take home some one-of-a-kind pieces.

I was a caregiver for my awesome dad who passed at the age of 101. Yes, we have longevity in our family. Dad comes from a family of 15. He and Mom taught us to be resilient and independent, to let nothing stand in our way and to always have a sense of humor. I have some fabulous stories of Dad's to share with all who visit and want to take home a treasured piece of the islands found nowhere else in the world. Come and visit me in Volcano, and partake of a unique experience.

name: Lani Paradise Oceanfront Retreat with Private Pool
description:
Experience Maui - on the water's edge!
Enjoy natural oceanfront scenery and spectacular unobstructed views from this tastefully decorated oceanfront 4 bedroom, two-story Villa and romantic oceanfront 2 bedroom Cottage overlooking Mauiʻs North Shore.
Located near boutique shops and restaurants of historical Paia Town.
Close to hiking, surf spots, and white sand beach.
Enjoy the sound of the waves, swaying coconut trees, and exceptional sunsets.

The space
Our well-equipped and tastefully decorated 4 bedroom villa and 2 bedroom cottage is part of exclusive oceanfront property with a private pool in a private tropical garden setting, located 1/2 mile from the charming shops, galleries, and restaurants of Paia town. Enjoy the sound of the waves, swaying coconut trees, and exceptional sunsets while you stay in comfort and serenity.

You will find sandy beaches perfect for sunbathing and swimming within 150 yards, and world-class surf/wi
neighborhood_overview:
Paia Hawaii is one of the communities that make up the north shore of Maui.
It's a funky little town which has managed to retain a lot of it's character from the sugar plantation days. Recreational activities include hiking, fishing, sailing, snorkeling, swimming, surfing, scuba diving and more. Golfers have many excellent courses to choose from.
Beaches in Paia
The best place to surf and to watch the surfers — board and/or wind — is at Hookipa, located just a couple of miles past the center of Paia on the road to Hana.
If you are seeking a more traditional — and safer — family-oriented ocean experience, visit Baldwin Beach Park, located on the road from Kahului as it approaches Paia.

Sightseers can visit beaches, art galleries and the awe inspiring Haleakala National Park. The park, which covers a large portion of the island of Maui, encompasses Haleakala volcano and protects the scenic pools of Oheo Gulch, and the unique and delicate ecosystems of Kipa

This dorm is perfect for when you are traveling by yourself but don't want to be by yourself. Known as the "7 Mile Miracle," the North Shore of Oah'u is one of the most sought after places for vacationers. We're lucky enough not only to live steps away from world class beaches, surf breaks, and historic Hale'iwa town, but we are a serene getaway amongst all of it.
host_about: Aloha! I am the proprietor of a private lodging on the North Shore of Oah'u, a place where you will find an escape from the everyday, relaxation, and some of the most beautiful beaches in the world. Here we enjoy the beautiful weather, lush jungle surroundings, and the way the sunlight glistens off the Pacific. name: Treehouse Ohana
description:
The Ohana in a tropical jungle setting will be your home while visiting the Big Island. We are located at 1000ft elevation, and it's a nice few degrees cooler than downtown Kona. In 10 minutes you can get to the closest beaches by car. Start your day with a freshly brewed cup of James Bean Coffee from our farm. You have your own private entrance to the Ohana and free parking for 1 car. Enjoy the jungle & animal sounds and ocean view. Soak in the hot tub, and have fun!

The space
- Convenient to everything but tucked away in a jungle-like atmosphere, this space unites the fresh-aired joys of camping with the homey comforts of a nice bed and private spaces. Please be aware that you might encounter geckos and spiders as we live in a jungle.

- Queen size bed plus sofabed as well as one single bed in a separate sleeping area.
- You have your own small refrigerator, microwave and electric water kettle.
- One bathroom with shower and toilet
-
neighborhood_overview:
- Friendly and reliable neighbors
- Safe and quiet neighborhood
- We have some big trees on our property. Rainbow Eucalyptus, Mango and Monkey pod, just to name a few. You'll be able to watch birds, look at coffee trees, pick up mangoes from the driveway and gaze at the stars at night.
host_about:
James is a passionate coffee farmer, lover of good breakfasts and beautiful sunsets. His wife Keiko can usually be found behind her camera or making watercolor paints for her art supply store. 
They met through Airbnb, can you believe it? So of course they are passionate about Airbnb's "LIVE THERE" concept and love to host guests from all over the world. 
.
Connect with us on (Hidden by Airbnb) :) @treehousekona

name: Maui Condo across fm Kam II beach
description:
A welcoming 2nd floor, one bedroom 723 sq ft condo at Kihei Kai Nani complex across from beautiful Kamaole II beach, in Kihei. It is updated, fully furnished and equipped with full kitchen, King size bed and a fold out queen sofa-bed (sleeping 4).

The space
Comfortable, fully equipped second floor one bedroom condo in Kihei, Maui, within short walks and drives to the best Maui Beaches, across the street from Kamaole II Beach, which is a wonderful sandy, shallow beach, with a nice snorkeling reef. Two miles north of prestigious and very expensive Wilea, our condo at Kihei Kai Nani provides you and your family an ideal location for affordable accommodations on Maui, while enjoying the best beaches, golfing, snorkeling, dining and shopping on the island.

This is unit 252 in Building 7 in the Kihei Kai Nani Complex. The lanai faces the North/West side of the island and has a nice view of the garden below and a partially obstructed view of the West Maui
neighborhood_overview: The condo is located directly across the street from Kamaole 1, II & III beaches, which have been listed among the top 10 beaches on Maui.  Kihei is a relaxed area blessed with almost constant sunshine, very little rain and plenty of beautiful beaches and shops / restaurants.  No formal wear required here.   Come ready to relax and soak up the rays, swim, eat and rest.
host_about: We are a happy family who decided to purchase condos on Maui because we love Maui so much.  Thanks to the 2008 recession, we ended up buying three condos, all in the Kihei Kai Nani resort.  We found Kihei Kai Nani to be the perfect place to buy and rent out condos for various reasons:  first and probably the most important, it is located across the street from three of the best beaches on Maui, secondly, it is located in South Kihei, which is the driest, most sunny area of the island and finally, because it is in South Kihei, it is affordable for us and our guests, yet within a short distance to luxurious Wailea.  We enjoy renting out our units to guests because they all enjoy the island and everything it has to offer, as much as we do and we get to enjoy the island ourselves.  Now that we are both retired, we have been spending our winters at our condos on Maui, to enjoy the local weather and beaches and to perform necessary updates & repairs on the condos.

name: Experience Aloha from the edge of Kazumura cave
description:
Aloha E Come Mai, Aloha Crater Lodge. Experience Aloha from the edge of Kazumura cave and lava tube. Accommodations in Volcano, Hawai'i less than 2 miles from the Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park. Hale Ohana a 2 bedroom 1 bath vacation rental
Aloha Crater Lodge offers entrance into Kazumura cave and lava tube, the world's longest lava tube more than 40 miles. Guided tours available daily.

The space
Aloha Crater Lodge is located less than 2 miles from the entrance to Hawaii Volcanoes National Park. The upstairs unit Hale Ohana, located on the second floor offers truly amazing views of the Volcano rain forest. Hale Ohana is a2 bedroom 1 bath vacation rental that offers a full kitchen, living/dining room, and laundry. Bedroom one has a king bed bedroom 2 has 2 double beds. The maximum occupancy is 6 people in the unit.
At Aloha Crater Lodge you can also enjoy the outdoor 6 person whirlpool tub and a lava tube tour right here on the property. Experien
neighborhood_overview: Sunday morning local farmers market, Thai Thai food truck available Tuesday-Saturday, church services at New Hope Christian Fellowship Volcano 8:30, orchids and maze at Akatsuka Orchid garden, local hang out at Kilauea Military Camp, KMC, cafeteria bar and game room with fried food.
host_about:
Aloha, My name is Shannon.  I am 50 something and running our family owned and operated Bed and Breakfast and vacation rental. It takes a lot to manage 6 rooms and a family of 6.  I get help from my husband Dan, daughter Everley and her fiance, Cameron. We really enjoy what we do here just helping visitors enjoy Volcano and our Big Island. We live on site with our 4 dogs,  bun bun Bella, box turtle Exodus, cat Lunette and the  countless pheasant living nearby.
We have lived on Big Island since 1992 and have been running Aloha Crater Lodge since 2007. We have learned to be eco friendly along the way by hanging up sheets to dry, solar panel to help with hot water and we take out our own garbage as well as recycle and compost. 
We are involved in community, Volcano has a lot going on at our community center with a covered skate park, farmers market weekly, yoga and plenty new stuff all the time. One neighborhood church we have attended 2004, New Hope Fellowship Volcano, has been very awesome. Dan and I serve in the children's ministry, I dance hula and Dan strums the ukulele learning our favorite songs.
Hopefully we will get the chance to serve you here at Aloha Crater Lodge and share our Aloha!

We supply Hawaiian coffee and teas. The common area of our saltwater pool also includes 2 dining tables poolside under hardwood cabanas, lots of lounge chairs for sunning poolside, beach chairs, coolers, beach towels, WIFI and parking included. Room is decorated with Hawaiian touches. Conveniently located near beaches, airport (4
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is like an older Hawaiian town.  Wailuku is after all, the county seat of Maui.  It's a walking town too.  Just two blocks up there are an assortment of shops, eateries and boutiques.  Six tennis courts are around the corner.  They are free and lit at night.  The islands best macaroons are found down the street at Maui Macaroons and Artisan Market.
host_about: Originally from Chicago, IL.  Lived for about 17 years in Long Beach CA where I attended CSULB and UOP.  Finally settling in Maui in 2000 with my husband that is a partner in a CPA firm here on the island.  I enjoy talking with guests, assisting them in any way I can, bike riding, paddling (when I have time or energy left), going to the beach, baking, traveling and raising our son.

I am a retired mathematics teacher. I love to host my friends and family. When you choose my airbnb  you become my paying guest, but guest nonetheless. While you are under my roof, I take responsibility for your safety and comfort. I promise to assist you in any which way I can. 

I Have lived in Honolulu for 40+ years.  Love to read, cook, and fiddle around in my yard.

name: Sandy Paws
description:
This unit is a small 1 bedroom apartment on 1F. It has a full kitchen with all the necessary cookware, plates and utensils, and separate bed room with a full size bed. There is a twin size sofa bed in the living room as well. It is located 10 to 15 minutes to Waikiki beach, Diamond head, Waikiki, shopping, golf, zoo, farmers market, many fine eateries, the freeway and much more !
